86238|《2001太空漫遊》─ 影評人之選2017|"2001: A Space Odyssey" - Critics' Choice 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年11月4日 (六) 下午2:00 及 2017年11月12日 (日) 晚上7:00|4 Nov 2017 (Sat) 2:00pm and 12 Nov 2017 (Sun) 7:00pm|149分鐘|149 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|上世紀最偉大的科幻電影之一，亦是史丹利寇比力克個人代表作，靈感來自小說家克拉克的短篇小說《前哨》，也由克拉克親自操刀為電影編劇。史丹利寇比力克在英國的Pinewood片廠，造出了這宇宙探索電影，內裏雖然對白不多，角色極少，卻一次過探討了科技、人工智能、電腦、進化、存在主義和神秘主義等等課題，亦以最具探索方式，超前地實驗了投映、模型特效和仿無重狀態的攝影。戲中由天地穹蒼開展，主軸則是設在太空船發現一號的木星之旅，船上眾宇航員，慢慢發現中央電腦HAL另有企圖，在兩者的角力中，HAL主宰着各人命運……影片最後以不知的未來作結，白色調子、佈滿新古典主義油畫及雕塑的房間，老去的主角Bowman慢慢又化成胚胎，成為月球和太空之間的衛星，幾乎與此片融為一體的理察史特勞斯的《查拉圖斯特拉如是說》又再奏起，成為全片最令人難忘的一筆。|One of the greatest sci-fi film of the last century, 2001: A Space Odyssey is also the magnum opus of Stanley Kubrick. The film takes its inspiration from Arthur C. Clarke’s story The Sentinel, with Clarke working on the script together with Kubrick.Kubrick creates this film on space exploration at the Pinewood Studios in Britain. The film has minimal dialogue and characters but explores themes as diverse as technology, artificial intelligence, computers, evolution, existentialism and occultism. On the technical level, 2001: A Space Odyssey features groundbreaking filmmaking techniques such as forward projection, special effects and mock zero-gravity photography.The film starts from the beginning of time, and the main action takes place on a spacetrip that is travelling to Jupiter. The astronauts realize that the central computer HAL is plotting something. The struggle between man and machine ensues, with HAL having an upper hand over the astronauts.The film ends in the unknown future. We’re in a white room with neoclassical paintings and sculptures. Our hero Bowman gets old but slowly becomes an embryo, which then turns into a satellite between the Moon and space. At this moment, Richard Strauss’ Thus Spoke Zarathustra is played again and brings the film to an unforgettable close.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/coo/film01.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/coo/film01.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|2017年11月4日設映後開幕座談會，粵語主講講者：登徒、紀陶、鄭傳鍏、吳月華、劉嶔、張偉雄 及2017年11月12日設映後座談會，粵語主講講者：紀陶（影評人）、 登徒|Post-screening seminar with Thomas Shin, Lam Kee-to,Cheng Chuen-wai, Stephanie Ng, Lau Yam and Bryan Changin Cantonese on 4 Nov 2017 and Post-screening seminar with Lam Kee-to (Film Critic) and Thomas Shin in Cantonese on 12 Nov 2017|2734 2900|||2017-09-15 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86238_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86238_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-15 02:40:48.000

86245|《X聖治》─ 影評人之選2017|"Cure" - Critics' Choice 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年12月10日 (日) 下午2:30 及2017年12月17日 (日) 下午2:30|10 Dec 2017 (Sun) 2:30pm and 17 Dec 2017 (Sun) 2:30pm|111分鐘|111 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|命案一一發生，死者的頸部都有「X」型的傷痕。案發前，行兇者的生活都看似幸福，沒有殺人動機，但都清楚知道自己殺人的行為。刑警高部賢一負責調查案件的同時，亦要面對有失憶精神問題的愛妻，背負雙重壓力。調查指向一名自稱失憶的青年間宮邦彥，涉案者犯案前皆曾與他接觸。二人與間宮接觸後，高部和他的心理學家朋友佐間久與間宮接觸後，讓他們愈來愈接近案件的真相，但卻同時逐步墮入精神異常的邊緣狀態。黑澤清將都市壓力透過催眠傳換擴大，為影片鋪奠了神秘、冷峻的調色。|The city is struck by serial homicide in which all victims have X-shaped neck wounds. Before committing the murders, each murderer is leading a happy life and no motive can be established, yet each of them is fully conscious on the atrocious acts they’ve done. Detective Takabe is assigned to the case but he is under extra pressure because his wife has a neurotic amnesia condition. All traces point to Mamiya, a young man who claims to be amnesiac. He is the only common link among the murderers. Takabe takes his psychologist buddy Sakuma to see Mamiya, but after the encounter, Takabe and Sakuma gradually lose their grip and sink into an isolated mental edge, despite getting nearer to the secret behind the homicides. Kiyoshi Kurosawa transforms and expands the stress of city life by way of hypnosis, resulting in a mysterious but chilly tone of this film that shoots Kurosawa into worldwide fame.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/coo/film04.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/coo/film04.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|2017年12月10日設映後座談會，粵語主講講者：吳月華 及2017年12月17日設映後座談會，粵語主講講者：尹婉萍（註冊社工，精於催眠治療）、 吳月華|Post-screening seminar with Stephanie Ng in Cantonese on 10 Dec 2017 andPost-screening seminar with Wan Yuen-ping (Registered Social Worker. 79424|「點只旗杆屋咁簡單」導賞系列 - 遊古蹟 · 賞本土陶瓷導賞團 (粵語/英語/普通話)|"Getting to Know More About Flagstaff House" Docent Series  - Visit our Heritage & Appreciate Local Ceramics Docent Tour  (Cantonese/English/Putonghua)|inc6|inc6sc2|2017年10月1, 8, 15, 22, 29日, 11月5, 12, 19, 26日(日) 上午 11:00 至 下午 12:00 及 下午 3:00 至 4:00|1, 8, 15, 22, 29 Oct & 5, 12, 19, 26 Nov (Sun) 11:00am - 12:00nn & 3:00 - 4:00pm|1 小時|1 Hr|596|||||昔日的旗杆屋是香港三軍司令官邸，今天它卻是一所展示茶具、石刻、古物等的博物館，充滿著中國文化藝術氛圍。您對旗干屋好奇嗎? 您對中國藝術有興趣嗎?導賞員會透過一系列的活動，讓您認識杆屋的演變，還帶您欣賞珍貴的瑰寶。請隨心意，選擇您的導賞之旅，讓一家大小渡過一個難忘的週日!|Flagstaff House in the old days was the office and residence of the Commander of British Forces in Hong Kong. Today, it is a museum full of Chinese art and cultural atmosphere where tea ware, seal carving, artefact etc. are on display. Do you want to know more about the Flagstaff House? Are you interested in Chinese art? Our museum docents will tell you the development of Flagstaff House and bring you to see the treasures through this series of tour. Just pick your own choice and share your family with an unforgettable weekend！|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/Museum/Arts/zh_TW/web/ma/home.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/Museum/Arts/en_US/web/ma/home.html|||普通話: 2017.10.29 ∣ 11.26 (星期日) 11:00am - 12:00nn, 英語: 2017.10.29 ∣ 11.26 (星期日) 3:00 – 4:00pm.  茶具文物館地下,每節名額12位，可致電2869 0690預約|Putonghua: 2017.10.29 ∣ 11.26 (Sun) 11:00am - 12:00nn,English: 2017.10.29 ∣ 11.26 (Sun) 3:00 – 4:00pm,Flagstaff House Museum of Tea Ware (G/F),12 seats per session, please call 2869 0690 for reservation||||||茶具文物館|Flagstaff House Museum of Tea Ware||||||||||2017-09-27 12:36:40.000

86246|《女巫》─ 影評人之選2017|"Häxan" - Critics' Choice 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2018年1月6日 (六) 下午2:30 及2018年1月20日 (六) 晚上7:00|6 Jan 2018 (Sat) 2:30pm and 20 Jan 2018 (Sat) 7:00pm|106分鐘|106 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|這部默片經典，運用冷靜的態度、豐富的論述、怪誕的影像，詮釋中世紀巫術和女巫故事，曖昧神秘不下於其題材。丹麥電影大師基斯登遜以創新著稱，此片即混合紀錄和劇情多樣形式。導演第一身敘述，聲明為文化歷史探索之作。用圖像模型追溯人類迷信，重演各式獵巫個案，有詼諧和無知的浮世繪，有狂熱和恐懼造成的奇情冤案。宗教法庭殘酷逼供據實展現，被控者告白化為影像，魔鬼淫亂煉術，觸目驚心。最後用現代科學解釋，女巫或為心理病患，但弱者處境古今何異？影片洋洋大觀，光怪陸離，理性的框架充滿肆意的想像，恍如神秘學文獻，被譽為超現實主義電影先鋒作，面世近百年來，顛覆和趣味依然獨到。今次特別獻映瑞典電影資料館2017年修復版本。|This silent film classic uses a sense of composure, rich narratives, and grotesque visuals to interpret stories of mediaeval witchcrafts and witches,presenting a mystic ambiguity no less than the subject matter itself. Danish film master Benjamin Christensen was known for his innovation, as proven by Häxan’s hybrid form of dramadocumentary, and its cultural and historical exploration as declared through the director’s own narration. With graphics and models the film studies superstition through re-enacting different examples of witch-hunts that were ukiyo-e of humour and ignorance, or bizarre cases of injustice caused by fanaticism andfear. Authentic depiction of religious authorities’ torturous interrogation, confession by the accused and devilish witches’ sabbath rituals are all too shocking and dreadful to bear. The film finalizes with modern science to interpret acts of witchcraft as mental illness. Has the plight of the socially weak ever changed now andthen? A spectacular panorama of peculiarity and bold imagination built under a rational framework as if a piece of occultism literature, the film is regarded as a pioneer in surrealist cinema, which is still subversive and unique as it was released almost a century ago. The Swedish Film Institute 2017 restored edition will be used for the screening programme.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/coo/film05.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/coo/film05.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|2018年1月6日設映後座談會，粵語主講講者：劉嶔2018年1月20日設映後座談會，粵語主講講者：家明（影評人）、 劉嶔|Post-screening seminar with Lau Yam in Cantonese on 6 Jan 2018 andPost-screening seminar with Fung Ka-ming (Film Critic) and Lau Yam in Cantonese on 20 Jan 2018|2734 2900|||2017-09-15 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86246_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86246_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-15 12:51:12.000
86243|《萬世魔星》─ 影評人之選2017|"Life of Brian" - Critics' Choice 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年12月16日 (六) 下午2:30|16 Dec 2017 (Sat) 2:30pm|94分鐘|94 min|75010017|只准18歲或以上人士觀看|Persons Aged 18 and Above Only|$55|$55|拜恩與耶穌同年同月同日同地，在相鄰的馬槽出生，東方三博士也差點把他當作聖嬰來朝拜……雖有這一切巧合，拜恩依然長成一個平平無奇的猶太青年，在母親與羅馬帝國的威權下苟活，直到他在耶穌登山講道的集會上遇到「猶太人民陣線」的志士，生命才出現轉機。為了巴勒斯坦的自由，更為博紅顏一笑，拜恩步上彌賽亞的道路。英國踎低噴飯劇團打造，一枚充滿聖經傳說、神秘宗教、政治陰謀、天外來客，熱血與正能量極度滿瀉的超級笑蛋。|Brian is born on the same day as Jesus Christ, and just one manger away. The Three Magi nearly confuse Brian with the real Saviour... With such special background Brian grows up to be...an ordinary Jewish young man. Just like all Jews at the time Brian lives under the authoritarian rule of the Romans. Brian would have lived a most ordinary life until he runs into members of the People’s Front of Judea during the Sermon on the Mount. For the freedom of Palestine, and for the girl he adores, Brian takes up the path of the Messiah. Produced and performed by Monty Python, Life of Brian is a full bag of hilarious bitspoking fun at the Bible, political conspiracies, extraterrestrials and positivity.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/coo/film03.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/coo/film03.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|2017年12月16日設映後座談會，粵語主講講者：顏志良（宣教師）、 鄭傳鍏|Post-screening seminar with Ngan Chi-leung (Missionary)and Cheng Chuen-wai in Cantonese on 16 Dec 2017|2734 2900|||2017-09-15 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86243_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86243_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 03:20:56.000

86241|《活死人之旅》─ 影評人之選2017|"Naked Lunch" - Critics' Choice 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年11月11日 (六) 晚上7:00|11 Nov 2017 (Sat) 7:00pm|115分鐘|115 min|65910018|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|由口傳至文字書寫之後，小說《裸體午餐》與電影《活死人之旅》已預告在我們的所謂人類文化由印刷媒體與視聽媒體結合之後，全球將以一種新的互聯媒體建立一所巨型的卡夫卡監獄。所謂上帝留下來的天啟之聲及其神的文字將失去原有效用，大家已不再「名正」和「言順」了！《活死人之旅》已預警我們所謂人類將會帶着已成作古的舊有文化，困在一個如同吸毒者在毒癮發作時的失控狀態，再沒有自主生存的能力，人所用的語言如同衣服以及人皮一樣表面化，百分百變成為活死人！只有懂得逆轉而行，由排泄口往上回到吸食口之處，在澎湃的文字毒海中仍能保持聰敏明智的人，才可赤裸裸地，以一絲不掛也不為恥的形式… … 逃出生天！|After the transition of our culture from oral transmission to literal transmission, Naked Lunch, in its novelistic and cinematic form, prophesizes that when human culture merges the print media with its audio-visual counterparts, the Earth will become a huge Kafkaesque prison formed by interconnected media. God's voiceand words will lose their uses and our language will no longer be legitimate.Naked Lunch gives us the apocalyptic warning that humans with our archaic culture will be stuck in an out-of-control state not unlike when a drug addict has to take his/her daily dose. We'll lose our ability to survive autonomously, our language will become superfluous like a piece of clothes or a shred of skin. We'll then become a living corpse! The only way is to find the way back, all the way from excretion to suction. Only the human that could stay sober among a toxic torrent of words can make it out alive, naked but shameless.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/coo/film02.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/coo/film02.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|2017年11月11日設映後座談會，粵語主講講者：紀陶|Post-screening seminar with Lam Kee-to in Cantonese on 11 Nov 2017|2734 2900|||2017-09-15 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86241_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86241_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-15 02:43:21.000
86239|《活死人之旅》─ 影評人之選2017|"Naked Lunch" - Critics' Choice 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年11月19日 (日) 晚上7:00|19 Nov 2017 (Sun) 7:00pm|115分鐘|115 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|由口傳至文字書寫之後，小說《裸體午餐》與電影《活死人之旅》已預告在我們的所謂人類文化由印刷媒體與視聽媒體結合之後，全球將以一種新的互聯媒體建立一所巨型的卡夫卡監獄。所謂上帝留下來的天啟之聲及其神的文字將失去原有效用，大家已不再「名正」和「言順」了！《活死人之旅》已預警我們所謂人類將會帶着已成作古的舊有文化，困在一個如同吸毒者在毒癮發作時的失控狀態，再沒有自主生存的能力，人所用的語言如同衣服以及人皮一樣表面化，百分百變成為活死人！只有懂得逆轉而行，由排泄口往上回到吸食口之處，在澎湃的文字毒海中仍能保持聰敏明智的人，才可赤裸裸地，以一絲不掛也不為恥的形式… … 逃出生天！|After the transition of our culture from oral transmission to literal transmission, Naked Lunch, in its novelistic and cinematic form, prophesizes that when human culture merges the print media with its audio-visual counterparts, the Earth will become a huge Kafkaesque prison formed by interconnected media. God's voiceand words will lose their uses and our language will no longer be legitimate.Naked Lunch gives us the apocalyptic warning that humans with our archaic culture will be stuck in an out-of-control state not unlike when a drug addict has to take his/her daily dose. We'll lose our ability to survive autonomously, our language will become superfluous like a piece of clothes or a shred of skin. We'll then become a living corpse! The only way is to find the way back, all the way from excretion to suction. Only the human that could stay sober among a toxic torrent of words can make it out alive, naked but shameless.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/coo/film02.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/coo/film02.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|2017年11月19日設映後座談會，粵語主講 講者：梁錦祥（資深傳媒人）、MC仁（音樂人）、 紀陶|Post-screening seminar with Leung Kam-cheung (Veteran Journalist), MC Yan (Musician) and Lam Kee-to in Cantonese on 19 Nov 2017|2734 2900|||2017-09-15 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86239_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86239_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-15 12:59:42.000

86248|《「神秘學電影」工作坊：第一節：神秘學電影旅遊指南》─ 影評人之選2017|"Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 1: A Traveller’s Guidebook to Cinema of Occultism" - Critics' Choice 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年11月12日 (日) 下午2:30至4:30|12 Nov 2017 (Sun), 2:30 pm - 4:30pm|120分鐘|120 min|73810020|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$90|$90|影迷要進入神秘學電影國度，先來索取一張附有地圖的入場證。主流類型電影每每以驗證科學、邏輯思維、先理性後感性的條件二元論，制度化地去重複 / 開拓創作。電影工業則在肯定—懷疑—否定—再定的模式下摸索，超驗性、或大膽假設的神秘經驗，只會有限度地被接納。如果，顯而易見的事物是能推算到的引力的話，神秘的東西則是微磁力，顯化為神秘學繽紛命題的影像：外星文明、巫術、次元旅行、上古神話傳說、野獸怪獸、新新物理、阿特蘭提斯、聖經時代、美索不達米亞時代、人極端行為、天使與魔鬼、天堂與地獄、夢空間、鍊金術、超驗心理、陰謀論、宗教 / 異教 / 邪教……或許從前衛電影的 Trance Film 去打開神秘之門，是上佳的心理準備；不單單去解密，也要成為神秘兮兮本身，一半清明一半迷醉，才若有所思，有所得著。|"Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 1: A Traveller’s Guidebook to Cinema of Occultism" - Critics' Choice 2017 (Speaker: Lam Kee-to, Bryan Chang)|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/coo/workshop.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/coo/workshop.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|粵語主講|Conducted in Chinese|2734 2900|||2017-09-15 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86248_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86248_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-15 02:41:28.000
86249|《「神秘學電影」工作坊：第二節：陰謀論與西方流行電影》─ 影評人之選2017|"Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 2: Conspiracy Theories in Western Popular Cinema" - Critics' Choice 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年12月2日 下午2:30至4:30|2 Dec 2017 (Sat), 2:30 pm - 4:30pm|120分鐘|120 min|73810020|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$90|$90|電影的誕生，是為了負起宣揚神秘學的命運。這話怎理解？換個說法吧：電影發明者中，不乏共濟會人，當中有人同流有人逆行；這是陰謀論的「知情人」（Insider）的解密角度。那麼從共濟會西歐的發源地一帶去找佐證，威瑪時期的《大都會》（Metropolis，1927）、《浮士德》（Faust，1926）你不會看漏眼吧，是時候在傳統分類裏，揣摩神秘學電影傘子下的陰謀論電影。陰謀論電影潮可以說是二十世紀六十年代的反制思潮激發，藉政治驚慄元素擴散。時間跳躍來到當下，目下所有超級英雄片都討論制度背後目的和操作，小至企業犯罪，中至新世界秩序建立，大至消滅地球，全是陰謀。陰謀論者利用流行影像洗人腦，你不可不識。|"Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 2: Conspiracy Theories in Western Popular Cinema " - Critics' Choice 2017 (Speaker: Lam Kee-to, Bryan Chang)|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/coo/workshop.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/coo/workshop.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|粵語主講|Conducted in Chinese|2734 2900|||2017-09-15 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86249_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86249_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-15 12:58:48.000
86250|《「神秘學電影」工作坊：第三節：時空光影內探》─ 影評人之選2017|"Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 3: Into Fascinating Spaces" - Critics' Choice 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年12月30日 (六), 下午2:30至4:30|30 Dec 2017 (Sat), 2:30 pm - 4:30pm|120分鐘|120 min|73810020|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$90|$90|電影是2維科藝，3維視覺，和＋3多維的想像，空間因着人的意識而建立，並且生長，而電影令種種視覺憧憬變成真實「存在」。早於美術特技不發達的黑白片時代，《西藏桃源》（Lost Horizon，1937）以大自然景色為香巴拉美境留下印記，自此一路走來，時間及空間的界域不斷以菲林於外在建設，並慢慢結合意識發展為內世界體現。《2001太空漫遊》結局的白室孤獨「自在」是里程碑。進入電腦特技年代，幾何的生命訊息體，到量子海的活宇宙空間感知，只在當代電影獨家放送。|"Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 3: Into Fascinating Spaces" - Critics' Choice 2017 (Speaker: Lam Kee-to, Bryan Chang, Leung kam-cheung)|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/coo/workshop.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/coo/workshop.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|粵語主講|Conducted in Chinese|2734 2900|||2017-09-15 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86250_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86250_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-15 12:56:03.000
86252|《「神秘學電影」工作坊：第四節：非西方神秘經驗》─ 影評人之選2017|"Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 4: Non-Western Mysticism" - Critics' Choice 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2018年1月14日 (日), 下午2:30至4:30|14 Jan 2018 (Sun), 2:30 pm - 4:30pm|120分鐘|120 min|73810020|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$90|$90|走出理性主義抬頭的西方，向東，也向南，來到亞洲諸土，亦可踏足人類發源地的非洲，處處是不一樣的秘境。日本的動畫電影順着科幻的腳印走，走出獨特新天地，幾時都在問：我們這個民族從哪裏來，又往哪裏去？伊朗片總在寫實與詩意之間發掘蘇菲（Sufi）魔術時刻。印度寶萊塢因歌舞之名，空間來去自如，說穿了還是謹守奉神之道。佛國的靈眼，泰國片看到隔世時空裏緣份交感。還有印尼片舞蹈之神、香港片奇武世俗，及非洲的巫靈文化……都是電影反映民族信仰，和地緣神秘命脈。|"Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 4: Non-Western Mysticism" - Critics' Choice 2017 (Speaker: Lam Kee-to, Bryan Chang, MC Yan)|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/coo/workshop.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/coo/workshop.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|粵語主講|Conducted in Chinese|2734 2900|||2017-09-15 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86252_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86252_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-15 12:55:21.000
86254|《「神秘學電影」工作坊：第五節：電影情報學》─ 影評人之選2017|"Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 5: Information Science in Cinema" - Critics' Choice 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2018年1月28日 (日), 下午2:30至4:30|28 Jan 2018 (Sun), 2:30 pm - 4:30pm|120分鐘|120 min|73810020|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$90|$90|情報學一詞源起於二次大戰時，目前最受日本民間學術界追捧，他們認為目前全球文明建基於謊言，需要自覺有系統地發展一套檢視世界的情報、編輯及推敲真相的日常工具。電影以象徵、符號、密碼去發言，神秘訊息並非無的放矢，是一個「被承認」的發放場。不要以為看着的是改編幾十年前的漫畫世界，其實充滿指向當下的情報，英國脫歐、特朗普當選，以至延續討論任何神秘學議題，有心人早發現了。「知情人」不會停步解釋，你要跟上來，建立你自己的分析網絡。影迷是不是神秘學迷都好，面紗總要自行掀起。|"Workshops on Cinema of Occultism: Session 5: Information Science in Cinema" - Critics' Choice 2017 (Speaker: Lam Kee-to, Bryan Chang)|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/coo/workshop.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/coo/workshop.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|粵語主講|Conducted in Chinese|2734 2900|||2017-09-15 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86254_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86254_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-15 12:49:11.000
86247|《靈光》─ 影評人之選2017|"Yeelen" - Critics' Choice 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2018年1月20日 (六) 下午2:30 及2018年1月21日 (日) 下午2:30|20 Jan 2018 (Sat) 2:30pm and 21 Jan 2018 (Sun) 2:30pm|105分鐘|105 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|影片一開始，權力薰心的西非大法師Soma宰羊祭天，誓言要殺死素未謀面的親兒子Nianankoro，帶着法力無邊的空睿之翼權杖和空龍令牌出發。Nianankoro唯有離開相依為命的母親，往遠方求助伯父，路途上幾番折騰墮入生死邊緣，憑着率性，加上水靈護身，天命成長發光發熱。蘇里曼薛斯將十三世紀馬里帝國的民間傳說，結合班巴拉族地的空莫秘社文化，探討人間永恆的父子情仇，亦以地水風火交集烘托循環於天地的神隱力。結局光有翼、兩蛋共息，寫照宇宙二元重生再來，散發非洲電影非線性敘事的獨特史詩魅力。|Yeelen begins with the wizard Soma making a sacrifice, vowing to kill his own son Nianankoro. Soma then sets off with his powerful Kore’s Wing and Kolonkalanni Tablet. To escape this father who has never met him, Nianankoro leaves his mother and seeks help from his uncle. Nianankoro has several dangerous moments but he overcomes them with his tenacity and the protection of the water spirit. Souleymane Cissé takes a 13th century Mali myth and infuses it with elements of the sectarian cultures of Bambaraand Komo. Yeelen is also about the eternal father-and-son struggle and the inexplicable power of the elements. Light becomes winged,the two eggs come to a rest and the universe is reborn. Yeelen is a mesmerizing example of the non-linearity of African cinema.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/coo/film06.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/coo/film06.html|||2018年1月20日設映後座談會，粵語主講講者：陸叔遠（資深電影美術指導）、張偉雄2018年1月21日設映後座談會，粵語主講講者：張偉雄|Post-screening seminar with Robert Loh (Veteran Art Director in Film) and Bryan Chang in Cantonese on 20 Jan 2018 andPost-screening seminar with Bryan Chang in Cantonese on 21 Jan 2018|2734 2900|||2017-09-15 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86247_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86247_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-15 12:50:21.000

82760|「戲偶人生」系列：煙蘋果劇團及狗鯊劇團（英國）聯合製作《細胞想旅行》|'From Puppets to Humans' Series: 'CELL', co-produced by Smoking Apples and Dogfish (United Kingdom)|inc4|inc4sc7|2017年11月10-11日 (五至六) 晚上8:002017年11月12日 (日) 下午3:00|10-11 Nov 2017 (Fri-Sat) 8:00pm12 Nov 2017 (Sun) 3:00pm|每場演出長約1小時，不設中場休息。|The running time of each performance is approximately 1 hour without intermission.|87410030|適合12歲或以上觀眾欣賞|Recommended for ages 12 and above|$220, $160|$220, $160|一個戲偶，一條魚，一種不治之症 — 人生最後的旅程。泰迪患有運動神經元病，身體活動能力不斷下降；他只能透過電子輔助說話系統與我們對話。泰迪現時需要靠輪椅出入，而且無法獨自行動，但他仍然記得以往的美好日子。有時他會記起一些零碎片段，包括第一次發病的情況：泰迪被確診後急不及待希望體驗自己舒適區以外的世界，並帶同寵物魚一同前往歐洲，走完生命的最後旅程。雖然身體狀況不斷轉壞，但泰迪仍然保持樂觀，而他與寵物魚的關係尤其感人。這部作品以栩栩如生的戲偶，訴說泰迪如何踏上最後一次歷險之旅，為自己積累足以回味一生的記憶。|One puppet, one fish, an incurable disease – the last trip of a lifetime.	Ted suffers from Motor Neurone Disease (MND) which causes his mobility to degenerate and he is talking to us through an electronic device. He is now bound to a wheelchair and cannot move by himself but he still remembers the good times. There is a flashback to the time when Ted experiences the first signs of MND.  When he is diagnosed with the disease, he rushes to experience the world outside his comfort zone and take a final trip to Europe with his pet fish.  The relationship between Ted and his pet fish is especially touching and Ted remains positive even his body is failing him.  The piece features life-like puppetry to tell one man’s final adventure to create enough memories to last a lifetime.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/tc/multi_arts/programs_287.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/en/multi_arts/programs_287.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|11月11日設演後藝人談（英語主講）本節目含少量英語，附中英文字幕|With post-performance talk on 11.11.2017 (Conducted in English)The programme contains some English with Chinese and English surtitles.|2268 7323|||2017-07-14 12:07:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P82760_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P82760_2.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P82760_4.jpg||||https://www.youtube.com/embed/6ztHMGoJGe0||Y|2017-09-14 02:24:28.000

74506|陶瓷茶具創作展覽2016|2016 Tea Ware by Hong Kong Potters|inc6|inc6sc1|2016年12月7日至2017年11月6日|7 Dec 2016 - 6 Nov 2017|不適用|Not Applicable|596|||免費入場|Free admission|茶具文物館自1986年開始舉辦「陶瓷茶具創作比賽」，藉此推動香港的陶瓷創作活動。多年來，這比賽造就了不少傑出陶藝家，每屆參賽人數迭有增長，成為香港陶藝界的重要活動。比賽迄今已是第十屆，今屆吸引了276位參加者，為歷屆之冠。是次「陶瓷茶具展覽2016」將展出93位本地陶藝家，合共116組精選陶瓷茶具創作，也是歷屆展出最多作品的展覽。|The Flagstaff House Museum of Tea Ware started the "Tea Ware by Hong Kong Potters Competition" for the first time in 1986 aiming to promote ceramic art in Hong Kong. Over the years, the Competition has witnessed a new generation of outstanding ceramic artists. The number of participants has shown a steady increase and it has become the signature competition in local ceramic art circle. This year's Competition is the tenth time and [...]|http://hk.art.museum/zh_TW/web/ma/mt-thematic-exhibition.html|http://hk.art.museum/en_US/web/ma/mt-thematic-exhibition.html||||||||||康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P74506_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P74506_2.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P74506_4.jpg||||||Y|2016-11-01 03:49:43.000

86323|2017社區文化大使計劃 - R&T (Rhythm & Tempo)「踢躂舞本土劇場『踏時空變奏』」巡迴演出|2017 Community Cultural Ambassador Scheme- R&T (Rhythm & Tempo) "Tappy Time Travel" Touring Performance|inc4|inc4sc13|11/11/2017(六) 中午12:00|11/11/2017(Sat) 12:00nn|1小時|1hr|7650|||免費入場，毋須門票。|Free admission. No ticket is required.|一屋兩代人，老一輩但求腳踏實地，年輕人卻要追逐夢想，磨擦愈來愈多。兩父子的感情就由一雙踢躂鞋來修補。故事簡介：阿當從小熱愛舞蹈，並立志成為一個專業舞者。父親阿強是地盤工人，快將六十歲，認為阿當畢業後一直懶懶散散，不務正業，父子隔閡日深。一場暴風雨，將阿當帶回1979年的香港，當時正值超強颱風襲港，阿當巧遇年青時的父親－阿強，當時阿強扭傷膝蓋，所以阿當帶他回家。在阿當尚在為自己回到以前而困惑時，卻發現原來他的父母都是跳舞高手，但為何阿強成為父親之後會拒絕自己學舞的請求呢？在回到過去之前，阿當從未想像过，原来父亲年轻时的生活环境是如此恶劣，阿当看到父亲一辈的默默耕耘，加上相处几天，阿当开始理解父亲往日对生活的种种不安，开始反思……||http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/ab/tc/ccas17_06.php|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/ab/en/ccas17_06.php|||||3996 8331 (蔡小姐)|||||康樂及文化處事務署(觀眾拓展)-藝術節及娛樂事務組-觀眾拓展辦事處主辦|Presented by Audience Building Office- AFE Section- LCSD|||||||||Y|2017-09-11 11:45:19.000

No ticket is required.|一屋兩代人，老一輩但求腳踏實地，年輕人卻要追逐夢想，磨擦愈來愈多。兩父子的感情就由一雙踢躂鞋來修補。故事簡介：阿當從小熱愛舞蹈，並立志成為一個專業舞者。父親阿強是地盤工人，快將六十歲，認為阿當畢業後一直懶懶散散，不務正業，父子隔閡日深。一場暴風雨，將阿當帶回1979年的香港，當時正值超強颱風襲港，阿當巧遇年青時的父親－阿強，當時阿強扭傷膝蓋，所以阿當帶他回家。在阿當尚在為自己回到以前而困惑時，卻發現原來他的父母都是跳舞高手，但為何阿強成為父親之後會拒絕自己學舞的請求呢？在回到過去之前，阿當從未想像过，原来父亲年轻时的生活环境是如此恶劣，阿当看到父亲一辈的默默耕耘，加上相处几天，阿当开始理解父亲往日对生活的种种不安，开始反思……||http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/ab/tc/ccas17_06.php|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/ab/en/ccas17_06.php|||||3996 8331 (蔡小姐)|||||康樂及文化處事務署(觀眾拓展)-藝術節及娛樂事務組-觀眾拓展辦事處主辦|Presented by Audience Building Office- AFE Section- LCSD|||||||||Y|2017-09-11 11:45:19.000

No ticket is required.|一屋兩代人，老一輩但求腳踏實地，年輕人卻要追逐夢想，磨擦愈來愈多。兩父子的感情就由一雙踢躂鞋來修補。故事簡介：阿當從小熱愛舞蹈，並立志成為一個專業舞者。父親阿強是地盤工人，快將六十歲，認為阿當畢業後一直懶懶散散，不務正業，父子隔閡日深。一場暴風雨，將阿當帶回1979年的香港，當時正值超強颱風襲港，阿當巧遇年青時的父親－阿強，當時阿強扭傷膝蓋，所以阿當帶他回家。在阿當尚在為自己回到以前而困惑時，卻發現原來他的父母都是跳舞高手，但為何阿強成為父親之後會拒絕自己學舞的請求呢？在回到過去之前，阿當從未想像过，原来父亲年轻时的生活环境是如此恶劣，阿当看到父亲一辈的默默耕耘，加上相处几天，阿当开始理解父亲往日对生活的种种不安，开始反思……||http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/ab/tc/ccas17_06.php|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/ab/en/ccas17_06.php|||||3996 8331 (蔡小姐)|||||康樂及文化處事務署(觀眾拓展)-藝術節及娛樂事務組-觀眾拓展辦事處主辦|Presented by Audience Building Office- AFE Section- LCSD|||||||||Y|2017-09-11 11:45:19.000

84032|2017社區文化大使計劃 - 竹韻小集「茶韻和風」社區音樂會《茶馬古道行》|2017 Community Cultural Ambassador Scheme- Windpipe Chinese Music Ensemble "The Rhymes of Tea" Community Concert|inc4|inc4sc13|2017年11月14日 (二) 晚上7時30分|14 November 2017 (Tue) 7:30pm|1小時 15分鐘|1hrs 15mins|7500|||憑票免費入場|Free Admission by Ticket|「茶馬古道」又稱「南方絲綢之路」，是一個從雲南普洱縣向外伸展的運輸網絡，其貿易的代表性商品是茶葉和馬匹，起源追溯至唐代，當時茶葉由雲南運到北京、西藏和其他東南亞國家。透過圖片投影與現場解說，把「茶馬古道」的歷史發展、民族分佈與音樂特色逐一介紹。除常見的中國樂器外，觀眾亦可欣賞到多種少數民族樂器。||http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/ab/en/ccas17_12.php|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/ab/en/ccas17_12.php|||||6507 7273||ensemble@hkwindpipe.org|||康樂及文化處事務署(觀眾拓展)-藝術節及娛樂事務組-觀眾拓展辦事處主辦|Presented by Audience Building Office- AFE Section- LCSD|||||||||Y|2017-07-17 12:32:00.000

84082|柏林愛樂樂團|Berliner Philharmoniker|inc4|inc4sc1|2017年11月10日 (五) 晚上8時|10 Nov 2017 （Fri）8pm|節目長約2小時，包括中場休息20分鐘。|The performance will run for 2 hours, including a 20 minute intermission.|50110014|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$2980, $2380, $1880, $1380, $980, $680|$2980, $2380, $1880, $1380, $980, $680|被譽為世界頂尖樂團之一的柏林愛樂樂團，將於香港演出兩場音樂會。在西蒙．歷圖爵士帶領下，柏林愛樂樂團在新時代保持朝氣與活力。樂團致力編排富創見與新穎的曲目，與德意志銀行攜手開展不同類型的外展教育計劃；並建設以柏林愛樂音樂廳為基地的數碼音樂廳，作網上串流廣播平台。歷圖爵士自二○○二年接任阿巴度成為樂團的總指揮，並計劃於二○一八年卸任。柏林愛樂樂團將於兩場音樂會帶來理察．史特勞斯、布拉姆斯、史達拉汶斯基與拉赫曼尼諾夫的大型管弦樂作品。鋼琴家郎朗將為第一場活力充沛的巴托《第二鋼琴協奏曲》擔任獨奏，而第二場樂團將演奏著名韓裔作曲家陳銀淑為樂團而創作的作品。|Acclaimed as one of the best orchestras in the world, the illustrious Berliner Philharmoniker will perform in Hong Kong for two concerts. Under the leadership of Sir Simon Rattle, the Orchestra ushers into an innovative era with vibrant concert programmes, wide-reaching education initiatives with their partner Deutsche Bank and a state-of-the-art Digital Concert Hall which streams concerts at Berlin’s Philharmonie to the internet.  Sir Simon is going to conclude his tenure as the Orchestra’s Chief Conductor in 2018, a position he has succeeded from Claudio Abbado since 2002. In the two concerts, the Berliner Philharmoniker will perform monumental symphonic works by Richard Strauss, Brahms, Stravinsky and Rachmaninov.  Lang Lang will perform Bartók‘s energetic second concerto on the first concert, on the second the Orchestra will perform a work composed by eminent Korean composer Unsuk Chin especially for the Orchestra.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/tc/music/programs_177.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/en/music/programs_177.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|於門票開售首天，每人每次限買10張門票。11月11日音樂會的觀眾如未能準時入座，須待中場休息方可進場。|Each patron can purchase up to 10 tickets per transaction on the first counter booking day.Latecomers attending the concert on 11 November will only be admitted during the intermission.|2268 7321|||2017-08-11 12:08:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P84082_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P84082_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-16 11:15:34.000

In the two concerts, the Berliner Philharmoniker will perform monumental symphonic works by Richard Strauss, Brahms, Stravinsky and Rachmaninov.  Lang Lang will perform Bartók‘s energetic second concerto on the first concert, on the second the Orchestra will perform a work composed by eminent Korean composer Unsuk Chin especially for the Orchestra.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/tc/music/programs_177.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/en/music/programs_177.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|於門票開售首天，每人每次限買10張門票。11月11日音樂會的觀眾如未能準時入座，須待中場休息方可進場。|Each patron can purchase up to 10 tickets per transaction on the first counter booking day.Latecomers attending the concert on 11 November will only be admitted during the intermission.|2268 7321|||2017-08-11 12:08:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P84084_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P84084_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-16 11:15:04.000
86234|柏林愛樂樂團 現場轉播|Berliner Philharmoniker Live Relays|inc4|inc4sc1|2017年11月10日 (五) 晚上8時2017年11月11日 (六) 下午5時|10 Nov 2017 （Fri）8pm11 Nov 2017 （Sat）5pm|節目長約2小時，包括中場休息20分鐘。|The performance will run for 2 hours, including a 20 minute intermission.|7003|||免費入場詳情容後公佈|Admission FreeDetails to be announced|被譽為世界頂尖樂團之一的柏林愛樂樂團，將於香港演出兩場音樂會。在西蒙．歷圖爵士帶領下，柏林愛樂樂團在新時代保持朝氣與活力。樂團致力編排富創見與新穎的曲目，與德意志銀行攜手開展不同類型的外展教育計劃；並建設以柏林愛樂音樂廳為基地的數碼音樂廳，作網上串流廣播平台。歷圖爵士自二○○二年接任阿巴度成為樂團的總指揮，並計劃於二○一八年卸任。柏林愛樂樂團將於兩場音樂會帶來理察．史特勞斯、布拉姆斯、史達拉汶斯基與拉赫曼尼諾夫的大型管弦樂作品。鋼琴家郎朗將為第一晚活力充沛的巴托《第二鋼琴協奏曲》擔任獨奏，而第二晚樂團將演奏著名韓裔作曲家陳銀淑為樂團而創作的作品。|Acclaimed as one of the best orchestras in the world, the illustrious Berliner Philharmoniker will perform in Hong Kong for two concerts. Under the leadership of Sir Simon Rattle, the Orchestra ushers into an innovative era with vibrant concert programmes, wide-reaching education initiatives with their partner Deutsche Bank and a state-of-the-art Digital Concert Hall which streams concerts at Berlin’s Philharmonie to the internet.  Sir Simon is going to conclude his tenure as the Orchestra’s Chief Conductor in 2018, a position he has succeeded from Claudio Abbado since 2002. In two evenings the Berliner Philharmoniker will perform monumental symphonic works by Richard Strauss, Brahms, Stravinsky and Rachmaninov.  Lang Lang will perform Bartók‘s energetic second concerto on the first evening, on the second the Orchestra will perform a work composed by eminent Korean composer Unsuk Chin especially for the Orchestra.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/tc/music/programs_177.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/en/music/programs_177.html|||||2268 7321|||||康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86234_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86234_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-14 04:28:18.000

80163|城市藝裳計劃：藝滿階梯|City Dress Up‧Blossoming Stairs|inc6|inc6sc1|2017年3月至12月|Mar - Dec 2017|不適用|Not Applicable|4421|||免費入場|Free admission|為慶祝香港特別行政區成立二十周年，又逢香港藝術館五十五周年紀念，本館特別推出「城市藝裳計劃：藝滿階梯」戶外藝術項目，以館藏花卉內容的作品，配合四季主題，為各區的階梯穿上花裝。作品涵蓋古今中外，既有傳統國畫大師作品，亦有十九世紀的歷史繪畫；更包羅當代作品，又有紡織品、漆器和竹器等文物。此外，更會每月於不同地區舉行各種教育活動，希望透過階梯的展出和配套活動，使大家在日常生活中亦能感受藝術與自然的趣味。|The outdoor art project decorating staircases in various districts with motifs of flowers sourced from the Museum’s collection. Our selection spans a great variety of works, including traditional Chinese paintings; historical pictures from the 19th century; contemporary art pieces; antiquities covering textiles; lacquer ware and bamboo carvings. With exhibition of the dress-up staircases, and educational activities held in different districts, you are welcome [...]|http://blossomingstairs.hk/tc/overview/|http://blossomingstairs.hk/overview/||||||||||康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P80163_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P80163_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-04-05 04:44:51.000

Our selection spans a great variety of works, including traditional Chinese paintings; historical pictures from the 19th century; contemporary art pieces; antiquities covering textiles; lacquer ware and bamboo carvings. With exhibition of the dress-up staircases, and educational activities held in different districts, you are welcome [...]|http://blossomingstairs.hk/tc/overview/|http://blossomingstairs.hk/overview/||||||||||康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P80164_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P80164_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-04-05 04:45:45.000
80170|城市藝裳計劃：藝滿階梯|City Dress Up‧Blossoming Stairs|inc6|inc6sc1|2017年3月至12月|Mar - Dec 2017|不適用|Not Applicable|7749|||免費入場|Free admission|為慶祝香港特別行政區成立二十周年，又逢香港藝術館五十五周年紀念，本館特別推出「城市藝裳計劃：藝滿階梯」戶外藝術項目，以館藏花卉內容的作品，配合四季主題，為各區的階梯穿上花裝。作品涵蓋古今中外，既有傳統國畫大師作品，亦有十九世紀的歷史繪畫；更包羅當代作品，又有紡織品、漆器和竹器等文物。此外，更會每月於不同地區舉行各種教育活動，希望透過階梯的展出和配套活動，使大家在日常生活中亦能感受藝術與自然的趣味。|The outdoor art project decorating staircases in various districts with motifs of flowers sourced from the Museum’s collection. Our selection spans a great variety of works, including traditional Chinese paintings; historical pictures from the 19th century; contemporary art pieces; antiquities covering textiles; lacquer ware and bamboo carvings. With exhibition of the dress-up staircases, and educational activities held in different districts, you are welcome [...]|http://blossomingstairs.hk/tc/overview/|http://blossomingstairs.hk/overview/||||||||||康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P80170_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P80170_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-04-05 04:46:19.000

80190|城市藝裳計劃：藝滿階梯|City Dress Up‧Blossoming Stairs|inc6|inc6sc1|2017年3月至12月|Mar - Dec 2017|不適用|Not Applicable|7373|||免費入場|Free admission|為慶祝香港特別行政區成立二十周年，又逢香港藝術館五十五周年紀念，本館特別推出「城市藝裳計劃：藝滿階梯」戶外藝術項目，以館藏花卉內容的作品，配合四季主題，為各區的階梯穿上花裝。作品涵蓋古今中外，既有傳統國畫大師作品，亦有十九世紀的歷史繪畫；更包羅當代作品，又有紡織品、漆器和竹器等文物。此外，更會每月於不同地區舉行各種教育活動，希望透過階梯的展出和配套活動，使大家在日常生活中亦能感受藝術與自然的趣味。|The outdoor art project decorating staircases in various districts with motifs of flowers sourced from the Museum’s collection. Our selection spans a great variety of works, including traditional Chinese paintings; historical pictures from the 19th century; contemporary art pieces; antiquities covering textiles; lacquer ware and bamboo carvings. With exhibition of the dress-up staircases, and educational activities held in different districts, you are welcome [...]|http://blossomingstairs.hk/tc/overview/|http://blossomingstairs.hk/overview/||||||||||康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P80190_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P80190_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-04-05 06:27:30.000

84281|英語經典遊蹤 2017：《紅花俠》(公開場)|Classics for Juniors 2017: The Scarlet Pimpernel (Public Performance)|inc4|inc4sc6|2017年10月14至15日 (六至日) 下午2:30|14-15 Oct 2017 (Sat-Sun) 2:30pm|不適用|Not Applicable|87710034|只限3歲或以上人士|Only for age 3 or above|$230+, $200, $150 (+連20分鐘舞臺導賞，名額有限，先到先得)|$230+, $200, $150 (+Including 20-min post-show stage tour, quota applies)|《紅花俠》的歷險故事發生在1789年的法國大革命。主角「紅花俠」是一位行俠仗義的劍客，到處扶助弱少，卻遇上強敵法國政府專政代表修弗蘭。著名演員瑪格麗嫁了給名流帕 西‧布拉肯尼後，雙雙跌下修弗蘭的陷阱，被迫協助他捉拿臭名遠播的紅花俠。可是，紅花俠每次都搶先一步，並在犯罪現場留下一朵紅花調侃嘲弄。棋逢敵手，修弗蘭最後會否 成功緝拿紅花俠？邀請您加入我們，在這經典故事的話劇版本中尋找答案！	為兒童而設的英語話劇下午一時半開始及演出後設大堂趣味活動：面具製作、角色扮演拍照、紙偶製作	導演：黃清霞博士改編：Michael Sharmon|'The Scarlet Pimpernel' is an adventure set during the French Revolution in 1789. The title character is a brave swordsman who works to help the poor and innocent people of France, but the Pimpernel has an enemy named Chauvelin. Chauvelin is a cruel representative of the French Government. Marguerite, a famous actress, is married to the well-to-do socialite, Sir Percy Blakeney. They get caught up in Chauvelin's plan to catch the infamous Pimpernel. However, the Pimpernel is always one step ahead, laughing at Chauvelin by leaving a simple flower, a scarlet pimpernel, at the scene of every crime. Will Chauvelin finally be able to bring the Pimpernel to justice? Come and join us for another classic tale to find out!	English Theatre for ChildrenJoin us from 1:30pm or after the performance for Foyer Fun Activities----Mask making, Photo play &amp; Paper puppet! 86266|劇場工作室《漂流溪澗》|Drama Gallery - "Drifting"|inc4|inc4sc6|2017年11月10日至12日 (星期五至日) 晚上8:002017年11月11日至12日 (星期六至日) 下午3:00|10-12 Nov 2017 (Fri-Sun) 8pm11-12 Nov 2017 (Sat-Sun) 3pm|節目全長約1小時30分鐘，不設中場休息。|The running time of the performance is approximately 1 hour 30 minutes without intermission.|36310036|||$180|$180|粵語演出	我們以為漂流在溪澗，卻不知道溪澗在漂流。意念、矛盾、變化，溪澗中迸發！	世界知名的投資者Jew，正打算回到自己的家鄉大展拳腳；赫然發現媽媽Maggie已經被商人Huge說服搬離家鄉，到了一個投資環境更好的地方居住，一向思鄉的Jew接受不了家鄉的突然轉變，一直在海外猶疑不決，只在家鄉的周邊地方遊走，足跡約隱約現，感受家鄉與自己內心的連繫。他的行為導致Huge十分焦急，因為Jew手持的巨額資金，隨時影響那個新家鄉的未來，亦影響Huge的個人大計；於是派人四出打探游說，但不得要領。最後Maggie在遠方的溪澗中找到Jew，Jew在溪澗中一邊洗腳一邊跟媽媽說著家鄉的老故事，媽媽的激辯卻引起溪水迴盪四濺，一時間，「家鄉」二字被濺得模糊不清……或許，有些人想把「家鄉」二字重新定義。 &nbsp;編劇／導演：余翰廷 演員：廖淑芬、梁浩邦、陳湛文、林子傑、胡俊謙、李灝泓 佈景／服裝設計：章佩佩 音響設計：梁寶榮燈光設計：趙靜怡|In Cantonese	Playwright / Director: Yu Hon-tingCast: Gladys Liu, Ho-bong Leung, Peter Chan, Ronald Lam, Chun-him Wu, Tony LiSet / Costume Designer: Cheung Pui-pui, GorettiSound Designer: Leung Po-wingLighting Designer: Chiu Ching-yi			Please refer to Chinese version for the synopsis|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/tc/theatre/programs_364.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/en/theatre/programs_364.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|遲到者須待節目適當時候方可進場。|Latecomers will only be admitted at a suitable break during the programme.|2372 9005|||2017-09-22 12:09:00.000|N|劇場工作室主辦<br>鳴謝：康樂及文化事務署|Presented by Drama Gallery<br> Acknowledgement: Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86266_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86266_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-22 03:21:06.000

86719|「耆年健康匯東區」精神健康繪畫及口號創作得獎作品展覽   (展板由耆康會東區長者地區中心提供)|Exhibition on Winning Entries of Drawing and Slogan Writing Competition on Elderly Mental Health(Display panels provided by SAGE Eastern District Elderly Community Centre)|inc7|inc7sc3|16-30/10/2017|16-30/10/2017|不適用|Not Applicable|4662|||||||http://www.hkpl.gov.hk/tc/extension-activities/all-events/search?lib_id=988|http://www.hkpl.gov.hk/en/extension-activities/all-events/search?lib_id=988|||||3427 3072||sswpl@lscd.gov.hk|||康樂及文化事務署‧香港公共圖書館主辦|Presented by Hong Kong Public Libraries (LCSD)|||||||||Y|2017-09-29 09:47:59.000
85152|當代舞體驗講座系列 舞蹈解碼|Experiential Lecture Series on Contemporary Dance - Decoding|inc4|inc4sc3|2017年11月1-8日 (每逢星期三) 晚上7:152017年11月13日 (一) 晚上7:15|1-8 Nov 2017 (every Wed) 7:15pm13 Nov 2017 (Mon) 7:15pm|2小時15分鐘|2 hours and 15 mins|50110945|歡迎年滿6歲的觀眾入場。|Audiences aged 6 and above are welcome.|$50|$50|講者王廷琳張秀梅	客席講者 徐奕婕陳敏兒	粵語主講	要為舞蹈解碼，我們可以從創作的源頭開始，了解構成舞蹈的元素，最基本包括音樂、動作、空間運用等，這都是引領觀眾欣賞及解構舞蹈的基本工具。是次講座系列將分為兩部分，第一部分將透過編舞家現身說法，探討舞蹈創作的過程，窺探編舞家在舞蹈編創背後的理念與構思。第二部分則以互動環節及觀賞錄像的形式進行，讓編舞家與參加者一起探討當代舞蹈的特質。	是次講座系列將由王廷琳及張秀梅兩位資深的舞蹈學者主講。王廷琳畢業於香港演藝學院，主修芭蕾舞。一九九○年畢業後，隨即加入香港芭蕾舞團，一九九一年應邀加入城市當代舞蹈團，一九九四年獲亞洲文化協會何鴻燊獎學金赴美國研習現代舞，在美國各地進行教學及演出等文化交流活動，一九九五年回港後，與梁家權、黃茹重組動藝，致力發展現代舞及推廣舞蹈教育。張秀梅則為香港演藝學院前任舞蹈系講師，教學範疇包括身體覺知導引及訓練，舞蹈藝術學士（榮譽）學位及碩士課程的舞蹈教育課程，並負責開發外展項目及擔任研究生的顧問導師。兩位講者對舞蹈的專業、經驗與熱誠，定能增加參與者對當代舞蹈的認識，提高他們對賞舞的興趣。	第一節 如何看《睡蓮》? (2017年9月6日)講者：王廷琳、徐奕婕	第二節 《別 離別》的緣來緣去&nbsp; (2017年9月13日)講者：王廷琳、張秀梅、呂以輝	第三節 《剝花生與花生騷》(2017年9月20日)講者：張秀梅、陳敏兒	第四節&nbsp;&nbsp; 阿隆佐·金舞蹈團 （美國） Alonzo King LINES Ballet&nbsp; (USA)&nbsp;&nbsp; (2017年9月27日)講者：王廷琳、張秀梅	第五節及第六節 荷蘭舞蹈劇場&nbsp; Nederlands Dans Theater (NDT)&nbsp;&nbsp; (2017年11月1日及8日)講者：王廷琳、張秀梅	第七節&nbsp;&nbsp; 克利絲桃．派特 Cystal Pite&nbsp;&nbsp; (2017年11月13日)講者：王廷琳、張秀梅	第八節&nbsp;&nbsp; 跳舞 / 編舞 / 說舞人的真我對話&nbsp; (2017年11月22日)講者：王廷琳、張秀梅|SpeakersAndy WongVanessa Cheung		Guest SpeakersIvy TsuiAbby Chan		(Conducted in Cantonese)		We can decode a dance piece by looking into a few basic elements of composition, such as music, movement and spatial relationships.&nbsp; These are in fact the basic tools to help audiences to appreciate dance.&nbsp; This lecture and workshop series will be divided into two parts.&nbsp; In part one, we will look into the creative process, venture into the mind of a choreographer and to decipher how a dance piece is being put together.&nbsp; In part two, we will investigate the nature of dance through interactive activities, video viewing and discussion with choreographers.	Session 1: How to appreciate 'Water Lilies'?&nbsp; (6.9.2017)&nbsp;Speakers: Andy Wong, Ivy Tsui	Session 2: 'Separating From Separation' by DancingAngels (13.9.2017)&nbsp;Speakers: Andy Wong,&nbsp; Vanessa Cheung, Frankie Lui	Session 3: Running on the 'Cattle Runway' by Abby Chan (20.9.2017)&nbsp;Speakers: Vanessa Cheung, Abby Chan	Session 4: Alonzo King LINES Ballet (USA)&nbsp; (27.9.2017)&nbsp;Speakers: Andy Wong,&nbsp; Vanessa Cheung	Session 5 &amp; 6: Nederlands Dans Theater (NDT) (1 &amp; 8.11.2017)&nbsp;Speakers: Andy Wong,&nbsp; Vanessa Cheung	Session 7: Crystal Pite (13.11.2017)&nbsp;Speakers: Andy Wong,&nbsp; Vanessa Cheung	Session 8: Genuine dialogues among the dancers, choreographers and narrators&nbsp; (22.11.2017)&nbsp;Speakers: Andy Wong,&nbsp; Vanessa Cheung|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/programmes/programmeslist/culture/searchcprogdetails.php?id=85152|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/programmes/programmeslist/culture/searchcprogdetails.php?id=85152|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2268 7323||||Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85152_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85152_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-15 11:48:33.000

Details at  www.festivekorea.com|韓國室內樂團成立於1965年，是韓國室內音樂的翹楚亦是歷史最悠久的樂團之一。在現任音樂總監金旻的帶領下，樂團迄今於世界各地舉行逾600場音樂會，獲得讚譽不斷，最精彩的包括巴黎舉行的聯合國教科文組織和平音樂會、於倫敦伊麗莎白女王音樂廳、柏林音樂廳、莫斯科柴可夫斯基音樂學院大會堂、維也納音樂協會金色大廳合等舉行四次音樂會，好評如潮。韓國室內樂團與亞洲最具才華、現任巴塞爾交響樂團首席小提琴的韓國小提琴家尹昭永及獲獎無數的香港年輕雙簧管演奏家鄭智元攜手於韓國十月文化節開幕音樂會將為香港觀眾送上最美樂聲。|Founded in 1965 in Seoul, the Korean Chamber Orchestra has established itself as one of the leading chamber orchestras and has given over 600 concerts inside and outside of the country, of which highlights include the UNESCO Concert for Peace in Paris and the “UN Staff Day Concert” in New York where it was appointed the official UN Chamber Orchestra for Peace.  The Orchestra performed concerts at the Queen Elizabeth Hall in London, Konzerthaus in Berlin, Tchaikovsky conservatory of Great hall in Moscow and Musikverein in Vienna total four times.  Led by its Music Director Min Kim, Korean Chamber Orchestra will join hand with leader of the Basel Symphony Orchestra Korean talented violinist Soyoung Yoon and award-winning Hong Kong oboist Chi-Yuen Cheng to bring Hong Kong audiences the most graceful music in the festival opening.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/programmes/programmeslist/culture/searchcprogdetails.php?id=86162|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/programmes/programmeslist/culture/searchcprogdetails.php?id=86162|||節目查詢:admin@festivekorea.com|Enquiry: admin@festivekorea.com||||||大韓民國駐香港總領事館及韓國室內樂團主辦；鳴謝：康樂及文化事務署|Presented by Consulate General of the Republic of Korea in Hong Kong and Korean Chamber Orchestra; Acknowledgement: Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86162_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86162_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-27 04:25:53.000

81301|香港製造|Made In Hong Kong|inc6|inc6sc1|現在|From now onwards|不適用|Not Applicable|7472|||免費入場|Free admission|是次展覽逾百件的文物精選自香港歷史博物館館藏，當中不乏秉承傳統、家喻戶曉的百年老店產品，也包含隨工業起飛應運而生的各類產品，讓觀眾回顧香港製造業的輝煌日子，並體現港人靈活變通、因時制宜的創新精神。|Selected from the collection of the Hong Kong Museum of History and showcasing over a hundred collections including traditional, century-old branded products as well as various products manufactured during the industry-boom, the "Made in Hong Kong" exhibition aims to illustrate the heyday of the Hong Kong manufacturing industries in retrospect and manifest the flexibility, adaptability and creativity of the local people.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/Museum/Conservation/zh_TW/web/co/exhibition/airport/exh_made_in_hk.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/Museum/Conservation/en_US/web/co/exhibition/airport/exh_made_in_hk.html||||||||||康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P81301_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P81301_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-05-05 12:51:23.000

85116|「劇場‧再遇」系列：影話戲《看著你……》（重演）|Re-run Run Shows: Cinematic Theatre - “Watching U...” (Re-run)|inc4|inc4sc6|2017年10月20-21日（五至六）晚上8時2017年10月21-22日（六至日）下午3時|20-21 Oct 2017 (Fri-Sat) 8:00pm21-22 Oct 2017 (Sat-Sun) 3:00pm|全長約1小時30分鐘，不設中場休息。|Running time is about 1 hour 30 minutes without intermission.|36310036|不適合12歲或以下人士欣賞。|Not suitable for ages 12 or below.|$250, $220|$250, $220|粵語演出他說：看著你，我不能心跳。她說：看著你，我不由自己。男的說要遠行，放眼世界；女的說要逃離，放空身心。遠行前，他把村屋租給素未謀面的她；她獨行在沮喪混亂的路上，隨意踏進這陌生男子的家。二人擦身而過，卻因一個突如其來的決定，令他無意間闖進她的生命，迫使二人面對一個未知的自己，更驟覺迷失在真相假象之中，真真假假，最真實的，可能就是這一剎那⋯⋯《看著你……》獨特巧妙的影像運用，跳脫於常見的觀劇框架，曾於2017年2月參加日本橫濱表演藝術節（TPAM）， 獲得極大迴響。導演：羅靜雯編劇：龐士榤、羅靜雯主演：李俊良、陳婉婷|In Cantonese	HE: Watchingyou, with my heartbeat on hold.SHE: Watchingyou, with a wild soul.	HE planned totravel for broadening his horizons; SHE planned to escape from the reality.	She rented hishome and got into the space with frustration and chaos.&nbsp; An unexpected change forced the two hearts tomeet themselves in deeper levels. &nbsp;Is there a true reality?&nbsp; Oreverything is merely a fantasy? &nbsp;Perhaps,the only true thing was the spark…	“Watching You…”stands out from the traditions of drama presentation by its fantastic videocreation. &nbsp;The drama was presented in “Performing Artsmeeting in Yokohama 2017”.&nbsp; An overwhelmingpositive response was received.	Director: Ching-manLoPlaywrights: EricPong, Ching-man Lo Leading Actors:Hugo Lee, Hebe Chan|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/tc/theatre/programs_317.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/en/theatre/programs_317.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|遲到者須待節目適當時候方可進場。|Latecomers will only be admitted at a suitable break during the programme.|2567 5888||info@cmtheatre.com|2017-08-25 12:08:00.000|Y|影話戲主辦<br>鳴謝：康樂及文化事務署|Presented by Cinematic Theatre<br>Acknowledgement：Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85116_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85116_2.png|||||||Y|2017-08-18 02:47:13.000
85385|「劇場‧再遇」系列：7A班戲劇組音樂劇《失戀，我們分手吧！》|Re-run Run Shows: Class 7A Drama Group – Musical "Love to Forget Rerun"|inc4|inc4sc6|2017年11月23月至25日 (星期四至六) 晚上7:452017年11月25日至26日 (星期六至日) 下午2:30|23-25 Nov 2017 (Thur-Sat) 7:45pm25-26 Nov 2017 (Sat-Sun) 2:30pm|演出全長約3小時，包括一節中場休息。|The running time of the performance is approximately 3 hours including one intermission.|87810042|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$280, $190|$280, $190|粵語音樂劇附設英語字幕嬉笑怒罵，笑談失戀，虔誠唔係大晒！失戀，除了「日喊夜喊」，過程還可以相當「抵死」！某個他失戀後「逢人必溝」、失戀港女在Facebook假扮單身生活過得精彩、另一個就一廂情願以為虔誠情深就有回報……幾個失戀同路人互相嘲笑，甚至五十步笑百步，以嬉笑怒罵方式唱盡失戀時的荒唐行為！幾個「因為某人而未能正常生活」（簡稱「失戀」）的人，成立了一個分享互助小組，希望互相扶持一起對付「失戀」這個大魔頭。然而，當他們逐一走過了「天天下雨」的日子之後，竟然發現原來自己之前的行為，相當「抵死」和「抵死」（兩個「抵死」分別指「自找」和「惹笑」）！編劇／導演／填詞：一　休作曲及音樂總監／填詞／演出：徐偉賢（第25屆香港舞台劇獎最佳原創曲詞）演員：陳健豪、黃嘉威、楊麗詩、梁依倩、謝冰盈歌唱指導：李頴康聯合舞台設計：徐碩朋聯合舞台設計／服裝設計：溫俊詩燈光設計：陳佩儀音響設計：黎智勇編舞：翁麗華英語字幕翻譯：鍾燕詩|Musical in Cantonese with English surtitleHealing Musical with Best Original Music and Lyrics (25th Hong Kong Drama Awards)&nbsp;A few broken-hearted persons are gathered in a support group. Except crying day and night, they have decided to heal each other in different ways! One decides to flirt with each of the rest of the group, one considers Facebook a battlefield of love… Teasing, supporting and singing with the each other, they are slowly overcoming the downs. As they look back after moving on, we are going to realize all the silly or even ridiculous things they have done after a break up!Playwright/Director/Lyrics：Yatyau (Leung Shing Him)Composer/Musical Director/Lyrics/Performer：Peco ChuiPerformers：Angus Chan, Wong Ka Wai, Jessie Yeung, Artemis Leung, Samantha TseSinging Coach：Li Wing HongCo-Set Design：Allan TsuiCo-Set Design /Costume / Image Design：Mable WunLight Design： Claudia ChanSound Design：Martin LaiChoreographer：Yung Lai Wah|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/tc/theatre/program_354.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/en/theatre/program_354.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|遲到者須待適當時候方可進場。11月25日下午2時30分的演出為「通達專場」，設有粵語口述影像，詳情請致電2777 1771與香港展能藝術會聯絡。|Latecomers will only be admitted at a suitable break.Accessible performance with audio description in Cantonese on 25 Nov, 2:30pm. Please contact Arts with the Disabled Association Hong Kong at 2777 1771 for details.|8102 3768|||2017-09-01 12:09:00.000|Y|7A班戲劇組主辦<br>鳴謝：康樂及文化事務署|Presented by Class 7A Drama Group<br>Acknowledgement: Leisure and Cultural Services Department|||||||||Y|2017-08-29 04:30:39.000
86541|「劇場‧再遇」系列：一條褲製作《父子母女一場……》(重演)|Re-run Run Shows: Pants Theatre Production - “My Dad, My Mom, My Son and My Daughter … “(Re-run)|inc4|inc4sc6|2017年12月8-10日 (五至日) 晚上8時2017年12月9-10日 (六至日) 下午3時|8-9.12.2017 (Fri-Sat) 8pm9-10.12.2017 (Sat-Sun) 3pm|節目全長約2小時30分鐘，包括中場休息15分鐘。|Running time is about 2 hours and 30 minutes including a 15-minute intermission.|36310036|||$220|$220|粵語演出父母子女，一場緣份，兩種關連。母女父子的關係，既尋常又充滿戲劇性，兩齣原創短劇同台探討當中微妙人情。《目送背影》今天香港，不少中年女性應付工作所需，終日奔波勞碌，又要兼顧婚姻及子女，還要照顧年邁父母，萬一父母身心出現問題，對她們來說，實在是多面受壓，可是她們的處境心聲往往不易表露。劇壇新晉龍偉潔以自己身為母親及女兒的親身經驗出發，加上親友經歷及其他真實故事，轉化成一齣三代母女的獨腳戲，伍潔茵獨挑大樑，演盡老中青三代女兒。編劇：龍偉潔 導演：胡海輝 演出：伍潔茵《我的父親・我的兒子》有其父是否必有其子？建基於劇團專注發展的人種誌劇場，對兒子及父親進行深度訪談，收集真實材料，由新晉獲獎編劇鄭廸琪編撰成文本，四位年輕演員誠摯演繹，探討此時此地的父子關係。編劇：鄭廸琪 導演：鄭傳軍# 演出：郭小杰、麥智樂、翁煒桐、嚴鉅乾#承蒙香演藝學院批准參與演出藝術總監：胡海輝佈景及服裝設計：孫詠君 燈光設計：張素宜 音樂及音響設計：何子洋錄像設計：方譯聲有關詳情請參閱主辦機構之網站：www.pants.org.hk|In CantoneseThe relationship between parents and children is not only most common but also most complicated. These two original one-act plays explore the drama of this intricate relationship.Farewell to the Receding ShadowNowadays in Hong Kong, most women are torn between their work and her family.  In the family, they have to take care of both their children and their parents, in addition to their husbands.  They are pressed to make both ends meet but there is seldom a change to vent their feeling.  Drawing from her own experiences as mother and daughter, and other true stories, new playwright Lung Wai-kit creates a touching solo drama about three generations of mothers and daughters, performed by Cecilia Ng.Playwright: Lung Wai-kit Director: Wu Hoi-faiPerformer: Cecilia NgFantasia on Fathers and SonsIs it really like father, like son?  This new documentary and ethnotheatre play captures real materials from interviews with fathers and sons, which are then transformed by award-winning playwright Callas Cheang to explore the multifaceted relationship between father and son.Playwright: Callas Cheang Director: Terence Chang#Performers: Kwok Siu-kit, Mak Chi Lok, Yung Wai-tung, Yim Kui-kin#With kind permission of the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts&nbsp;Artistic Director: Wu Hoi-faiSet and Costume Designer: Vanessa Suen Lighting Designer: Zoe CheungSound Designer and Composer: Jacklam HoVideo Designer: Acid FongFor details, please refer to the website of the presenter: www.pants.org.hk|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/programmes/programmeslist/culture/searchcprogdetails.php?id=86541|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/programmes/programmeslist/culture/searchcprogdetails.php?id=86541|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|遲到者須待中場休息或適當時候方可進場。|Latecomers will only be admitted during the intermission or at a suitable break.|2419 9006|||2017-10-03 12:10:00.000|Y|一條褲製作主辦<br>鳴謝：康樂及文化事務署|Presented by Pants Theatre Production<br>Acknowledgement: Leisure and Cultural Services Department|||||||||Y|2017-09-27 10:17:37.000

86163|首爾愛樂樂團音樂會|Seoul Philharmonic Orchestra Concert|inc4|inc4sc1|2017年10月26日 晚上8時|26 OCT 2017 8:00PM|不適用|Not Applicable|50110014|||$580, $380, $280, $180|$580, $380, $280, $180|首爾愛樂樂團於過去七十一年一直致力令韓國及全球人民的文化生活更豐富多彩。媒體更將其演出容為「節奏美妙、觸動人心」。今年韓國十月文化節，樂團首席客席指揮蒂埃里．費雪將帶領樂團演奏馬勒的《葬禮》和柴可夫斯基的《第五交響曲》。而國際知名韓國小提琴家金秀妍將夥拍香港管弦樂團首席中提琴凌顯祐，合奏布魯赫的《雙協奏曲》。蒂埃里．費雪曾帶領猶他州交響樂圑、名古屋愛樂交響樂團及英國廣播公司威爾士國立交響樂團，備受國際認可。韓國小提琴家金水然曾與庫特．馬舒爾及伊利亞胡．殷巴爾等享譽國際的指揮家合作，並以獨奏者身份參與知名樂團的演出，例如不來梅德意志室內愛樂樂團及巴伐利亞室內愛樂管弦樂團等。凌顯祐是土生土長的香港音樂家，現為香港管弦樂團首席中提琴。他亦曾與香港中樂團及中國廣播愛樂合作，並分別在香港、北美及和歐洲舉行獨奏會。代表韓國的文化之城，首爾愛樂樂團音樂會是本年韓國十月文化節焦點節目，並為慶祝香港特別行政區成立二十周年特別活動之一。|Seoul Philharmonic Orchestra has played a central role in enriching the cultural lives of Korean citizens as well as people around the world for the past 71 years.  Their performance was acclaimed to be “beautifully paced and deeply moving” by influential media.  In this Festive Korea, principal guest conductor Thierry Fischer conducts Mahler’s Totenfeier and Tchaikovsky’s Symphony No.5, and with the internationally acclaimed violinist Suyoen Kim and Andrew Ling, the principal viola from Hong Kong Philharmonic Orchestra, to perform Bruch’s Double Concerto.Having led the Utah Symphony, the Nagoya Philharmonic and the BBC National Orchestra of Wales, Thierry Fischer is most renowned for his creative programming, critically acclaimed performances and recordings.  Award-winning violinist Suyoen Kim has performed with internationally acclaimed conductors such as Kurt Masur and Eliahu Inbal and appeared as a soloist with renowned orchestras such as Deutsche Kammerphilharmonic Bremen and Bayerische Kammerphilharmonie.  Andrew Ling is a native of Hong Kong and currently the principal viola of the Hong Kong Philharmonic Orchestra.  He has also collaborated with the Hong Kong Chinese Orchestra and the China Film Philharmonic Orchestra, and has given recitals in Hong Kong, the North America and Europe.  Representing Seoul, the cultural city of Korea, the concert by Seoul Philharmonic Orchestra is one of the celebration events of the 20th Anniversary of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/programmes/programmeslist/culture/searchcprogdetails.php?id=86163|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/programmes/programmeslist/culture/searchcprogdetails.php?id=86163|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|節目查詢:admin@festivekorea.com|Enquiry: admin@festivekorea.com|3852 4355||||Y|大韓民國駐香港總領事館及首爾愛樂樂團主辦；鳴謝：康樂及文化事務署|Presented by Consulate General of the Republic of Korea in Hong Kong and Seoul Philharmonic Orchestra; Acknowledgement: Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86163_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86163_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-27 04:23:59.000

81416|天象節目《夢幻極光》|Sky Show "KAGAYA's Aurora"|inc6|inc6sc4|2017年5月1日 - 2017年10月30日|1 May 2017 - 30 Oct 2017|27 分鐘|27 min|73810021|||$32, $24|$32, $24|天象節目《夢幻極光》利用縮時攝影捕捉極光的千姿百態，再重現在球幕之上。電腦動畫清楚展示極光產生的機制；再配合冰川航拍片段、壯麗的極地影像和優美的新世紀音樂，讓觀眾暫時忘卻繁囂，融入天地之間，享受球幕下獨有的極光體驗。|In the Sky Show "KAGAYA's Aurora", different auroras captured by time-lapse photography are recreated under the dome. The mechanism of the formation of an aurora is also vividly illustrated by using computer graphics. With aerial shots of glaciers, grand images of the Arctic and melodious New Age Music, audience can step out of their busy lives for a while, connect themselves to nature and experience the aurora in a unique, planetarium way.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/Museum/Space/zh_TW/web/spm/spacetheatre/skyshow.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/Museum/Space/en_US/web/spm/spacetheatre/skyshow.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|平日：下午3時50分及7時20分星期六、日及公眾假期：下午12時20分、3時50分及7時20分(星期一及四晚上7時20分場次為英語旁述)|Weekdays: 3:50pm and 7:20pmSat, Sun and public holidays: 12:20pm, 3:50pm and 7:20pm(Mon and Thu  7:20pm shows are in English narration)|2721 0226||||N|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P81416_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P81416_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-05-11 02:52:22.000

Through the investigation of these preserved bodies, visitors can discover new information about each mummy, from their state of health to how they were preserved and mummified, and gain a unique insight into lives of ancient Egyptian. In addition, the Science Museum will produce a number of interactive exhibits and multimedia programmes to supplement the exhibition.|http://hk.science.museum/zh_TW/web/scm/se/se.html|http://hk.science.museum/en_US/web/scm/se/se.html|||星期一至三、五上午10時至晚上7時星期六、日及公眾假期上午10時至晚上9時逢星期四休館(公眾假期除外)|10am - 7pm on Mon to Wed, Fri 10am - 9pm on Sat, Sun and public holidays Closed on Thu (except public holidays)||||||康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P81645_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P81645_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-05-26 05:33:47.000

85115|三角關係《家‧寶》（重演）|Trinity Theatre – "The Rose of The Name" (Rerun)|inc4|inc4sc6|2017年11月17日至19日 (星期五至日) 晚上7:452017年11月18日至19日 (星期六至日) 下午2:45|17-19 Nov 2017 (Fri-Sun) 7:45pm18-19 Nov 2017 (Sat-Sun) 2:45pm|演出全長約3小時，包括中場休息10分鐘。|The running time of the performance is approximately 3 hours with a 10-minute intermission.|7295|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$290, $220|$290, $220|粵語演出	仍 踏著 前路走 青春 走到 白頭你有 愛上過 自己的 名字 嗎？	特邀演出《哪一天我們會飛》 吳肇軒&nbsp; 叱吒903 細蘇	名字，是生命的第一份禮物。小時候，最大的難題是寫自己的名字。嫲嫲說，她是家的至寶，她不相信。中學的歲月，她最討厭的和最親愛的，都是跟她同名字的人。某年，她有了樂智文，從此名字總離不開動物和疊字。愛難留，情易逝，甜蜜變成傷痛……在嫲嫲的墓碑前，她再問，到底「我是誰」……兩個人，一塊心田，可會是她的歸宿？	余家寶的一生，和自己的名字角力，跟自己的名字共存……可能，我們每個人都是一樣。是她，也是你，和我。原著小說／文本：蔣曉薇 編劇／導演：馬志豪主演：蘇耀宗、張銘耀、吳肇軒、陳敏兒、陳秄沁、歐芷菲|In Cantonese	“The Rose of The Name” (Rerun) isa drama adapted from the novel of the same title, which is written by Chiang HuiMei, and the show is directed by Ma Chi Ho and starring So Yiu Chung, CheungMing Yiu German, Ng Siu Hin, Chan Man Yee Abby, Ceci Chan, and Sofei Au, etc.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/tc/theatre/programs_318.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/en/theatre/programs_318.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|遲到者須待中場休息或適當時候方可進場。|Latecomers will only be admitted during the intermission or at a suitable break.|||info@trinitytheatre.org|2017-08-17 12:08:00.000|Y|三角關係主辦<br>鳴謝：康樂及文化事務署|Presented by Trinity Theatre<br>Acknowledgement: Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85115_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85115_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-10 10:38:35.000

Adapted from a true story, The Road to Mecca is considered one of Fugard’s best works. Helen’s husband died 15 years ago and since then she has become withdrawn and isolated. She has built up a large collection of sculptures in her garden, all looking toward Mecca. The residents of the town are bewildered by such behavior and the local pastor Marius tries hard to put her in an old people’s home. Helen’s close friend Elsa, a young school teacher sees her from a different perspective…|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|(1) 15分鐘中場休息|(1) Intermission of 15 minutes|2370 1044|2371 4171|fo@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-08 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86173_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86173_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-18 04:17:25.000

Sometimes seeing eye to eye, sometimes needling and goading or ablaze with anger at the crossing of red lines, in a series of heated debates and thought-provoking conversations that hurtle to the heart of cultural stereotyping and identity. Boundaries between hostage-taker and victim start to blur, the prejudices of the past begin to disappear. This award-winning Kenyan play maximises the dramatic power to humanise and rationalise different perspectives, providing space to examine critical real-world issues.|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|(1) 不設中場休息 (2) 英語演出，附中文字幕|(1) No intermission (2) In English with Chinese surtitles|2370 1044|2371 4171|fo@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-08 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86178_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86178_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-18 04:07:23.000

86183|世界文化藝術節2017節目：謝曼恩．阿科尼（塞內加爾/法國）《當初》|World Cultures Festival 2017 Programme: "Somewhere at the Beginning" by Germaine Acogny (Senegal / France)|inc4|inc4sc10|17/11/2017（五） 20:00|17/11/2017(Fri) 20:00|1小時|1hr|87510010|只限六歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$280; $220; $160;|$280; $220; $160;|結合非洲傳說和希臘神話元素，阿科尼在這個充滿自傳色彩的多媒體作品中，透過聲音、影像、氣味、物件、情感和肢體等元素，與身為約魯巴女祭司的祖母、極力想擺脫非洲身份的父親，以及自身的傷痛經歷對話。謝曼恩．阿科尼是當代非洲舞蹈的奠基者。藝術節嚴選由她親自演繹的代表作《當初》和《本相》，風格迥異，卻同樣能量驚人。|In an amazing multimedia mingling of African legend and Greek mythology, Germaine Acogny brings sound, images, objects, and physical movement to embark on a personal confrontation with her family’s past as well as Africa’s shared history with Europe through colonialism. Calling on traditional dance and contemporary techniques, she engages in a dialogue with her grandmother, a Yoruba priestess, her father who shied away from his African identity, and her own painful experiences. Germaine Acogny is recognised globally as the original mover and shaper behind contemporary African dance. She will perform two riveting solo works, both resonating with her characteristic energy.|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|(1) 不設中場休息 (2) 法語演出，附中英文字幕|(1) No intermission (2) In French with Chinese and English surtitles|2370 1044|2371 4171|fo@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-08 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86183_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86183_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-26 02:28:03.000
86179|世界文化藝術節2017節目：Poedio Productions（尼日利亞）《天堂鳥》|World Cultures Festival 2017 Programme: "Strelitzia" by Poedio Productions (Nigeria)|inc4|inc4sc10|04/11/2017（六）11:30, 16:30; 05/11/2017（日）11:30, 14:30|04/11/2017(Sat) 11:30, 16:30; 05/11/2017(Sun) 11:30, 14:30|40分|40 mins|87110224|只限十二歲或以上人士|Only for age 12 or above|$200|$200|《天堂鳥》是一個參與式互動劇場，觀眾有如走進一部尼日利亞人既公開又私密的日記，展開一趟自我尋找的獨特體驗。觀眾跟隨演員遊走於多個分隔的空間，由音樂、舞蹈、詩歌等引領下，與一個個故事相遇，展開人生的旅程。在旅程結束時，觀眾亦同時放下重負，釋放內心深處的情感。透過這次演出，觀眾亦能體驗歷史悠久、充滿力量的非洲戲劇傳統─透過劇場的說故事方式進行社會反思和心靈療癒。|"Strelitzia" is a remarkable one-of-a-kind participatory play-cum-installation, which physically immerses the audience in a multi-sensory diary of self-discovery through a journey into the public and private history of the Nigerian people. Audience will be guided by different performers through a series of partitioned spaces. They encounter memorabilia, music, dance and poetry that bring inner emotions upfront and draw out revelatory memories from their own lives, leading to a powerful feeling of liberation. A wonderful opportunity to experience the story-telling tradition of African theatre in a 21st-century form, engage in social reflection, and open the way to personal soul-searching and healing.|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|(1) 不設中場休息(2) 部份$200企位視線受阻(3) 觀眾務請準時入場，遲到人士須待適當時候方可進場(4) 不設座位(5) 英語演出|(1) No intermission(2) Some $200 standing zone with restricted view(3) Audience members are strongly advised to arrive on time. 86180|世界文化藝術節2017節目：達夫拉鼓樂舞蹈團（布基納法索）（南非）《太陽之舞》|World Cultures Festival 2017 Programme: "Tlé (The Sun)" by DAFRA Drum – West African Drum and Dance Ensemble (Burkina Faso)|inc4|inc4sc10|10/11/2017（五）20:00|10/11/2017(Fri)  20:00|1小時|1hr|36310035|只限六歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$320; $260; $200; $140;|$320; $260; $200; $140;|「Tlé」是西非迪尤拉語「太陽」的意思，代表生命之光，以及非洲人民的笑靨。在遼闊的非洲大地上，各個部族的豐富文化傳統，閃爍著色彩斑斕的耀眼光芒。摔跤之技、神聖的面具舞、吟遊詩人攝人的歌唱一一呈現，觀眾恍如置身王族的庭園中，沉浸於節日盛宴熱鬧的氣氛、歡悅的旋律和強勁的節奏，忘情地手舞足蹈。|“Tlé” means “the Sun” in Jula, a West African language, symbolising the light in the lives of African people. In this spectacular dance performance, directed by Burkina Faso’s award-winning choreographer Olivier Tarpaga, the diversity of Africa’s rich choreographic heritage is on show, along with vivacious live music. Set in the courtyard of an African king, Tlé powerfully combines the energy and precision of Burkina Faso’s leading dancers, interweaving joyful rhythms and dynamic routines with traditional wrestling, griot singing, and dancing with sacred mask, to bring the excitement of the country’s festive celebrations to Hong Kong.|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|(1) 不設中場休息(2) 部份$140座位視線受阻(3) 觀眾務請準時入場，遲到人士須待適當時候或中場休息方可進場|(1) No intermission(2) Some $140 seats with restricted view(3) Audience members are strongly advised to arrive on time. Latecomer will only be admitted when there is a suitable break in the performance or at the intermission|2370 1044|2371 4171|fo@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-08 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86180_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86180_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-18 03:18:45.000

The play has been lauded as a drama that “goes so deeply into human and superhuman conditions that is cannot be reduced to something that teaches us about breaches between different civilisations”. Each had their own distinctive style, which Kidjo fuses with her own to provide an unparalleled musical encounter that extols, elevates, and exhilarates. 86177|世界文化藝術節2017節目：素娜．祖巴特與樂隊（岡比亞／英國）《非洲豎琴音樂會》|World Cultures Festival 2017 Programme: Kora Concert by Sona Jobarteh and Band (Gambia/UK)|inc4|inc4sc1|09/11/2017（四）- 10/11/2017（五）20:00|09/11/2017(Thu) - 10/11/2017(Fri) 20:00|1小時30分|1hr 30 mins|87510010|只限六歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$280; $220; $160;|$280; $220; $160;|系出名門的素娜‧祖巴特，是西非五大吟遊詩人家族的後人，祖巴特過人的天賦和對音樂的堅持，使她能夠打破吟遊詩人只傳男丁的傳統，成為首位女性繼承人。祖巴特四歲起隨哥哥Tunde Jegede 學習非洲豎琴，曾入讀英國皇家音樂學院及普賽爾音樂學校學習大提琴、鋼琴、古鍵琴和作曲，及後加入她哥哥創立的著名樂隊「非洲古典樂隊」，隨團作世界巡迴演出多年，曾與Diabaté 和英國廣播公司交響樂團等同台。|Sona Jobarteh was born into one of the five principal griot families in West Africa. Jobarteh's own extraordinary talent and dedication have helped her to become the first female kora virtuoso, breaking the male-dominated hereditary tradition. Jobarteh started to learn the kora at the age of four from her brother Tunde Jegede. She went on to study the cello, piano, harpsichord and composition at the Royal College of Music and Purcell School for Young Musicians in the UK. She joined Jegede̓s African Classical Music Ensemble and toured the world, sharing a stage with Diabaté and with the BBC Symphony Orchestra.|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|(1) 不設中場休息|(1) No intermission|2370 1044|2371 4171|fo@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-08 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86177_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86177_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-18 04:23:38.000
86174|世界文化藝術節2017節目：泰姆比．姆沙利-瓊斯和艾瑤．花柏（南非）獨腳戲系列：《等待》|World Cultures Festival 2017 Programme: Mono Drama Series: "A Woman in Waiting" by Thembi Mtshali-Jones and Yaël Farber (South Africa)|inc4|inc4sc10|02/11/2017（四） - 03/11/2017（五） 20:00|02/11/2017(Thu) - 03/11/2017(Fri) 20:00|1小時15分|1hr 15 mins|50110016|只限六歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$280; $200;|$280; $200;|在南非獲頒終身成就獎的殿堂級演員泰姆比‧姆沙利-瓊斯，就連已故南非總統曼德拉也曾表示在獄中以觀看她主演的電視劇為主要娛樂。《等待》曾獲愛丁堡藝穗節《蘇格蘭人報》藝穗節首獎等多個獎項，故事主角姆沙利-瓊斯邊演邊唱，由小時候對母親漫長的等待，到長大後和母親一樣成為白人家庭的傭工。國際知名導演艾瑤．花柏的編排讓這個人傳記成為種族隔離政策下南非黑人女性的故事典範。|A Woman in Waiting, winner of a Scotsman Fringe First at Edinburgh Festival Fringe, among many other awards, is a riveting one-woman show. In a lively, honest and totally absorbing performance, Mtshali-Jones combines song, dance and narrative as she recounts her own early life story – from waiting to see her mother every Christmas to waiting to see her own daughter, after she, like her mother, becomes a domestic servant for a white family. A remarkable biographical rendering of humiliation overcome, emotional pain endured, and joy maintained against the odds.|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|(1) 不設中場休息(2) 部份$200座位視線受阻(3) 觀眾務請準時入場，遲到人士須待適當時候或中場休息方可進場|(1) No intermission(2) Some $200 seats with restricted view(3) Audience members are strongly advised to arrive on time. 86175|世界文化藝術節2017節目：以利．撒林巴（盧旺達）獨腳戲系列：《離/合》|World Cultures Festival 2017 Programme: Mono Drama Series: "Split/Mixed" by Ery Nzaramba (Rwanda)|inc4|inc4sc10|04/11/2017（六） 20:00; 05/11/2017（日） 15:00|04/11/2017(Sat) 20:00; 05/11/2017(Sun) 15:00|1小時|1hr|50110016|只限六歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$280; $200;|$280; $200;|舉世震驚的盧旺達大屠殺發生在以利‧撒林巴十五歲那年，「倖存者」身份成為他終身烙印。比利時出生、同時擁有胡圖族和圖西族血統的他，亦從來不能簡單回答「你是什麼人╱從哪裡來」等問題。撒林巴帶著一部卡式錄音機，一人分演眾多角色，帶我們回到他的童年，認識他的家人、朋友和身邊的人，向觀眾毫無保留地掏盡自我。一個男孩的故事，一個權力和特權掙扎的故事，也是一個國家的故事。|The genocide in Rwanda in the 1990s shocked the world. At the time, Ery Nzaramba was 15 years old and his “survivor” identity has now become a life-long companion. With the help of a cassette player, he conjures up family, friends, and other people he encountered, taking on a variety of roles in a candid search to comprehend both himself and the country’s story as a whole. Between the humorous and the heart-wrenching, the drama highlights not only the everyday intolerance that lays the groundwork for mass slaughter but also how power and privilege play an inordinate part in survival.|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|(1) 不設中場休息(2) 部份$200座位視線受阻(3) 觀眾務請準時入場，遲到人士須待適當時候或中場休息方可進場|(1) No intermission(2) Some $200 seats with restricted view(3) Audience members are strongly advised to arrive on time. 86170|世界文化藝術節2017節目：索韋托靈歌合唱團（南非）|World Cultures Festival 2017 Programme: Soweto Gospel Choir (South Africa)|inc4|inc4sc10|27/10/2017（五） 20:00|27/10/2017(Fri) 20:00|1小時30分|1hr 30 mins|87110023|只限六歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$360; $280; $220; $160;|$360; $280; $220; $160;|手執兩個格林美獎和一個艾美獎的索韋托靈歌合唱團，自2002 年成立以來獲獎無數，曾與眾多國際頂尖歌手如Bono、Diana Ross、John Legend 和Celine Dion等同台演出，各國領袖如曼德拉、克林頓、奧巴馬及英國皇室等均為他們的座上客。合唱團由南非最大黑人城鎮索韋托和鄰近教堂詩班的頂尖歌手組成，以非洲方言和英語演唱，曲目分為三大類：歐洲宗教音樂與非洲傳統音樂結合而成的靈歌，種族隔離時期的歌曲。|With two Grammys, an Emmy, and many other prestigious awards, Soweto Gospel Choir has taken the international music world by storm, packing leading concert halls worldwide since its establishment in 2002. Over the years, the choral sensation has shared the stage with star singers such as Bono, Diana Ross, John Legend and Celine Dion while those attending performances have included Nelson Mandela, Bill Clinton, Barack Obama and the British royal family. The Choir, famed for its members’ soaring voices, comprises the best vocalists from churches in and around Soweto, the largest black township in South Africa.|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|(1) 不設中場休息(2) 部份$160座位視線受阻(3) 觀眾務請準時入場，遲到人士須待適當時候或中場休息方可進場|(1) No intermission(2) Some $160 seats with restricted view(3) Audience members are strongly advised to arrive on time. 86171|世界文化藝術節2017節目：索韋托靈歌合唱團（南非）|World Cultures Festival 2017 Programme: Soweto Gospel Choir (South Africa)|inc4|inc4sc10|28/10/2017（六）20:00|28/10/2017(Sat) 20:00|1小時30分|1hr 30 mins|87310051|只限六歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$320; $260; $200; $140;|$320; $260; $200; $140;|手執兩個格林美獎和一個艾美獎的索韋托靈歌合唱團，自2002 年成立以來獲獎無數，曾與眾多國際頂尖歌手如Bono、Diana Ross、John Legend 和Celine Dion等同台演出，各國領袖如曼德拉、克林頓、奧巴馬及英國皇室等均為他們的座上客。合唱團由南非最大黑人城鎮索韋托和鄰近教堂詩班的頂尖歌手組成，以非洲方言和英語演唱，曲目分為三大類：歐洲宗教音樂與非洲傳統音樂結合而成的靈歌，種族隔離時期的歌曲。|With two Grammys, an Emmy, and many other prestigious awards, Soweto Gospel Choir has taken the international music world by storm, packing leading concert halls worldwide since its establishment in 2002. Over the years, the choral sensation has shared the stage with star singers such as Bono, Diana Ross, John Legend and Celine Dion while those attending performances have included Nelson Mandela, Bill Clinton, Barack Obama and the British royal family. The Choir, famed for its members’ soaring voices, comprises the best vocalists from churches in and around Soweto, the largest black township in South Africa.|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|(1) 不設中場休息(2) 部份$140座位視線受阻(3) 觀眾務請準時入場，遲到人士須待適當時候或中場休息方可進場|(1) No intermission(2) Some $140 seats with restricted view(3) Audience members are strongly advised to arrive on time. 86182|世界文化藝術節2017節目：巴希爾．阿塔爾率領酋酋卡大師樂隊（摩洛哥）|World Cultures Festival 2017 Programme: The Master Musicians of Jajouka led by Bachir Attar (Morocco)|inc4|inc4sc10|11/11/2017（六） 20:00|11/11/2017(Sat) 20:00|1小時30分|1hr 30 mins|87510008|只限六歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$400; $300; $220; $160;|$400; $300; $220; $160;|摩洛哥北部山區信奉伊斯蘭教蘇菲主義的酋酋卡村，繼承著一個過千年的音樂傳統。世代相傳的樂師以當地獨特的嗩吶、直笛、四弦琴、手鼓和雙面鼓等樂器演奏，樂音交織出節奏和旋律都極為複雜的玄幻儀式音樂。自1950年代起，這種神秘的音樂令歐美前衛畫家、作家和音樂家如Brion Gysin、Paul Bowles、William Burroughs、Brian Jones、滾石樂隊和Ornette Coleman等為之著迷，爭相前往朝聖與採錄，使酋酋卡大師樂隊聲名遠播。|Jajouka is a Sufi Muslim village in the mountains of northern Morocco and home to an amazing musical tradition over 1,000 years old. Here, hereditary musicians employ local instruments such as the ghaita (double reed), lira (bamboo flute), gimbri (fourstringed lute), bendir (hand drum) and tebel (double-skinned drum) to conjure up intoxicating ritual music. From the 1950s onwards, the multi-patterned sound has inspired Western avant-garde painters, writers and musicians, including Brion Gysin, Paul Bowles, William Burroughs, Brian Jones, the Rolling Stones and Ornette Coleman, to journey to Jajouka.|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|(1) 不設中場休息|(1) No intermission|2370 1044|2371 4171|fo@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-08 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86182_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86182_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-14 12:21:35.000

86194|世界文化藝術節2017工作坊：基桑巴舞體驗工作坊|World Cultures Festival 2017 Workshop: Experiencing Kizomba Workshop|inc4|inc4sc10|4/11/2017（六）19:00|4/11/2017(Sat) 19:00|2小時30分|2hr 30 mins|50111511|只限十八歲或以上人士|Only for age 18 or above|$160|$160|基桑巴，意思為「舞會」，源自非洲南部國家安哥拉，是目前在非洲葡語國家、歐美及澳洲等地大受歡迎的一種社交舞。基桑巴舞融合探戈、祖克、森巴和薩爾薩等風格，但音樂相對緩慢、柔和。在浪漫的音樂伴奏下，一對舞者緊貼身體，以腰肢帶動對方做出合作無間、流暢輕快的優美動作。在這個難得一遇的工作坊中，參加者將由最基本的舞步開始學習，在一個輕鬆的舞會氣氛中體驗這種舞蹈的魅力。參加者更有機會於翌日(5.11)下午於香港文化中心露天廣場舉行的《非凡非洲》嘉年華中與導師們一同獻技！|Kizomba is a dance and music genre that originated from Angola in the southern part of Africa. It has gone on to become a popular form of dance in Portuguese-speaking communities in Africa and around the world. Kizomba is a feisty combination of tango, zouk, samba and salsa, though the associated music is relatively slow. The elegant dance involves the pairs of dancers moving in close coordination in a series of sensual twists and turns. Here, workshop participants will start from the basics and learn to enjoy the charms of Kizomba in a relaxed atmosphere. Selected participants will also have the opportunity to perform with the instructors on stage at the carnival Viva Africa on the next day (5.11) afternoon at Hong Kong Cultural Centre Piazza!|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.worldfestival.gov.hk/2017/|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|(1) 英語講解(2) 名額: 30(3) 適合十八歲或以上人士(4) 建議參加者以雙人組合參與。單人參加者須與其他參加者共舞(5) 參加者請穿著舒適輕便的衣服及鞋襪|(1) In English(2) Quota: 30(3) Suitable for aged 18 or above(4) Those attending are recommended to participate as a pair. Single participants will need to dance with other workshop attendees(5) Participants are advised to wear comfortable clothes, socks and shoes|2370 1044|2371 4171|fo@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-08 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|||||||||N|2017-09-25 05:45:41.000
