86221|「續‧舞」系列：徐奕婕《睡蓮》|‘Dance On’ Series: Water Lilies by Ivy Tsui|inc4|inc4sc3|2017年10月20-21日 (五至六) 晚上8:002017年10月21-22日 (六至日) 下午3:00|20-21 Oct 2017 (Fri-Sat) 8:00pm21-22 Oct 2017 (Sat-Sun) 3:00pm|每場演出約長50分鐘，不設中場休息。|Running time of each performance is about 50 minutes without intermission.|87112562|歡迎年滿6歲的觀眾入場。|Audiences aged 6 and above are welcome.|$160|$160|如果一花一世界，一夢是否一浮生？	「生命就像以根莖來延續生命的植物，真正的生命是看不見、深藏於根莖的。露出地面的部分生命只能延續一個夏季，然後，便凋謝了──真是一個短命鬼。當我們想到生命和文明永無休止的生長和衰敗時，人生果真如夢……我們看見花，它會消逝，但根莖，仍然在。」──榮格《回憶‧夢‧省思》	繼以《乾花》訪問生命與時間的關係後，這次以晝舒夜卷的睡蓮作引子、身體作為媒介、聲音來導航，反覆進入一個又一個可能是你、是我、或是他的「夢」。在經歷着每一朵在水中迎着陽光盛開的睡蓮之際，又彷彿遊走在「夢」與「現實」之間？|If you can see the whole world in a flower, can you pass a whole life within one dream?	‘Life has always seemed to me like a plant lives on its rhizome.&nbsp; Its true life is invisible, hidden in the rhizome.&nbsp; The part that appears above ground lasts only a single summer.&nbsp; Then it withers away – an ephemeral apparition.&nbsp; When we think of the unending growth and decay of life and civilizations, we cannot escape the impression of absolute nullity.&nbsp; Yet, I have never lost a sense of something that lives and endures underneath the eternal flux.&nbsp; What we see is the blossom, which passes.&nbsp; The rhizome remains.’ – C.G. Jung, Memories Dreams, Reflections	Following her enquiry into the relationship between life and time in Dehydrated Flower, Tsui is using day-time flowering water lilies as the introduction, the human body as the media and voices as the navigator.&nbsp; She repeatedly enters dreams that may be yours, mine or theirs.&nbsp; As we experience the moments when each blooming water lily welcomes sunlight, are we in fact wandering between a ‘dream’ and ‘reality’?|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/tc/dance/programs_361.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/en/dance/programs_361.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|20.10.2017 (星期五) 設演後藝人談觀眾在進入演區前須脫下鞋履，並要席地而坐，請穿輕便衣服及襪子，亦歡迎觀眾穿着睡衣。    觀眾在演出期間需帶上耳機，節目以粵語演出。觀眾務請準時入場，遲到者將不獲安排入場。|20.10.2017 (Fri) With post-performance meet-the-artist sessionAudience will be seated on the floor and is requested to take off their shoes before entering the performance area. Please dress casually and wear socks. Wearing pajamas are also welcome. Audience will need to wear a headphone during the performance. Programme conducted in Cantonese. Audience is strongly advised to arrive punctually. 84003|《倩女幽魂》－ 瑰寶情尋：繾綣人間|“A Chinese Ghost Story” - Archival Gems – Enchanting Shadows|inc4|inc4sc5|2018年1月7日 (日) 下午2:30|7 January 2018 (Sun) 2:30pm|95分鐘|95min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|以創新的荷里活特技糅合本地的拍攝手法，重新締造的故事。徐克監製、程小東導演的《倩女幽魂》，以小倩（王祖賢）及寧采臣（張國榮）人鬼殊途的情誼作主線，刻劃出現代的浪漫愛情，並在浪漫而恐怖的人鬼故事之中，加插了港式武打場面、喜劇元素及特技效果。美術指導奚仲文發揮其出色的設計才華，令電影中的視覺效果極為豐富，更獲得金像獎最佳美術指導獎。演員是一時之選，張國榮演活單純戇直的寧采臣，劉兆銘演繹半男半女的姥姥也破格突出，王祖賢的女鬼則別具韻味，幽怨的眼神充份表達了小倩的無奈及哀愁，惹人憐惜。	&copy; 2010星空華文傳媒電影有限公司 保留所有權利|All-around genius Tsui Hark, serving as hands-on producer, adapted Pu Songling's Nie Xiaoqian as a tribute to Li Han-hsiang's celebrated 1960 version. Yet his partnership with director Ching Siu-tung updated the story with a quintessentially 1980s touch. The introduction of computer special effects, considered high-tech for its time, to complement trendy romantic touches and lush visual designs blends perfectly with flamboyant action set pieces staged by Ching and evocative music written by the late great composer James Wong. Taiwan actress Joey Wang Tsu-hsien as the maiden ghost and Hong Kong pop idol Leslie Cheung as the pure-hearted lad make one of the most memorable pairings in the history of Hong Kong Cinema.	&copy; 2010 Fortune Star Media Limited All Rights Reserved.|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ag/film06.html|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ag/film06.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|設映後談，講者劉兆銘|To follow with Post-screening talk with Lau Siu-ming|2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-07-06 12:07:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P84003_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P84003_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-07-18 10:14:36.000
85083|《盲戀》－ 影畫早晨：傳奇的長青樹．李麗華|“Always in My Heart” - Morning Matinee: Our Evergreen Legend – Li Lihua|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月20日 (五) 上午11:00|20 October 2017 (Fri) 11:00am|100分鐘|100min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$30|$30|李麗華繼《風蕭蕭》（1954）後第二次演出改編自徐訏原著的電影作品。電影一開始是旁白者於盧微翠墓前拾獲陸夢放遺下的文稿，並於聚會中向影星李麗華、羅維、王元龍、蔣光超等講述文稿中的愛情故事，彷彿旁白者正是徐訏本人。故事中，奇醜無比的陸夢放（羅維）遇上貌美且善解人意的盧微翠（李麗華），微翠仰慕夢放的才華，夢放也因微翠失明而放下自卑，與她結為夫婦，但微翠終於治癒眼疾，看見丈夫的容貌。微翠在片中大部分時間失明，李麗華演出時，眼睛是一片寂靜，及至首次看見丈夫，眼神又準確地流露出微翠內心的悲喜交集。影片以旁白交代主角的心理轉變，看電影就像在讀小說，令故事裡劇中有劇的鋪排更見巧思。|After The Mortal Wind(1954), Li Lihua starred in her second film adapted from the works of Xu Xu. This time, Li played kind-hearted beauty Lu Weicui, whose blindness enables the unattractive Mon Fang (Lo Wei) to cast aside his insecurity and communicate from his heart. The two eventually marry, but things change when Wei-tsui has an operation to restore her sight. Though playing a blind woman most of the screen time, Li once again shows off the brilliance of her expressive eyes in the scene where Weicui is overcome with conflicting emotions at the first sight of her husband. Adapting his own novel to film, Xu left his elegant prose intact, using narration to guide the audience through the story's complex emotional ups and downs. In a self-reflexive twist, the film version is bookended by the real-life movie stars listening to a narrator – who happens to be played by Xu himself – telling this heartrending story.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017llh/Always-in-My-Heart.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017llh/Always-in-My-Heart.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-08-02 12:08:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85083_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85083_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-02 02:33:56.000
86242|《水火之間》－ 小城內外的韋偉|“Between Fire and Water” - From Small Town to the Big Screen: A Retrospective on Wei Wei|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月7日 (六) 中午12:00|7 October 2017 (Sat) 12:00noon|88分鐘|88min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$45|$45|五、六十年代香港唐樓一樓多伙的板間房，生活氣息濃厚，故事特別多。朱石麟的「同居樂」二部曲──《一板之隔》和《水火之間》，以此為題材，深受法國電影史學家喬治‧薩杜爾的讚賞。《水火之間》的場景狹小，人物眾多，攝影機在擠擁的空間游走，卻調度精準，演員出鏡入鏡，繪畫出豐富的煙火人間圖像。影片強調「家和萬事興」，只有團結互助，才能在逆境中生存下去。生活迫人，善良的人都變得小眉小眼，韋偉的演繹不慍不火，從容有度。	是次放映的為孤本影帶，惟聲畫欠佳，敬請見諒。|In the 1950s and 60s, living in cramped, partitioned tenements was a way of life for many Hong Kong people. Such conditions were fodder for compelling storytelling, giving rise to the category of tenement films. Between Fire and Water, one of the most accomplished of the genre, is, together with The Dividing Wall (1952), part of a diptych about partitioned living by director Zhu Shlin. It’s a story in which the taxing state of crowdedness is exacerbated by the difficulties of water rationing imposed by the government. Zhu masterfully animates the story with finely-drawn characters and vivid mise-en-scene, training his camera to capture the drama and humanity unfolding in the confined space. Wei Wei, playing a member of one of eight families squeezed inside the tenement, turns in a stand-out performance that’s also complementary of the ensemble cast.&nbsp;		The Betacam tape used for this screening is a sole copy; the image and sound quality is short of ideal. We appreciate your understanding.|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ww/between-fire-and-water.html|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ww/between-fire-and-water.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-06 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86242_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86242_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-08 04:29:14.000
85078|《海棠紅》－ 影畫早晨：傳奇的長青樹．李麗華|“Blood Will Tell” - Morning Matinee: Our Evergreen Legend – Li Lihua|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月6日 (五) 上午11:00|6 October 2017 (Fri) 11:00am|90分鐘|90min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$30|$30|演而優則導的王引自《紅玫瑰》（1952）後暫別幕前，復現銀幕頭炮即夥同李麗華重拍白光、嚴俊的《血染海棠紅》（1949）。兩齣《海棠紅》均由電影大亨張善琨監製，這次更拉隊遠赴東京拍攝，號稱「中國第一部伊士曼七彩影片」。綽號「海棠紅」的飛天大盜馬得標（王引）為女兒洗手不幹，卻遭蛇蠍妻子老九（李麗華）告發入獄，十六年後得聞老九敲詐愛女（鍾情），不惜越獄尋仇。李麗華演惡毒妖姬渾身是戲，不安分的煙視媚行教人目眩，貼身旗袍包裹著的腰肢透露著邪與艷。李麗華的光芒照耀整個銀幕，媚力與1949年演繹同一角色的「一代妖姬」白光分庭抗禮。|After a three-year hiatus from acting, actor-director Wang Yin made his acting comeback with this remake of Blood-Stained Begonia (1949). Wang starred as Debiao, a flying bandit who plans to call it quits for the sake of his daughter. However, his scheming wife (Li Lihua) snitches on him, sending him to prison. 16 years later, Debiao learns that his wife is blackmailing his daughter (Chung Ching), prompting the bandit to break out of jail to settle the score. Li is dangerously seductive as the evil vixen, dominating the scenes as she struts across the screen in a tight-fitting qipao that oozes sex appeal. Dubbed the first Chinese film shot in Eastmancolor, 1950s Tokyo is vividly captured in this thrilling tale of greed, love and revenge.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017llh/Blood-will-Tell.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017llh/Blood-will-Tell.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|《海棠紅》的放映未能提供中、英字幕，請觀眾垂注。|We apologise that Blood Will Tellwill be screened without Chinese and English subtitles. 86484|《阮玲玉 》－ 聯合國教科文組織「世界視聽遺產日」特備節目|“Centre Stage” - Celebrating UNESCO's "World Day for Audiovisual Heritage"|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月27日 (五) 晚上7:00|27 October 2017 (Fri) 7:00pm|155分鐘|155min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$45|$45|九十年代香港電影經典，格局和藝術成就至今仍具超前魅力。新浪潮第二浪的關錦鵬推展前作《胭脂扣》的石塘咀懷舊想像，在上海重塑三十年代女星阮玲玉的傳奇。華麗而冷清的生命場景中，阮氏和電影、愛情、社會糾纏，至死難休。真實或重演的電影片段穿插，真實或扮演的同代影人黎莉莉、陳燕燕、林楚楚、孫瑜、蔡楚生、費穆登場，拉闊時空光譜，揭示此片兼容訪查事實與虛構美藝的本質，更加入關錦鵬訪談張曼玉、梁家輝等參演演員，在拍攝現場指揮演出，孰真孰假，處處突顯現代人目光，有理解有投射，亦有截然不同的取態。這是港產片商業盛世期的精裝產品，卻能接通此前新浪潮影視作品的破格敘事法，而三十年代東方好萊塢上海和九十年代東方荷里活香港，雙城影業並列重影，是一次視野胸襟廣闊的歷史交流。	&copy; 2010星空華文傳媒電影有限公司 保留所有權利|Director Stanley Kwan subverts the biopic genre with this 1990s classic, which traces legendary 1930s Chinese screen diva Ruan Lingyu’s ascent to fame and her fall from grace. Featuring an elegant performance by Maggie Cheung as Ruan, the film breaks down the glossy façade to reveal the complex woman behind the screen. It’s also a fascinating trip into the golden era of Shanghai’s once-illustrious film industry – often compared to Hong Kong cinema’s own golden era – showing some of its most prominent figures through Ruan’s eyes. In a surprising dialectic twist, Kwan cuts into the film’s core narrative with black-and-white interview footage of his actors speaking about their characters, real footage of Ruan’s works and behind-the-scenes footage from Kwan’s set. An enlightening examination of the bond between life and art, this 155-minute director’s cut is a testament to Hong Kong cinema’s creative power.	&copy; 2010 Fortune Star Media Limited All Rights Reserved.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017unesco/film.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017unesco/film.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-27 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86484_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86484_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-25 12:36:55.000

When he discovers a map left behind by his father, Chun begins to grow obsessed with the map, the abstract poetry that his father left behind and a mysterious woman who appears in different forms along the river. Beautifully lensed by cinematographer Mark Lee Pingbing – who won a Silver Bear at the Berlin International Film Festival for his brilliant work – Crosscurrent is a pensive and dreamy meditation through the course of Chinese history via a hypnotic riverboat journey along some of China’s most beautiful landmarks. A lyrical and spiritually ambitious film filled with symbols and allusions about a never-ending search for identity and catharsis, Crosscurrent is a very different kind of road movie.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film09.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film09.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-08-18 12:08:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署及華南電影工作者聯合會合辦，銀都機構有限公司、南方影業有限公司及中國電影基金會協辦|Jointly presented by LCSD and South China Film Industry Workers Union; in association with Sil-Metropole Organisation Ltd., Southern Film Co., Ltd. and China Film Foundation|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85255_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85255_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-18 06:36:44.000

The two share a passionate love, but Xi Shi decides to give herself to the emperor of the Wu kingdom (Lo Wei) for the sake of her country. For the several dancing scenes in the Wu palace, the producer invited a Chinese dance virtuoso from Taiwan to train Li and the other actresses. Despite being a Cantonese film actor, Cheung managed to deliver all of his lines in Mandarin. The result may not have been ideal, but it's a testament to Cheung's dedication to his craft. 85261|《再見，在也不見》─ 中國電影展2017|“Distance” - Chinese Film Panorama 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月8日 (日) 下午2:00|8 Oct 2017 (Sun) 2:00pm|108分鐘|108 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|三個文藝短篇由來自中國、新加坡和泰國的三個導演執導，都由陳柏霖主演。《背影》寫陳經理到廣西視察工廠，無意中發現分散了多年的老父，但只能跟隨他的背影。《湖畔》中已婚的陳回到新加坡探監，當年有湖畔之情的玩伴如今卻是死囚。《再見》則以陳教授到曼谷開會，再見大學時的女老師為題，勾起一段忘年戀。三個故事分別寫親情、友情、愛情，都因著地理、心理距離，以致「相見曾如不見，有情何似無情」。編導盡量避免煽情、激動，而出之以含蓄溫文，留有餘韻，既不高深也不流俗，是難得的正宗文藝片。|Anthony Chen, the director of acclaimed Singaporean drama Ilo Ilo (2013), brings together three talented young directors from across Asia for an anthology of shorts – all starring Chen Bolin – about love affected by various forms of distance. In the segment by China’s Xin Yukun (The Coffin in the Mountain (2014)), Chen stars as a manager who encounters his long-lost father during a factory inspection trip in Guangxi. Singapore’s Tan Shijie sees Chen play a man who returns to Singapore to visit a childhood friend, now a death row inmate in prison. Finally, Chen plays a visiting professor who embarks on a May-December romance with his former teacher in the segment by Thailand’s Sivaroj Kongsakul (Eternity (2011)). As creative director, Chen cleverly melds the three directors’ visions into a coherent whole, creating a subtly affecting experience with simple, but powerful emotions.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film13.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film13.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-08-18 12:08:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署及華南電影工作者聯合會合辦，銀都機構有限公司、南方影業有限公司及中國電影基金會協辦|Jointly presented by LCSD and South China Film Industry Workers Union; in association with Sil-Metropole Organisation Ltd., Southern Film Co., Ltd. and China Film Foundation|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85261_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85261_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-18 06:51:40.000
84002|《陰陽錯》－ 瑰寶情尋：繾綣人間|“Esprit D'amour” - Archival Gems – Enchanting Shadows|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年12月3日 (日) 下午2:30|3 December 2017 (Sun) 2:30pm|89分鐘|89min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|林嶺東說這是《灰姑娘》式故事，但更像《聊齋》的時裝變奏。保險公司主任古志明（譚詠麟）調查一名投保人死因，發現對方竟是早前玩碟仙時請來的女鬼張小瑜（倪淑君）。小瑜為了證明自己意外身亡，讓家人取得保險金，不惜在志明面前現身。小瑜的活潑可愛深深打動志明，兩人日久生情，然而好景不常，志明未婚妻Ivy（葉童）找來高人棒打鴛鴦，人鬼戀終究只是一場幻象。剛從加拿大回流的林嶺東，在靈異中注入喜劇與浪漫愛情元素，票房突破一千四百萬。男主角譚詠麟繼《小生怕怕》（1982）再次主演新藝城作品，憑兩片成為歌影兩棲巨星，主題曲「幻影」紅遍全港。女主角倪淑君則來自台灣，年僅十六已氣質過人，讓觀眾留下深刻印象。	&copy; 2010星空華文傳媒電影有限公司 保留所有權利|A genre mishmash blending elements of horror, comedy and romance, this directorial debut of action-film virtuoso Ringo Lam is an inventive story driven by the idea that spirits roam the human world not to haunt us but to seek help in their unfinished businesses. After a game of the Chinese Ouija Board, insurance agent Chi-ming (Alan Tam) begins having spooky encounters with a female ghost, Siu-yu (Ni Shu-chun), whose very death he is investigating. He becomes smitten by the otherworldly beauty, stirring the jealous rage of his fiancé (Cecilia Yip)... This low-budget Cinema City production was a surprise hit and, together with its tuneful theme song, elevated Tam to superstardom in both film and music. And Taiwan actress Ni Shu-chun, making her film debut at the tender age of 16, became an instant star with her bewitching performance as the sweet, innocent phantom.	&copy; 2010 Fortune Star Media Limited All Rights Reserved.|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ag/film05.html|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ag/film05.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|設映後談，講者葉七城|To follow with Post-screening talk with Ellis Yip|2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-07-06 12:07:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P84002_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P84002_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-07-18 10:15:14.000

Fruit Chan, who had toiled in the filmindustry for years before finally given a chance at the helm, puts on displayhis grasp of film craftsmanship, handling this very commercial genre-blenderwith smooth storytelling and appropriate stylisations. Yet the film waswithheld from release for three long years, briefly thwarting Chan's careeradvancement but perhaps motivating him to dig deeper into his artistic quest.|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ag/film08.html|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ag/film08.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|設映後談，講者登徒|To follow with Post-screening talk with Thomas Shin|2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-07-06 12:07:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P84012_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P84012_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-07-18 10:13:39.000
81357|《賭神》－ 百部不可不看的香港電影|“God of Gamblers” - 100 Must-See Hong Kong Movies|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月20日 (五) 晚上7:30|20 October 2017 (Fri) 7:30pm|125分鐘|125min|7130|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$45|$45|九十年代的香港早已由難民社會變成金融都市，為金錢、物質以及生活品味而拼搏被視為理所當然，導演王晶把這種拼搏精神幻化成賭搏橋段，借賭神（周潤發）高進失憶，流落江湖間得窮流氓刀仔（劉德華）照顧，一邊逃避仇家追殺，一邊以小搏大，反映港人鬥志頑強，夢想一夜成名，瞬間富貴的時代精神；這種庶民心理被導演巧妙捕捉，加上周潤發與劉德華的精彩演繹，令《賭神》集天時地利人和，記下資本主義和香港民情高度自滿的姿態。|Hong Kong gambling films are, like Hollywoodgangster movies, metaphors for capitalism. The genre reached its apex ofpopularity in the later part of the go-go 1980s, when Hong Kong was merrilyengrossed in an unapologetic embrace of free-market economics andget-rich-quick was on the minds of many. Godof Gamblers was among the most popular in the genre. It’s the story of alegendary gambler who suffers a partial loss of memory that reduces him to themental stage of a child after a freak accident on the eve of a much-hypedconfrontation at the card table. 85245|《捉迷藏》─ 中國電影展2017|“Hide and Seek” - Chinese Film Panorama 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月15日 (日) 晚上7:30|15 Oct 2017 (Sun) 7:30pm|105分鐘|105 min|73810020|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|張家偉（霍建華）和妻子女兒生活富足，居於高尚住宅區；蘇紅 （秦海璐）和女兒卻住在破舊的公寓，住客品流複雜，盛傳其間發生過命案。家偉為了尋找失縱的哥哥，認識了蘇紅，後者厭貧憎富，為改善生活不擇手段。發展下去，張家竟被神秘人襲擊，蘇紅的公寓則出現凶險怪事。情況越弄越僵，陷於迷離撲朔、險象橫生。究竟哥哥是生是死、誰人在暗中搞鬼、誰是殺人元兇？編導刻意和觀眾捉迷藏，似在暴露人性險惡、控訴貧富懸殊，卻不斷借故製造驚險刺激。近年內地時興懸疑驚慄片，這是典型潮流之作。|Director Liu Jie (Judge (2009), Young Style (2013)) dives into genre filmmaking for the first time with this spooky remake of a hit South Korean thriller. Café owner Jiawei (Wallace Huo) and his family live comfortably in a luxury high-rise. When Jiawei is told that his older brother is missing, he goes to his brother’s seedy apartment building, where strange marks have been left in front of each home. After meeting his brother’s fearful neighbour (Qin Hailu) and a sudden attack by a mystery man in a motorcycle helmet, Jiawei grows consumed by fear and a dark secret that he has been harbouring for years. Playing on our paranoia of being watched in our own homes, Liu’s expertly crafted suspense mystery is a cinematic roller coaster with genuinely shocking twists and intensely scary moments. It will keep your palms sweating and your mind guessing until the very last frame.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film06.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film06.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-08-18 12:08:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署及華南電影工作者聯合會合辦，銀都機構有限公司、南方影業有限公司及中國電影基金會協辦|Jointly presented by LCSD and South China Film Industry Workers Union; in association with Sil-Metropole Organisation Ltd., Southern Film Co., Ltd. and China Film Foundation|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85245_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85245_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-18 06:42:38.000
86279|《天國與地獄 》─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“High and Low” - Repertory Cinema 2017 "In Memory of Japanese Film Master: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira"|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年11月11日 (六) 下午 2:00 及2017年11月18日 (六) 晚上 7:00|11 Nov 2017 (Sat) 2:00pm and18 Nov 2017 (Sat) 7:00pm|143分鐘|143 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|貧富生命同價？	權藤（三船敏郎）是大鞋廠的一名董事，主管生產，他憑實力由低做起，堅守匠人的認真態度，拒絕生產劣質貨品，其他董事逼他就範，否則把他逐出公司。權藤把家財盡押，暗中收購股份，從而接管鞋廠，大計只差一步時，卻收到兒子被綁架的勒索電話。綁匪（山崎努）認錯人，綁走了權藤司機的兒子，仍要求權藤付巨額贖金。權藤陷入人生最大的掙扎，為了自己的兒子當然在所不惜，但他要為別人的孩子摧毀自己的畢生事業，甚至破產收場嗎？本片改編自Ed McBain的小說《國王的贖金》，黑澤明用原著「標錯參」的大綱編寫影片的前半，再用驚心動魄的擒犯過程構成後半。第一小時描述權藤和綁匪在電話中角力，劇情完全在大宅內進行，卻仍緊張非常。交贖金是在尚未啟用的新幹線的「回聲號」列車上拍攝，黑澤明用了八部攝影機，放在列車的不同位置，捕捉分秒必爭的逼力。不單止劇情突出權藤及綁匪之間的生活差距，鏡頭亦不時營造出高與低、天國與地獄的反差。黑澤明亦自《野良犬》(1949)後，再次把查案過程放進炎夏的背景，更添燥熱的張力。如果黑澤明令人誤會他有仇富的傾向，《天國與地獄》就是其人道主義的一個例證，富貴不一定卑鄙，貧賤亦不一定高尚。黑澤明再一次以商業片形式，帶出杜斯妥也夫斯基的哲理，例如《罪與罰》自命替天行道的仇恨，只會將地獄帶到人間。不過影片的成功（該年的票房冠軍），卻在日本引起罪犯模倣，作出不少綁架大案，令黑澤明很不是味兒。|A King's Ransom for a Pawn	Kondo (Mifune Toshiro) is an executive of a shoe enterprise, in charge of production. His success is due to his hard work and he insists on making durable but less profitable shoes. The other executives pressure him into a coup against the company president, or be given the boot. Kondo, however, is mortgaging everything he has so as to take over the company for himself. Just one more step from his goal, Kondo receives a phone call asking him to pay a ransom for his son. The kidnapper (Yamazaki Tsutomu) actually made a mistake and got the son of Kondo's chauffeur, but he asks Kondo to pay the ransom anyway. Kondo is willing to sacrifice himself for his own son, but is he going to do the same for someone else's kid?Taking the "kidnapping the wrong kid" plot of Ed McBain's King's Ransom, Kurosawa tagged on the manhunt for the kidnapper as the film's second half. The first hour however, takes place entirely in Kondo's mansion during which he engages on a very tense battle of wits with the kidnapper. The ransom scene was shot on a Kodama bullet train of the Shinkansen which would be officially opened in 1964. In that short scene, Kurosawa captured the split-second tension by placing eight cameras in different parts of the train. The wide gap between Kondo and the kidnapper isn't just depicted by the plot, it is illustrated by means of framing as well. Literally the Japanese title means "Heaven and Hell". For the first time since Stray Dog (1949), Kurosawa again pitched a cop story against the background of a hot summer and you can't fail to feel the heat.It may seem like Kurosawa had a grudge against the wealthy but High and Low is proof of his humanism. The wealthy isn't necessarily evil and the deprived can also be depraved. Kurosawa once again evoked his beloved Dostoyevsky in the framework of a commercial film. The attempt to create heaven on earth always ends up in creating hell. To the distaste of Kurosawa, High and Low sparked several cases of copycat kidnappings in Japan.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film10.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film10.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-09-28 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86279_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86279_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 02:36:10.000
85250|《路邊野餐》─ 中國電影展2017|“Kaili Blues” - Chinese Film Panorama 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月14日 (六) 下午4:30|14 Oct 2017 (Sat) 4:30pm|110分鐘|110 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|有過黑底如今在貴州小縣城當中醫的陳升，奉母遺願，穿過濕熱、神秘的鄉土，到小鎮去尋找被拋棄的侄兒，其間他好像經歷過自己的過去和未來。劇情是簡單瑣碎的日常生活，畫面聲音卻朦朧得如詩似夢，是一次言語文字難以形容的心情之旅。導演畢贛說這是現實裡生活經驗的變奏拼接，只是敘事奇特、難分難解。後段四十多分鐘，觀者跟隨主角在黃昏入夜的小鎮走動，生活感强但既真且幻。影片拍攝時困難重重，公映後引起熱烈評論，有譽之為「柔軟可似水而光芒四射，是最好的華語藝術電影處女作之一。」|Chen Sheng is a doctor in a small town. To fulfill his late mother’s wish of finding his brother’s abandoned son, Sheng travels to the rural town of Zhengyuan, where his past and future come together in a dream-like reality. The feature film debut by Bi Gan is an entrancing odyssey into a world where memories, dreams and reality blend into an otherworldly realm. The final 40-minutes of the film, which follows Sheng through a rural town in a single, uninterrupted take, is an audacious piece of filmmaking that earns Kaili Blues a rightful place as one of the best directorial debuts to come out of China in recent years. This is a moody, trance-like cinematic experience that will not be easily forgotten.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film07.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film07.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-08-18 12:08:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署及華南電影工作者聯合會合辦，銀都機構有限公司、南方影業有限公司及中國電影基金會協辦|Jointly presented by LCSD and South China Film Industry Workers Union; in association with Sil-Metropole Organisation Ltd., Southern Film Co., Ltd. and China Film Foundation|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85250_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85250_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-18 06:44:08.000
85257|《清水裡的刀子》─ 中國電影展2017|“Knife in the Clear Water” - Chinese Film Panorama 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月2日 (一) 晚上7:30 及2017年10月14日 (六) 下午2:00|2 Oct 2017 (Mon) 7:30pm and14 Oct 2017 (Sat) 2:00pm|89分鐘|89 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|寧夏山村住著信奉回教的村民，生活極之簡樸刻苦，人們靠畜牧耕種僅可維生，對物質享受、生和死的體會和城市人截然有別。老人在喪妻後苦苦籌措，只能騰出一頭老牛給亡妻作祭。影片就寫他在祭禮前的日子裡，每天眷顧著跟隨了他十多年的老牛，靜靜地做飯、禮拜、洗浴，沉思生死的意義。祭禮前三天，老牛看到浸在清水裡的刀子，就不喝不食，傳說是讓體內清潔、迎接犧牲。全片紀錄著單調沉靜的生活，極簡的劇情、緩慢的動作，讓人感受生命的莊嚴與無奈，然後面對結尾那嚴峻的白雪茫茫的世界。|Ma Zishan is a Muslim farmer living a simple life in a rural village inside Ningxia province. After the death of his wife, Zishan must sacrifice his old cow for a ceremony that marks the end of the 40-day mourning period. Zishan quietly spends his last days with his loyal cow going through his everyday rituals and contemplating his own mortality. Meanwhile, the cow stops eating and drinking when it sees a knife sitting in a puddle of water, as if it is also mentally preparing for its own death. A sobering contemplation about how to face life’s final hours, this sparsely plotted and leisurely paced drama offers a rare glimpse into the under-represented Hui ethnic minority people, revealing their struggles to survive in poverty and a stark landscape.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film11.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film11.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-08-18 12:08:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署及華南電影工作者聯合會合辦，銀都機構有限公司、南方影業有限公司及中國電影基金會協辦|Jointly presented by LCSD and South China Film Industry Workers Union; in association with Sil-Metropole Organisation Ltd., Southern Film Co., Ltd. and China Film Foundation|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85257_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85257_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-18 06:45:51.000

85339|樂趣系列：雅諾斯卡樂團|“Music Delight” Series: Janoska Ensemble|inc4|inc4sc1|2017年10月28日（六） 晚上8時|28 October 2017 (Sat) 8pm|節目演出長1小時30分鐘，包括中場休息15分鐘。|The performance will run for about 1 hour and 30 minutes, including a 15 minute intermission.|87210045|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$240, $180, $120|$240, $180, $120|當音符遇上雅諾斯卡，五線譜變得不再刻板。斯洛伐克兄弟幫──雅諾斯卡樂團十月來港演出，四子擅長將耳熟能詳的古典樂章，輕鬆糅合拉丁、探戈、吉卜賽、流行爵士樂等音樂元素，即興編出玩味活潑又清新迷人的「JANOSKA STYLE」。演出曲目包括古典名家小約翰‧史特勞斯、克萊斯勒、馬思奈、比才、莫扎特與帕格尼尼的作品。|When music plays under the name of “Janoska”, it becomes widely imaginary.  The brotherhood ensemble from Slovakia – Janoska Ensemble will perform in Hong Kong this October.  All members are talented in playing classical music, they effortlessly improvise in a playful, charming yet refreshing “Janoska Style”, which is a mix of genres including Latin, Tango, Gipsy and Pop Jazz.  The programme widely includes classical works by Johann Strauss II, Kreisler, Massenet, Bizet, Mozart and Paganini.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/tc/music/programs_347.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/Programme/en/music/programs_347.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|集體購票優惠每次購買正價門票4至9張可獲9折優惠；10至19張可獲85折優惠；20張或以上可獲8折優惠。「樂趣系列」套票優惠同時購買「雅諾斯卡樂團」及「沙龍四重奏」的正價門票，可獲9折優惠。上述購票優惠只可享用其一，請於購票時通知票務人員。|Group Booking Discount10% off for each purchase of 4-9 standard tickets, 15% off for 10-19 standard tickets, 20% off for 20 or more standard tickets.  “Music Delight” Series Discount10% off for each purchase of standard tickets for both “Janoska Ensemble” and “Salut Salon”.
