86226|《夜店》－ 小城內外的韋偉|“Night Inn” - From Small Town to the Big Screen: A Retrospective on Wei Wei|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月5日 (四) 中午12:00|5 October 2017 (Thu) 12:00noon|111分鐘|111min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$45|$45|抗日戰爭期間，舞台劇興盛，柯靈和師陀便曾取材高爾基的話劇《低下層》，編成《夜店》一劇，演出大受歡迎。戰後黃佐臨導演的這部佳作，由柯靈親自改編，很能代表時代的集體吶喊。主演的石揮和張伐，戰時都是舞台劇演員，前者尤其戲路縱橫；韋偉也是話劇演員，黃佐臨正是她的啓蒙老師。她第一次登上大銀幕，演妓女林黛玉一角，戲份不多，但恰如其分。黃佐臨以外，法國的雷諾亞和日本的黑澤明，也分別於1936年和1957年改編過高爾基這齣名劇：三種文化、三個時代、三部佳作。		鳴謝中國電影資料館|Night Inn is Wei Wei’s first film, based on a popular play of the same title, staged during the war when theatrewas the preferred alternative to film, with greater flexibility of presentation and less likelihood of being censored by the occupying force. The play was adapted from Gorki’s The Lower Depths, which was also filmed by the masters Jean Renoir of France and Kurosawa Akira of Japan in 1936 and 1957 respectively. Huang Zuolin’s film version was filmed shortly after the war, scripted by Ke Ling who co-wrote the play, and stars Shi Hui and Zhang Fa, both versatile stage actors active during the war. Huang was also Wei’s mentor who shepherded the stage actress into turning in a memorable performance on screen in the small role of a prostitute.&nbsp;		Screening courtesy of China Film Archive|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ww/night-inn.html|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ww/night-inn.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-06 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86226_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86226_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-08 04:27:05.000
86270|《我對青春無悔》(專上放映場) ─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“No Regrets for Our Youth” (Post-secondary Screening) - Repertory Cinema 2017 "In Memory of Japanese Film Master: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira"|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年11月3日 (五) 晚上 7:30|3 Nov 2017 (Fri) 7:30pm|110分鐘|110 min|65910018|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|免費招待專上院校全日制學生|Free screening for full-time post-secondary students|自由的代價	九一八事變後，軍國主義高唱入雲。法學教授的千金幸枝（原節子），自小無憂無慮，十指不沾陽春水，性格剛烈，愛恨分明，她被父親的兩個學生：野毛及糸原熱烈追求。此時其父因為堅守學術自由，被右翼人士逼害，在壓力當前，糸原為了唾手可得的中產生活向強權低頭，野毛堅持抗爭，被捕下獄。多年後，日本已全面侵華，離家自立的幸枝與野毛重遇，野毛這時已是中國事務專家，言論文章備受朝野器重，甚至成立智庫為官方獻策，但其實暗中從事反戰行動。幸枝和他相戀，是重重劫難的開始。黑澤明戰後的第一部作品，日本敗戰之日，亦是自由甦醒的一天，追求自由的人在軍國主義所受的苦難及犧牲，終於沉冤得雪。故事雖為虛構，但黑澤明青年時曾參加地下左翼政治活動，有過被警察追捕的經歷，應該有深切體驗，而片中人物另有所本，出於兩件真事，第一件是1933年的瀧川事件，京都帝國大學的法學教授瀧川幸辰質疑通姦罪只懲罰妻子，被人攻擊他散播共產思想，師生抗爭不果。第二件是大戰期間，「佐爾格間諜網」被搗破後，中國通尾崎秀實被揭發為中共提供情報。本片是黑澤明除了在戰時拍攝，勉勵女性國民為戰爭無私奉獻的《最美》(1944)以外，少數以女性為重心的作品，《最美》的軍國主義的意識形態，在《我對青春無悔》搖身一變成為自由主義。即使本片已是黑澤明第五部電影，在他心底，《我對青春無悔》才是他第一部真正滿意的作品。黑澤明的人文關懷、對泥土及農民的讚頌、對正義的奮力追求，都可以在本片找到原點。幸枝離家出走前，父親對她說的一番話發人深省：「自由是要爭取的，千萬不要忘記當中會有苦痛的犧牲及責任。」|The Cost of Freedom	The Manchuria Incident of 1931 gives a big boost to Japanese militarism. Yukie (Hara Setsuko) enjoys a carefree life as the daughter of a law professor. Noge and Itokawa, her fathers' students, vie for her attention. But when Yukie's father is persecuted for his liberal views, Itokawa is unwilling to throw his future down the drain. Noge rallies in support of Yukie's father and receives a jail sentence. Several years later, Japan starts an all-out war with China. Yukie has left her sheltered life behind and moves to Tokyo. She runs into Noge again, he is now a respected China expert and running a thinktank offering advice to the military and business sectors. Actually Noge is secretly sabotaging Japan's war effort, and his falling in love with Yukie is the start of her sufferings.The end of the war also signified the rebirth of freedom in Japan, and this is Kurosawa's first postwar film. The unjust persecution to the liberals had been recanted and No Regrets for Our Youth was a sign of the times. In his youth, Kurosawa participated in underground leftist activities and had close calls with the police. The plot of this film is fictional but based on two headline incidents. The first one is the Takigawa Incident of 1933. Takigawa, a law professor of Kyoto Imperial University, questioned the legitimacy of the adultery offense because it only applied to wives, not husbands. Right-wingers accused Takigawa of spreading Communist thoughts and he was dismissed from the university. The second incident is the Sorge Affair. As part of the Sorge spy ring, China expert Ozaki Hotsumi had been leaking information to the Chinese Communist Party.Apart from the propaganda film The Most Beautiful (1944), No Regrets for Our Youth is a rare example in Kurosawa's works of having a woman as the main protagonist. The women of The Most Beautiful are told to sacrifice themselves for the war, and such ideology takes a new face as the liberalism of No Regrets for Our Youth. Kurosawa considered this film, his fifth, to be the first one that really pleased him, and many Kurosawa trademarks, such as humanism, the quest for justice, the holiness of the soil and its peasants, could be traced of having started here.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film02.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film02.html|||設映後談，粵語主講講者：羅維明、家明。凡有興趣參與的專上院校學生，請將姓名、電話號碼、電郵地址及院校名稱電郵至 fpo@lcsd.gov.hk 登記留座。成功登記者將獲發確認電郵，請於放映前一小時起於香港科學館演講廳接待處出示確認電郵及有效學生證件換取免費入場券。截止登記日期︰20/10/2017。放映當日倘有餘座，將開放予公眾免費入場。座位先到先得。 如有任何爭議，電影節目辦事處保留最終決定權。|Post-screening talk with Law Waiming and Ka Ming in Cantonese. For post-secondary students interested in the free screening, please register by email at fpo@lcsd.gov.hk, providing name, telephonenumber, email address and name of institution. Students successfully registered will receive a confirmation email and please bring alongwith valid student identity card for redemption of the free admission ticket at the reception counter of Lecture Hall, Hong Kong ScienceMuseum one hour prior to the screening on the day. Registration deadline: 20/10/2017. The screening will be open to the public for free admission on a first-come-first-served basis if seats are still available on the screening day. In case of any dispute, the Film Programmes Office's decision shall be final and conclusive.|2734 2900|||||康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86270_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86270_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 06:31:10.000
86269|《我對青春無悔》─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“No Regrets for Our Youth” - Repertory Cinema 2017 "In Memory of Japanese Film Master: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira"|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月28日 (六) 下午 4:30|28 Oct 2017 (Sat) 4:30pm|110分鐘|110 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|自由的代價	九一八事變後，軍國主義高唱入雲。法學教授的千金幸枝（原節子），自小無憂無慮，十指不沾陽春水，性格剛烈，愛恨分明，她被父親的兩個學生：野毛及糸原熱烈追求。此時其父因為堅守學術自由，被右翼人士逼害，在壓力當前，糸原為了唾手可得的中產生活向強權低頭，野毛堅持抗爭，被捕下獄。多年後，日本已全面侵華，離家自立的幸枝與野毛重遇，野毛這時已是中國事務專家，言論文章備受朝野器重，甚至成立智庫為官方獻策，但其實暗中從事反戰行動。幸枝和他相戀，是重重劫難的開始。黑澤明戰後的第一部作品，日本敗戰之日，亦是自由甦醒的一天，追求自由的人在軍國主義所受的苦難及犧牲，終於沉冤得雪。故事雖為虛構，但黑澤明青年時曾參加地下左翼政治活動，有過被警察追捕的經歷，應該有深切體驗，而片中人物另有所本，出於兩件真事，第一件是1933年的瀧川事件，京都帝國大學的法學教授瀧川幸辰質疑通姦罪只懲罰妻子，被人攻擊他散播共產思想，師生抗爭不果。第二件是大戰期間，「佐爾格間諜網」被搗破後，中國通尾崎秀實被揭發為中共提供情報。本片是黑澤明除了在戰時拍攝，勉勵女性國民為戰爭無私奉獻的《最美》(1944)以外，少數以女性為重心的作品，《最美》的軍國主義的意識形態，在《我對青春無悔》搖身一變成為自由主義。即使本片已是黑澤明第五部電影，在他心底，《我對青春無悔》才是他第一部真正滿意的作品。黑澤明的人文關懷、對泥土及農民的讚頌、對正義的奮力追求，都可以在本片找到原點。幸枝離家出走前，父親對她說的一番話發人深省：「自由是要爭取的，千萬不要忘記當中會有苦痛的犧牲及責任。」|The Cost of Freedom	The Manchuria Incident of 1931 gives a big boost to Japanese militarism. Yukie (Hara Setsuko) enjoys a carefree life as the daughter of a law professor. Noge and Itokawa, her fathers' students, vie for her attention. But when Yukie's father is persecuted for his liberal views, Itokawa is unwilling to throw his future down the drain. Noge rallies in support of Yukie's father and receives a jail sentence. Several years later, Japan starts an all-out war with China. Yukie has left her sheltered life behind and moves to Tokyo. She runs into Noge again, he is now a respected China expert and running a thinktank offering advice to the military and business sectors. Actually Noge is secretly sabotaging Japan's war effort, and his falling in love with Yukie is the start of her sufferings.The end of the war also signified the rebirth of freedom in Japan, and this is Kurosawa's first postwar film. The unjust persecution to the liberals had been recanted and No Regrets for Our Youth was a sign of the times. In his youth, Kurosawa participated in underground leftist activities and had close calls with the police. The plot of this film is fictional but based on two headline incidents. The first one is the Takigawa Incident of 1933. Takigawa, a law professor of Kyoto Imperial University, questioned the legitimacy of the adultery offense because it only applied to wives, not husbands. Right-wingers accused Takigawa of spreading Communist thoughts and he was dismissed from the university. The second incident is the Sorge Affair. As part of the Sorge spy ring, China expert Ozaki Hotsumi had been leaking information to the Chinese Communist Party.Apart from the propaganda film The Most Beautiful (1944), No Regrets for Our Youth is a rare example in Kurosawa's works of having a woman as the main protagonist. The women of The Most Beautiful are told to sacrifice themselves for the war, and such ideology takes a new face as the liberalism of No Regrets for Our Youth. Kurosawa considered this film, his fifth, to be the first one that really pleased him, and many Kurosawa trademarks, such as humanism, the quest for justice, the holiness of the soil and its peasants, could be traced of having started here.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film02.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film02.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-09-28 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86269_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86269_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 02:42:30.000
85084|《游龍戲鳳》－ 影畫早晨：傳奇的長青樹．李麗華|“No Time for Love” - Morning Matinee: Our Evergreen Legend – Li Lihua|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月27日 (五) 上午11:00|27 October 2017 (Fri) 11:00am|93分鐘|93min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$30|$30|嚴俊與李麗華於1957年結婚，同年裡他創辦的金龍電影製片公司推出創業作《游龍戲鳳》，故事與同由夫人李麗華擔演的《假鳳虛凰》（1947）雷同，講述信奉享樂主義的花似玉（李麗華）認為香港遍地黃金，特意來港充闊小姐釣金龜婿，釣來的卻是個冒認富商徵婚的理髮師（嚴俊）。在當年的電影中這是個老掉牙的橋段，但本片確另有引人發噱的能耐。李麗華讀徵婚信一幕邊唱邊跳，有幾分荷里活女星的神采，喜感十足；另一幕嚴俊約會李麗華共晉晚餐，對著全英文菜牌亂點一通，結果上桌的全都是湯，跟十多年後《猛龍過江》（1972）中李小龍在意大利點了滿桌子湯的情節遙相呼應。電影穿插多首歌曲，出自姚敏、綦相棠手筆的旋律跳脫動聽，李雋青的歌詞亦充滿幽默感，讓人忍俊不禁。	鳴謝巴黎中國電影資料中心|In 1957, Yan Jun founded Golden Dragon Film Production and co-starred in its first production along with his newlywed wife Li Lihua. Li played Hua Siyu, a firm believer of materialism who has come to Hong Kong in hopes of landing a rich husband. However, she ends up snagging a barber (Yan) who happens to be posing as a rich businessman looking for a wife. The story is hardly original (even highly reminiscent of Li's earlier film Fake Phoenix (1947)), but Li's delightful performance makes this film pure joy. The actress even exudes the aura of a Hollywood superstar as she dances and sings while reading marriage proposal letters. This breezy romantic comedy features a number of light catchy tunes written by the talented Yao Min and Kei Shang-tong.	Screening courtesy of CDCC Paris|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017llh/No-Time-for-Love.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017llh/No-Time-for-Love.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-08-02 12:08:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85084_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85084_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-02 02:34:20.000
85237|《岡仁波齊》─ 中國電影展2017|“Paths of the Soul” - Chinese Film Panorama 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月8日 (日) 晚上7:30 及2017年10月22日 (日) 下午4:30|8 Oct 2017 (Sun) 7:30pm and22 Oct 2017 (Sun) 4:30pm|118分鐘|118 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|西藏人一生的心願是去拉薩和神山岡仁波齊朝聖，普拉村民尼瑪扎堆為了完成先父和七十多歲叔叔的心願，決和親人成行，同時加入的村民還有欠債纍纍的屠夫、待產的孕婦和殘疾少年等共十一人。他們跟著拖拉車，沿著公路、山路蜿蜒而上，一路叩拜，晝行夜宿，經歷了四季寒暑，行完了2,500公里，達成朝聖之願。編導張楊的攝影組和演員們一道經歷了全程，沿途攝製這部紀實的故事片。其間遇到暴風雪、山泥傾瀉、嬰兒出生……最後一同登上神山，感願天地的浩茫、生命的渺小；也讓我們在兩小時內、經歷從感覺到達心靈的旅程。|Making the holy pilgrimage to Lhasa and Mount Kailash is a lifelong dream for many Tibetans. Director Zhang Yang and his crew captured one such pilgrimage in this extraordinary road film. Blurring the line between reality and fiction, Zhang followed a group of eleven villagers for seven months on their 2,500-kilometre journey. As part of their ritual, the trekkers must bow and lay their bodies on the ground every few steps – not easy when they’re constantly grinding against hard asphalt. Zhang shaped the story along the way, improvising fictional scenes such as landslides, a bicycle accident and a brief detour in a city based on his real observations on the road. A surprise box office hit in Mainland China despite tough competition from Hollywood blockbusters, Paths of the Soul is an ethereal and soul-cleansing experience that is best appreciated on the big screen.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film02.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film02.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-08-18 12:08:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署及華南電影工作者聯合會合辦，銀都機構有限公司、南方影業有限公司及中國電影基金會協辦|Jointly presented by LCSD and South China Film Industry Workers Union; in association with Sil-Metropole Organisation Ltd., Southern Film Co., Ltd. and China Film Foundation|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85237_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85237_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-18 06:32:36.000
86280|《亂》─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“Ran” - Repertory Cinema 2017 "In Memory of Japanese Film Master: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira"|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年11月11日 (六) 晚上 7:30 及2017年11月19日 (日) 下午 2:30|11 Nov 2017 (Sat) 7:30pm and19 Nov 2017 (Sun) 2:30pm|160分鐘|160 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|蒼天無語問人間	戰國時代，征戰半生的諸侯秀虎（仲代達矢）決定在七十歲時退位，安享晚年。他把領地一分為三，分給兒子太郎、次郎及三郎。三郎（隆大介）深知兩位兄長俱非孝子，一分身家就會作反，於是公然頂撞老父，望他收回成命。忠言逆耳，秀虎把三郎驅逐，他的一份由太郎及次郎瓜分。果然，領地及軍隊到手後，太郎及次郎想將秀虎除掉。秀虎拾回小命，除了忠心的弄臣狂阿彌不離不棄，秀虎一無所有，更變得瘋癲。三郎以德報怨，問鄰國借兵，誓要為老父討回公道。繼1957 年的《蜘蛛巢城》，黑澤明再一次把莎劇帶到日本戰國時代，這次將《李爾王》的三個女兒變成三個兒子，並加重了太郎妻子阿楓（原田美枝子）的戲份。經黑澤明處理，李爾王的故事已不再是「忠言逆耳」的教訓，而是人類不願和睦共處、故意挑起紛爭的劣根性。老天並非視而不見，而是被人類的殘酷傷透了心。黑澤明繼《影武者》 (1980) 後，再次從外國籌集資金拍攝古裝鉅著，這次黑澤明更有雄心壯志，戰爭場面比《影武者》更為浩大，為了拍攝秀虎被太郎次郎圍攻一場，黑澤明興建實物原大的城堡，再一把火燒毀。黑澤明在七十五歲高齡，終於拍出自己滿意的力作，過往被問及最愛自己哪一部作品，他總是回答：「下一部」，《亂》成為他以後的答案。假如《蜷川馬克白》感動了你，就更應看看黑澤明怎樣把日式莎士比亞推到難以超越的境界。|The Incorrigible Evilness of Mankind	At the age of 70, the war-weary warlord Hidetora (Nakadai Tatsuya) decides to step down. He plans to divide his domain among his three sons and expects to enjoy his remaining days in their reverence. Saburo (Ryu Daisuke), the youngest son, speaks out against such plan as folly. Hidetora cuts Saburo out of his inheritance and let his brothers take his share. With their land and armies secure, Saburo's brothers can't wait to get their father out of the picture. Hidetora, stripped of everything but alive,lost his sanity. All he has left is his faithful joker Kyoami. Meanwhile, Saburo forgives his father's cruelty andm attempts an invasion against his brothers. Ran is another attempt by Kurosawa to set a Shakespeare play in Japan's feudal times. The three daughters of King Lear are now Hidetora's three sons. Kanade's (HaradaMieko) role as the first daughter-in-law is expanded. In Kurosawa's adaptation, Lear's foolishness of believing sweet-talk has been lifted to another level, and the message is a lament on mankind's evilness. The infighting of mankind has reduced the gods to tears.After Kagemusha (1980), Kurosawa once again turned to foreign investors to realize his vision of the ultimate period spectacle. In this film Kurosawa had more confidence and envisioned battle scenes more stunning than those in Kagemusha. Kurosawa went so far as to build a real-sizecastle, only to burn it down in a climatic scene. At the age of 75, Kurosawa finally made that one film of his dreams. He used to look forward to his next film as his best, but Ran became his definite favourite. Viewers who enjoyed the recent Ninagawa Macbeth performances would surelyenjoy this pinnacle of Japanized Shakespeare.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film12.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film12.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-09-28 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86280_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86280_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 02:30:56.000
86281|《赤鬍子》─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“Red Beard” - Repertory Cinema 2017 "In Memory of Japanese Film Master: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira"|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年11月12日 (日) 下午 2:30|12 Nov 2017 (Sun) 2:30pm|185分鐘|185 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|俠骨仁心	幕府時代末年，年輕醫師保本（加山雄三）於長崎學習西洋醫術後回到東京。他自恃學識淵博，一心以成為幕府大將軍御醫為目標，但回來後卻被派到新出醫師（三船敏郎）打理的貧民診所。新出綽號「赤鬍子」，醫術高超，卻甘心放棄榮華富貴，服務貧苦大眾，不過他擇善固執的作風，令自視過高的保本不以為然，刻意和新出對抗。保本碰釘後，逐漸看清自己的愚昧，亦見到不少病人背後的慘痛故事。新出和保本醫的不只是病，還要醫治社會的貧困及無知。1960年代的日本影業因為電視蓬勃而陷入空前危機，票房在十年間暴跌三分二，《赤鬍子》背負着振興日本電影的期望。片廠以為拍攝電視看不到的類型，就能令觀眾進戲院，於是暴力、色情、黑幫、怪獸片、「無責任」喜劇大行其道。《赤鬍子》是一個電視台也能便宜地拍得出的題材，黑澤明卻用最高昂的成本，用三年時間拍出來。他將故事的小區從無到有搭建起來，遍尋最殘舊的建材，一絲不苟地造出最破落的古代貧民區，這個佈景「出場」時間卻非常少。演員的排練精益求精，圍讀時也要全副古裝，令演員完全進入角色，在黑澤明全部作品中，《赤鬍子》的演出可謂數一數二。新出堅持在悲慘世界行善，將好心傳播出去。黑澤明拒絕跟隨影業黃及黑的濁流，認同電視觀眾對溫情的需求，用最認真的製作態度，給觀眾帶來最深刻的觀影體驗。本片是黑澤明及三船敏郎最後一次合作，亦是黑澤明一個創作時期的終結。|Physician with a Samurai's Soul	After some years of studying Western medicine in Nagasaki, the young Yasumoto (Kayama Yuzo) returns to Tokyo and all set to become the Shogun's attending physician in future. His pride is squashed when he is assigned to be an intern at a government clinic serving the poor. Niide, aka Red Beard, is in charge of the clinic. Niide gives up a life of ease in order to help the poor but his benevolent but dictatorial ways are openly challenged by Yasumoto. Yasumoto's pride does him no good, he gradually understands Niide and becomes more compassionate to patients. Niide and Yasumoto aren't just fighting diseases, their real opponents are poverty and ignorance of the society.Red Beard as a film had its own mission as well. The Japanese film industry in the 1960s was in deep trouble as attendance plummeted to a third, due to the competition of TV. Naturally the film industry turned out products that wouldn't make it to the TV screen, and cinemas were dominated by slashers, yakuza or erotic flicks, monster movies or "irresponsible salarymen" comedies.Red Beard might as well be produced by television quickly and cheaply but Kurosawa spared no expense and took three years to complete it. He had his builders construct a real-size Tokyo slum with the most weathered material that could be found. Yet such an authentic set had little screen time. Actors were minutely rehearsed, on Kurosawa's order they had to be in full costumes even in reading sessions. In terms of performance, Red Beard is among the top in all Kurosawa's output.Niide keeps on doing good in the miserable world. Kurosawa refused to turn out trashy or immoral films and from the taste demonstrated by TV viewers, he recognized their need for heartwarming entertainment. Red Beard is a work made with the utmost care and sincerity. This film is the last of the legendary Kurosawa-Mifune collaboration and marks the end of a phase for Kurosawa.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film11.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film11.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-09-28 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86281_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86281_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 02:39:47.000
84004|《胭脂扣》－ 瑰寶情尋：繾綣人間|“Rouge” - Archival Gems – Enchanting Shadows|inc4|inc4sc5|2018年2月4日 (日) 下午2:30|4 February 2018 (Sun) 2:30pm|93分鐘|93min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|「如夢如幻月，若即若離花」。三十年代塘西名妓如花（梅艷芳）戀上南北行太子爺十二少（張國榮），然而不被男方父母接納，結果雙雙吞服鴉片殉情。如花在陰間苦候十二少不果，五十年後重返陽間，追查其下落。八十年代踏入回歸過渡期，香港人開始回望過去，尋找身份認同。李碧華的原著小說巧妙地借本土歷史，寫出兼具浪漫和靈異的淒美故事，對比新舊兩代的戀愛態度，也隱含港人對未來的憂慮。電影版更是港片經典之作，場景調度精緻，情感表達細膩，鏡頭自然流暢。以情愛主線縫合觀眾的情感，召喚歷史與身份的缺失，惹懷舊如煙四起，散向「五十年不變」隱喻的陰魂。	&copy; 2010星空華文傳媒電影有限公司 保留所有權利|An award-winning venture that has gainedaccolades in film festivals all over the world, the film's plot centres arounda female ghost who comes back to modern Hong Kong 50 years after her death tosearch for her lover, who was supposed to have committed suicide with her. Herstory moves between the present and the past, reflexively commenting on thecultural changes that have taken place in half a century. The decadent glamour,courtly etiquettes and consuming passions of the love story set in the high-endbrothels of pre-war Hong Kong are not only contrasted sharply with theblandness of modern life in the 1980s but also manifest a sense of localidentity as fuelled by nostalgia. Stanley Kwan's exquisite&nbsp;mise-en-scène&nbsp;with fluid cameramovements and compositions by turns sumptuous and evocative, realises adelicate expression of emotions rarely found in Hong Kong films.	&copy; 2010 Fortune Star Media Limited All Rights Reserved.|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ag/film07.html|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ag/film07.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|設映後談，講者蕭恆|To follow with Post-screening talk with Sam Ho|2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-07-06 12:07:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P84004_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P84004_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-07-18 10:13:57.000
86267|《姿三四郎》─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“Sanshiro Sugata” - Repertory Cinema 2017 "In Memory of Japanese Film Master: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira"|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月28日 (六) 下午 2:00|28 Oct 2017 (Sat) 2:00pm|79分鐘|79 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|平地一聲雷	明治維新時期，青年姿三四郎本欲拜柔術師傅門馬為師，豈料門馬帶一眾人馬伏擊柔道師傅矢野，卻被矢野一人打得落花流水。姿三四郎成為矢野徒弟，改學柔道。粗略而言，柔道是改良了的柔術，兩者之爭，實際是爭奪警隊武術教頭職位之利益紛爭。姿三四郎既要鍛鍊克敵之本領，更重要是要學懂無私之心，對武術心無雜念，哪管競賽隨時喪命或奪命，或者愛上了對手的女兒。原著本為報章連載小說，單行本一出版，黑澤明便買回家，即晚看完，不等到明天上班便在凌晨一時半到監製的家，請他勸東寶購入版權。作者之妻知道黑澤明是有前途的新人，說服丈夫將版權賣給東寶，不要賣給松竹及大映，成就了黑澤明的平地一聲雷。黑澤明以精心設計的構圖、演員的身體語言，取代了喋喋不休的對白。他亦加入了原著所沒有，姿三四郎在水池中看見蓮花而頓悟的情節，是影片一個經典場面。影片公映時，日本正值二戰，戰況膠着，漸呈敗象，日本人看到的影片大多數都是內容單調蒼白的「國策電影」，《姿三四郎》帶來清新的氣象，叫好叫座。二戰時的日本有嚴苛的檢查制度，官僚對黑澤明諸多留難，幸得小津安二郎力挺，揚言：「如果滿分是一百分，我給《姿三四郎》一百二十分！」六十年後，杜琪峯以《柔道龍虎榜》 (2004) 向黑澤明致敬，除了郭富城的造型和本片的藤田進相似，也搬演了結尾的草叢決戰，絕對值得杜迷反覆細味。|Kurosawa's Stunning Debut	Set in the early days of the Meiji Era. The young Sanshiro Sugata wishes to become a pupil of jujitsu master Monma. But Monma and his pupils suffer a disgraceful defeat at the hands of judo master Yano, who handles them singlehandedly. Sugata shifts to judo and becomes Yano's pupil. Roughly speaking, judo is an improved form of jujitsu, and the two schools are then in a deadly conflict for supremacy.The winner will be recognised by the police, who will employ the followers of the winning school as martial artsinstructors. On top of fighting skills, Sugata must undergo spiritual enlightenment to be a true master. He must be selfless in his actions and fully concentrated on his judo. Hemust not be distracted by the thought of death, nor by the confusion of falling in love with his opponent's daughter.When the serialised novel appeared in book form, Kurosawa bought it and devoured the whole book that very evening. Then Kurosawa visited his producer at 1:30am, asking him to get Toho to acquire its film rights.Rival companies Shochiku and Daiei were also interested, but Mrs. Tomita, having read somewhere that Kurosawawas an important talent, convinced her husband to sell the rights to Toho, and the rest is history.Kurosawa's masterly use of framing and body language saved this film a lot of dialogue. He added a pivotal scenenot in the original, that is the moment when Sugata is finally enlightened at the sight of a lotus flower in the pond. At the film's release, Japan was in the depths ofWWII and the days were getting harsher. Sanshiro Sugata gave audience a break from the stiffening propagandafilms of the era and it was a big hit.During the war Japan imposed a strict censorship system and this film ran into troubles. But Ozu bravely defendedthe film by saying, "if the full mark is 100, I'm giving Sanshiro Sugata 120!". 60 years later, Johnnie To paidtribute to Kurosawa and this very film by making his own judo film Throw Down (2004), incorporating many elements of Kurosawa's, including the final showdown in the grass.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film01.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film01.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-09-28 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86267_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86267_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 02:45:20.000
86272|《醜聞》─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“Scandal” - Repertory Cinema 2017: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月29日 (日) 下午 2:30|29 Oct 2017 (Sun) 2:30pm|104分鐘|104 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|言論自由淪為暴力	年青畫家青江（三船敏郎）在伊豆山上寫生時，偶遇新晉女歌手西条（山口淑子），碰巧他們也訂了同一間旅館，閒談時被八卦雜誌的記者拍了照。八卦雜誌亂作故事，說青江和西条是去了偷情，雜誌大賣。青江不甘女方清譽被損，決定控告雜誌誹謗，三流律師蛭田（志村喬）自薦，青江見他有個患肺癆的女兒，相信蛭田是個好人而委以重任。雜誌不但聘請著名法學家出庭，還看準了蛭田的弱點：嗜賭、要錢替女兒治病，加以收買。軍國主義對思想的壓逼，在戰後得到解放，可是言論自由和言論暴力，不過是一線之隔。黑澤明在火車內，見到八卦雜誌以「女明星貞操被誰奪去」為題大賣廣告，對傳媒的無恥深感噁心，決意用本片來抗議傳媒歪風。他沒有在自傳中明言的，是他也曾被八卦雜誌大做文章，大寫他在擔任《馬》(1941)的助導期間，和片中女主角，當時只得十六歲的高峰秀子熱戀。《醜聞》除了是黑澤明在《羅生門》(1950)前的最後一部作品，也是他「戰後」階段的終結，黑澤明從《美好星期天》(1947)起一連五部作品，描畫日本從廢墟中再生，以及期間的生活困苦及道德敗壞。即使不少論者以及黑澤明自己，對本片的重心從兩位原告轉移到律師蛭田感到不快，但未嘗不能視之為《留芳頌》(1952)（由志村喬擔綱）的熱身。而且在黑澤明一貫正邪分明的人物及故事之中，取材自一位真實人物的蛭田代表了很多處於極正及極邪之間，為了「搵餐晏」而傷害別人的人，《醜聞》點出了這種人的覺醒，就足以令邪不能勝正。|The Abuse of Free Press	On an outing to the Izu mountains, young painter Aoe (Mifune Toshiro) has a chance encounter with the upcoming singer Saijo (Yamaguchi Yoshiko). Another coincidence is that they've booked the same inn. Paparazzi take their photos and fabricate a sleazy tabloid story. Aoe plans to take the tabloid to court so that Saijo's reputation can be restored. Smalltime lawyer Hiruta (Shimura Takashi) offers his service. Seeing that Hiruta has a TB-stricken daughter, Aoe appoints him as his attorney. But the tabloid is all prepared for action. A well-known law scholar represents the tabloid and it is ready to buy Hiruta out. Hiruta has a habit of gambling and he has lots of medical bills to take care of.The postwar press took advantage of the newfound freedom. But freedom of the press could just be steps away from a kind of violence. Kurosawa was offended by a tabloid's advertisement on a train: "Who took XXX's virginity?", which sparked this protest film against yellow journalism. In his autobiography Kurosawa hinted that he was also written up by tabloids, but he omitted what was written about him: his affair with the then 16-year-old Takamine Hideko during the shooting of Horse (1941), of which Kurosawa was the assistant director, and Takamine the star actress.Not only Scandal was the last film before his international breakthrough Rashomon (1950), it also concluded his postwar phase. Starting from One Wonderful Sunday (1947) Kurosawa depicted the material deprivation and moral degradation of Japan right after the war.Many commentators of Scandal, including Kurosawa, were unhappy with the fact that Hiruta stole the show in the second half. But we may see this as a warm-up for To Live (1952), which has Shimura in the male lead. Hiruta was based on a real character that Kurosawa chanced upon. Hiruta is indeed one of the majority between the absolute good and the absolute evil in Kurosawa's world. Hiruta, like many, is willing to hurt his fellows to stay away from hunger. Scandal shows us the awakening of such characters is all that is needed for justice to prevail.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film04.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film04.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-09-28 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86272_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86272_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 02:43:56.000
86591|《座談會》─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“Seminar” - Repertory Cinema 2017 "In Memory of Japanese Film Master: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira"|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月29日 (日) 下午 4:30|29 Oct 2017 (Sun) 4:30pm|不適用|Not Applicable|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|免費入場|Free Admission|||http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/seminar.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/seminar.html|||講者: 羅維明、朗天、劉偉霖 粵語主講|Speakers: Law Waiming、Long Tin、William LauConducted in Cantonese|2734 2900|||||康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86591_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86591_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 02:44:39.000
86275|《七俠四義》─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“Seven Samurai” - Repertory Cinema 2017 "In Memory of Japanese Film Master: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira"|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年11月3日 (五) 晚上 7:00 及2017年11月18日 (六) 下午 2:30|3 Nov 2017 (Fri) 7:00pm and 18 Nov 2017 (Sat) 2:30pm|207分鐘|207 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|雖千萬人吾往矣	無業武士淪為山賊，農民收割就去搶清光，官府愛理不理，但稅照收。農村長老知道不反抗也只有餓死一途，決定聘請另一些無業武士守衛村莊。酬勞沒有真金白銀，只有三餐一宿，贏了沒有功名財帛，輸了就落陰曹地府。智勇雙全的老武士勘兵衛（志村喬）被村民的真誠感動，物色多六位成員，包括假冒武士、只得匹夫之勇的菊千代（三船敏郎）。勘兵衛將村莊當成戰場，動員全體農民向山賊頑抗，不能把山賊全部殲滅，就要以滅村收場。黑澤明用「茶泡飯」去比喻日本電影，營養不足，他要拍出像鰻魚飯、炸豬扒般令人滿腹又心足的電影。他最初想拍一般古裝片未之曾有的題材，例如武士一天的生活，但編劇橋本忍搜集資料時，從文獻見到一兩句農民聘請武士護村的記載，成為《七俠四義》的靈感。黑澤明最後拍出一部比一般電影長兩倍、貴五倍、上映延期半年，拍攝期間兩次差點被東寶停拍的鉅作。雖然黑澤明不是存心將日本時代劇及美國西部片結合，但他也意識到本片和西部片有類同，最大的分別，就是西部片的沙漠中，絕對不會有本片氣勢磅礡的雨中決戰。翻拍本片的《七俠蕩寇誌》(1960)的藝術成就遠不及本片，但令這個故事流傳更廣。《留芳頌》(1952)的渡邊課長知道死期將至，才決心去做一件惠及社群的好事，《七俠四義》的英雄主義倍加悲壯，沒有酬勞捨身取義不特止，農民不會衷心感激，還怪你吃他們那麼多白米飯。這正是黑澤明的俠氣所在，勘兵衛留下一句「我們又輸了，贏的是農民」，瀟灑離去，留下四個義士的無名塚，犧牲只有天知。|The Ultimate Sacrifice	Unemployed samurai become bandits and raid a village over and over, taking its precious crops. The peasants still have to pay their taxes but the magistrate refuses to take action. In the face of starvation, the village elder decides to employ some other unemployed samurai to defend the village. No money can be offered, only food and shelter. Veteran warrior Kanbei (Shimura Takashi) is moved by the villagers' plight and he recruits six more fighters, including the rash Kikuchiyo (Mifune Toshiro) who makes false claims of his samurai lineage. Kanbei prepares his defence just like a battle, with the aim of killing all the bandits.Kurosawa considered Japanese cinema to be like "Green Tea over Rice", a metaphor for undernourishment and possibly a pun on Ozu. He wished to make films that give nourishment and satisfaction, just like having a bowl of eel on rice or pork cutlets. At first this project was to depict a day in the life of a samurai, a topic not touched upon by jidaigeki. But Hashimoto discovered from historical documents that a village once employed samurai to combat bandits. That clue inspired this epic, which is doubly long and five times more expensive than a typical film. Toho tried twice to pull the plug when Kurosawa ran over budget.Although it wasn't Kurosawa's intention to mix the Western with the jidaigeki, he was  nonetheless aware of the similarities. But the climatic battle in the rain will never happen in the desert of a Western. The Magnificent Seven (1960) was a lesser remake but managed to bring this story to the world.Watanabe of To Live (1952) makes up his mind to do something good when he finds out his days are numbered. But the heroism of Seven Samurai takes on a higher level as our heroes actually get nothing for risking their lives. To make it worse, the peasants consider them well paid and show them no real gratitude. This is Kurosawa's chivalry at its best. Kanbei leaves the village behind with the words, "We lose again. The peasants are the winners." The harrowing final shot shows the graves of the four slain samurai.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film06.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film06.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-09-28 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with JAPAN Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86275_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86275_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 02:39:03.000
86232|《小城之春》－ 小城內外的韋偉|“Spring in a Small Town” - From Small Town to the Big Screen: A Retrospective on Wei Wei|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月5日 (四) 下午7:00|5 October 2017 (Thu) 7:00PM|98分鐘|98min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$45|$45|話說1937年北平城的胡同裡，住了一個小資家庭──一個寡婦帶著四個兒子和三個女兒過活。蘆溝橋事變，北平淪陷，兒女被迫各散東西。抗戰勝利，一家難得團圓，卻又爆發內戰，兒女又要自奔前程。此作時代氣味濃厚，一眾演員可說一時之盛──大哥石羽，憂鬱壓抑，跟《小城之春》裡的丈夫一脈相承；二哥藍馬，手托鳥籠，嘴裡哼著京劇，好一個胡同少爺子；三哥孫道臨，從忸忸怩怩的偽文青，變成了滿口洋語的翻譯官……別忘了二姐韋偉，爽朗、率性、前衛，走在時代的前緣，絕對本色的演出。		鳴謝中國電影資料館|Two cottages stand quietly on the tranquility of the countryside. Off the screen, music can be faintly heard. A woman can be seen by herself, on the walls of the city ruins, gazing at the waning shadows of the three who are walking away. Fei Mu’s camera takes us along as the woman walks home, entering into the intimate realm of her thoughts. &nbsp;Her dream-like murmurs… Are they memories? Or are they figments of her fancy? Since when had Chinese cinema taken us so close to its characters? Wei Wei has said, many times: To have a chance to play this role, I’m satisfied. Indeed, Wei Wei is Yuwen, Yuwen is Wei Wei. Together, they have become legends of Chinese cinema.&nbsp;		Screening courtesy of China Film Archive|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ww/spring-in-a-small-town.html|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ww/spring-in-a-small-town.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-06 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86232_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86232_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-08 04:28:27.000
86277|《惡漢甜夢 》─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“The Bad Sleep Well” - Repertory Cinema 2017 "In Memory of Japanese Film Master: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira"|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年11月5日 (日) 晚上 7:30|5 Nov 2017 (Sun) 7:30pm|151分鐘|151 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|冤冤相報何時了	幸一（三船敏郎）是私生子，其父任職政府部門「日本未利用土地開發公團」，五年前因為一宗招標貪污事件畏罪自殺。幸一知道父親只是代罪羔羊，不惜和好友掉換身份，混進該部門等候復仇機會，他不單成為副總裁岩淵（森雅之）的私人秘書，更娶了他傷殘的女兒佳子（香川京子）。在岩淵的領導下，「土地開發公團」有如一部貪污機器，幸一除了將罪證暗中傳給警察，還拯救了打算為高層自殺頂罪的副課長，利用他來實現復仇大計。不過幸一對佳子心中有愧，讓兵敗如山倒的岩淵有反撲的機會。黑澤明拍攝《武士勤王記》 (1958) 時，因為超支問題和東寶鬧得不快，拍完該片後他完成了和東寶的合約，決定開設自己的製作公司，雖然繼續和東寶合作，但有更大的自主及財務責任。本片是「黑澤製作」的創業作，黑澤明連拍了三部古裝片後，應影迷要求開拍當代題材。日本政府及財團的貪污事件一單接一單，經常以低級職員自殺，高層消遙法外而不了了之。在黑澤明眼中，官員瀆職是罪大惡極。日文片名解作「壞人愈壞，睡得愈甜」，盡見黑澤明的憤慨。影片沒有道明，但故事及人物明顯取材自莎士比亞《哈姆雷特》，該劇和《馬克白》（黑澤明將它改編成《蜘蛛巢城》 (1957)）是黑澤明最愛的兩部莎劇。經過黑澤明的反思，幸一的弱點並非哈姆雷特的遲疑，而是無法泯滅的良心。如何在儆惡懲奸的同時，不令自己變成魔鬼，是英雄最難過的一關，大家以為「超級英雄片」的新發現，黑澤明一早就想出來了。|Revenge as a Capital Sin	Koichi (Mifune Toshiro) is an illegitimate son of a government official in a land department. Koichi's father kills himself after being suspected of rigging a tender.Koichi knows his father is just a scapegoat and he wants revenge. He takes on his best friend's identity, joins that very department and works his way up. He becomes the trusted secretary of Vice President Iwabuchi (Mori Masayuki) and marries his handicapped daughter Yoshiko(Kagawa Kyoko). Iwabuchi is running his department to be a corruption machine. Koichi passes on incriminatingevidence to the police, he also rescues a sub-head from suicide and uses him as a pawn in the revenge scheme. YetYoshiko is the weakest link.When shooting The Hidden Fortress (1958), Kurosawa had serious conflicts with Toho when he once again went overbudget. That film was Kurosawa's last in his contract with Toho. So he took this opportunity to start his production company, shouldering more financial responsibilities in exchange for more artistic freedom. As the first film of Kurosawa Productions, The Bad Sleep Well was Kurosawa'sanswer to a fan's complaint that he made too many period dramas. In real life, cases after cases of corruptionscandals hit the headlines, and those cases always ended with the suicides of low-ranking officials, while the real culprits went unpunished. Kurosawa considered corruption as a serious crime and the Japanese title which literally means "The worse you are the better you sleep" shows Kurosawa's disgust.Without an overt credit, Shakespeare's Hamlet was Kurosawa's reference. Hamlet and Macbeth were Kurosawa's favourite Shakespare plays and Macbeth was already "Japanized" by him as Throne of Blood (1957). But what causes Koichi's downfall is not indecision. Instead, it's his fear of becoming evil when he's out to combat evil. So, many decades before our superhero movies, Kurosawa had already thought of such matters.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film08.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film08.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-09-28 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86277_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86277_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 02:41:53.000
85239|《血狼犬》─ 中國電影展2017|“The Blood Hound” - Chinese Film Panorama 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月22日 (日) 下午2:00|22 Oct 2017 (Sun) 2:00pm|95分鐘|95 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|中國西北某林場也是野狼保護區，護林員老朱要靠馴養狼犬守護林場，防止不法之徒偷木和盜獵。偶然收養了一隻流浪小狗，取名藍波，經過訓練竟通曉人性，既是好幫手，又是兩個女兒的好玩伴。張彪多次盜獵野狼，曾被老朱舉報入獄，如今出獄向老朱報復。先是陷害藍波不遂，再向老朱的女兒下手，最後自然是義犬出動救主。故事已成類型，好在設定在西北林場背景，景色壯麗不在話下，而小狼犬馴訓成材，過程也特有趣。對比之下得見：人有獸性、狼有人性，但馴人比馴狼卻難好多。|Working as a forest ranger in the woods of northwestern China, Zhu (Huang Hong) trains dogs to protect the forest from loggers and wolf poachers. One day, he takes in a stray dog – whom he names Rambo – and trains him to become part of his family. When wolf poacher Zhang Biao goes after Zhu for sending him to prison, it’s up to Rambo to come to the rescue of his human family. Based on the story of “The Canine King of the Northwest”, this family drama portrays the unbreakable bond between humans and their pets with the gorgeous views of northwestern China providing a backdrop for the action. The film may be about taming a wild dog into a domesticated pet, but it also makes a point to show that a man out of control is even more difficult to tame than wild wolves.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film03.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film03.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-08-18 12:08:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署及華南電影工作者聯合會合辦，銀都機構有限公司、南方影業有限公司及中國電影基金會協辦|Jointly presented by LCSD and South China Film Industry Workers Union; in association with Sil-Metropole Organisation Ltd., Southern Film Co., Ltd. and China Film Foundation|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85239_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85239_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-18 06:28:34.000
83994|《寒夜青燈》－ 瑰寶情尋：繾綣人間|“The Blue Lamp in Winter Night” - Archival Gems – Enchanting Shadows|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年11月5日 (日) 下午2:30|5 November 2017 (Sun) 2:30pm|90分鐘|90min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|姚鳳磐六十年代加入台灣影壇，先在李翰祥主持的國聯公司當編劇，1969年轉任導演，憑着一系列賣座恐怖片聲名大噪，贏得「鬼片之王」的稱譽。成名作《秋燈夜雨》（1974）公映翌年拍攝此片，同樣改編自，但此片的版本卻與李氏的《倩女幽魂》大異其趣。姚氏曾與李翰祥合作，深受影響，影片承襲了他流暢的調度，卻在傳統中國故事中加入各種西方電影元素，如陰森恐怖的氣氛、驚嚇性的妖魔造型、如殭屍般會吸血的女鬼等。片中特技效果或稍嫌簡陋，但故事發展峰迴路轉，最後更出人意表地來一個帶點荷里活兒童電影《綠野仙踪》影子的結局！飾演小倩的秦夢沒有樂蒂的優雅與哀怨，但多了一份現代氣息，可算是八十年代豪情飄逸的小倩形象之啟蒙。|Yao Fung-pan, like Sung Cheun-sau of&nbsp;Ghost of the Mirror, graduated from his tenure working with Li Han-hsiang in the1960s with an eye for ornate&nbsp;mise-en-scène&nbsp;and an ear for evocative historical dramas. Heembellished his version of Pu Songling's&nbsp;Nie Xiaoqian&nbsp;with elements of horror films from the West, from eerieatmospherics to grotesque makeup to blood sucking a la&nbsp;Dracula&nbsp;to a&nbsp;Wizard of Oz-like ending.Chiang Min's portrayal of the enchanting ghost Nie Xiaoqian may not be asgraceful and sorrowful as Betty Loh Ti, but her modern sensibilities arenonetheless precursors for the ones to come in the 1980s.|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ag/film04.html|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ag/film04.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|設映後談，講者何思穎|To follow with Post-screening talk with Sam Ho|2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-07-06 12:07:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P83994_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P83994_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-07-21 10:05:00.000
86256|《寂寞的心》－ 小城內外的韋偉|“The Foolish Heart” - From Small Town to the Big Screen: A Retrospective on Wei Wei|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月7日 (六) 下午5:30|7 October 2017 (Sat) 5:30pm|102分鐘|102min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$45|$45|《寂寞的心》是一個婚外情的故事，可說是《小城之春》的變奏，只是時空間不同了。韋偉從四十年代古舊的淞江小城，來到了五十年代摩登的東方之珠，素雅的旗袍修起腰身來，釘上閃亮的珠片，踏地無聲的繡花鞋長出了高跟，走起路來「咯咯咯」聲響，也確實為女性婀娜多姿的體態加添了一份聲勢。五十年代的香港，剛嚐過戰亂之苦，一切以穩定為先，道德倫常規範動彈不得；妻子做了出牆紅杏，卻能安然返回家門，且看總導演朱石麟如何在保守的倫理類型裡險走鋼線。|A story of extra-marital affair, The Foolish Heart can be regarded as a variation of Spring in a Small Town, as Wei Wei finds herself transposed from the ruins of 1940s River South to the metropolis of 1950s Hong Kong. Her modest, loose-fitting qipao gives way to sequined, body-hugging glamour and her embroidered cloth shoes are replaced by fancy high heels, complete with the sight and sound that announce the emergence of a new femininity. The 1950s was a time when lifestyles and values were tested, sometimes gingerly, other times boldly. This film about a woman who succumbs to desire is nothing less than challenging and bold and Wei Wei personifies the complexity of the woman’s struggles with natural sensuality and calibrated finesse.|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ww/the-foolish-heart.html|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ww/the-foolish-heart.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-06 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86256_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86256_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-08 04:30:34.000
86231|《大團圓》－ 小城內外的韋偉|“The Great Reunion” - From Small Town to the Big Screen: A Retrospective on Wei Wei|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月5日 (四) 中午2:30|5 October 2017 (Thu) 2:30pm|92分鐘|92min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$45|$45|話說1937年北平城的胡同裡，住了一個小資家庭──一個寡婦帶著四個兒子和三個女兒過活。蘆溝橋事變，北平淪陷，兒女被迫各散東西。抗戰勝利，一家難得團圓，卻又爆發內戰，兒女又要自奔前程。此作時代氣味濃厚，一眾演員可說一時之盛──大哥石羽，憂鬱壓抑，跟《小城之春》裡的丈夫一脈相承；二哥藍馬，手托鳥籠，嘴裡哼著京劇，好一個胡同少爺子；三哥孫道臨，從忸忸怩怩的偽文青，變成了滿口洋語的翻譯官……別忘了二姐韋偉，爽朗、率性、前衛，走在時代的前緣，絕對本色的演出。		鳴謝中國電影資料館|It’s 1937. In an alley deep inside Beijing lives a bourgeois family – a widow, her four sons and three daughters. The city falls after the Lugouqiao Incident into enemy hands and the children are forced to flee, scattered in all directions. Finally, war is over and the family is reunited but only to be driven apart again by the Civil War… This is a work about little people living in epic times, expressed in gentle vignettes of life unfolding amid the sweeping grandeur of history. It features an ensemble cast of exceptional performers, from Shi Yu as the repressed first-born, to Lan Ma as the carefree second brother, to Sun Daolin as the pretentious intellectual who goes on to become an English-flaunting official. Then there is Wei Wei as the second sister, at once genial, impulsive and progressive, very much the Wei Wei we have come to know and love.&nbsp;		Screening courtesy of China Film Archive|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ww/the-great-reunion.html|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ww/the-great-reunion.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|設映後談，講者黃愛玲|To follow with post-screening talk with Wong Ain Ling|2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-06 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86231_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86231_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-08 04:28:06.000
86276|《武士勤王記 》─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“The Hidden Fortress” - Repertory Cinema 2017 "In Memory of Japanese Film Master: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira"|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年11月4日 (六) 晚上 7:30|4 Nov 2017 (Sat) 7:30pm|139分鐘|139 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|穿越敵陣之復國路	戰國時代，秋月國被山名國所滅。農民太平（千秋實）及又七（藤原釜足）想藉戰爭立下功名，但抵達戰場時仗已打完。秋月國公主雪姬（上原美佐）逃脫，山名國懸紅捉拿。太平及又七被拉伕去挖掘秋月國的金庫，逃脫後一心回鄉，卻在山溪發現金條。原來秋月國的真壁將軍（三船敏郎）把金條藏在柴枝之內，用作復國的資金。他利誘太平及又七把柴枝／金條運到盟國，但途中必須穿越山名國，於是開展了一次驚險萬分的運金歷險，太平及又七沒有為意，雪姬其實就在他們身旁。這是黑澤明少數不帶信息，一心以娛樂為宗旨的作品，但在大師手下，依然不同凡響，氣魄遠超當時很流行但粗製濫造的時代劇。亡國主公出逃在時代劇不時見到，黑澤明大膽改成公主，更在全國徵募新面孔，上原美佐的剛烈形象令人眼前一亮，可惜她從影兩年便以自己沒有才華而息影。黑澤明初次使用寬銀幕，即見他對此新技術得心應手，角度、細節、剪接皆非同行可比。影片不少場面於富士山腳拍攝，但因為該年多颱風，一個打算用十日拍攝的場景要用一百日完成，可見黑澤明的認真及執着。本片對後世最大的影響，莫過於啟發了佐治盧卡斯的《星球大戰》(1977)，除了亡國公主的故事，太平及又七這對歡喜冤家，原來就是機械人C-3PO及R2-D2的「原型」。黑澤明以農民的視點去敘述故事，亦是他對此類時代劇慣例：以武士或貴族做主角的一次顛覆。影片呼應了黑澤明兩部戰時作品，一部是在戰爭尾聲拍攝的《踏虎尾》(1945)，另一部是黑澤明由小說改編，但當時無法開拍的《敵中橫斷三百里》。兩片故事時代不同，但主角都是要智勇俱全地穿過敵境，而《敵》則在森一生導演下，於1957年由大映拍成電影。|Under the Enemy's Nose	The Akizuki clan is annihilated by the Yamana clan. Peasants Tahei (Chiaki Minoru) and Matakishi (Fujiwara Kamatari) arrive too late at the battlefield. But their dreams of fortune aren't entirely over as a bounty is offered on capturing Akizuki's Princess Yuki (Uehara Misa). Tahei and Matakishi are forced into digging for Akizuki's hidden treasures but they make a bold escape. On their way home they discover a gold bar hidden inside a piece of firewood. This is one of many, as General Makabe (Mifune Toshiro) plans to smuggle these gold bars of Akizuki's to a friendly clan and restore their fallen clan. Tahei and Matakishi are lured by the promise of gold to embark on a dangerous trip through Yamana territory. But they have no idea that Princess Yuki is also on this trip.Kurosawa intended The Hidden Fortress to be an entertaining spectacle without any moralizing. But Kurosawa being Kurosawa, this film is still an extraordinary piece of filmmaking against the popular but cheaply-made jidaigeki of the time. A fallen prince on the run is a popular topic of period dramas, but Kurosawa changed it to a princess. A nationwide talent search was held for a new face to portray Princess Yuki. Uehara Misa got the part and her determined persona proved that such search was really necessary. Yet Uehara quit showbiz after two years, claiming that she had no acting talents. The Hidden Fortress was also Kurosawa' first film in widescreen and it showed Kurosawa has mastered the technology, achieving many eyepopping images not found in the work of contemporaries. Many scenes were shot on the foot of Fujiyama, a scene that was expected to complete in ten days was finally done in a hundred, because of an unusual amount of typhoons that summer. Still, this was proof of Kurosawa's insistence in getting what he wanted.The most longlasting influence of this film is probably its inspiration for Star Wars (1977). Apart from the "princess on the run" plot, the comic duo of Tahei and Matakishi turned out to be the "prototypes" for the robots C-3PO and R2-D2. Kurosawa chose to tell the story in the viewpoints of two peasants, and that subverted jidaigeki's convention of having the samurai to run the show.The Hidden Fortress was also a continuation or elaboration of two early works of Kurosawa. They Who Step on the Tiger's Tail (1945), and Advance Patrol, a script written by Kurosawa during the war but rejected for production. Though set in different eras, the two are both about running behind enemy lines. Advance Patrol was eventually filmed by Daiei's Mori Kazuo in 1957.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film07.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film07.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-09-28 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86276_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86276_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 02:43:07.000
85263|《師父》─ 中國電影展2017|“The Master” - Chinese Film Panorama 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月20日 (五) 晚上7:30|20 Oct 2017 (Fri) 7:30pm|109分鐘|109 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|武俠小說名家徐浩峰為王家衛編寫了《一代宗師》(2013) 之後自立門戶，實行自編自導功夫武俠片，亦受到影展關注。《師父》寫的也是南北派武術的交流衝擊，卻加進了民國軍閥勢力滲透武林，控制幫派以收為己用的背景，弄致武人互相仇視爭鬥，武德墮落。南派詠春傳人（廖凡）在天津設館授徒，想著以傳統「踢館」方式和同行公平較量，卻遇到種種惡勢力的阻撓和不測的變故，以致危及自身、妻子和徒弟性命。編導自任動作設計，創造出不少有所根據的招式，動作場面饒有新意，劇情節奏明快，是非一般的武術/武林鬥爭片。|One of the foremost martial arts novel writer in China and one of the writers on Wong Kar-wai’s The Grandmaster (2013), Xu Haofeng branches out to filmmaking on his own with an epic story about the price of ambition. Wing Chun grandmaster Chen (Liao Fan) moves from the south to Tianjin in hopes of fulfilling his late master’s wish of opening a school there. However, Chen encounters impossible terms set by the local martial arts committee and the increasing influence of local warlords in the martial arts world, resulting in a prolonged three-year struggle that would cost Chen everything he holds dear. In addition to writing and directing, Xu also choreographed the film’s fight sequences, creating moves that are rooted in each school’s history. This is an authentic and breathtaking wuxia film like no other.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film14.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film14.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-08-18 12:08:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署及華南電影工作者聯合會合辦，銀都機構有限公司、南方影業有限公司及中國電影基金會協辦|Jointly presented by LCSD and South China Film Industry Workers Union; in association with Sil-Metropole Organisation Ltd., Southern Film Co., Ltd. and China Film Foundation|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85263_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85263_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-18 06:40:52.000
85262|《師父》─ 中國電影展2017|“The Master” - Chinese Film Panorama 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月7日 (六) 下午3:00|7 Oct 2017 (Sat) 3:00pm|109分鐘|109 min|73810020|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|武俠小說名家徐浩峰為王家衛編寫了《一代宗師》(2013) 之後自立門戶，實行自編自導功夫武俠片，亦受到影展關注。《師父》寫的也是南北派武術的交流衝擊，卻加進了民國軍閥勢力滲透武林，控制幫派以收為己用的背景，弄致武人互相仇視爭鬥，武德墮落。南派詠春傳人（廖凡）在天津設館授徒，想著以傳統「踢館」方式和同行公平較量，卻遇到種種惡勢力的阻撓和不測的變故，以致危及自身、妻子和徒弟性命。編導自任動作設計，創造出不少有所根據的招式，動作場面饒有新意，劇情節奏明快，是非一般的武術/武林鬥爭片。|One of the foremost martial arts novel writer in China and one of the writers on Wong Kar-wai’s The Grandmaster (2013), Xu Haofeng branches out to filmmaking on his own with an epic story about the price of ambition. Wing Chun grandmaster Chen (Liao Fan) moves from the south to Tianjin in hopes of fulfilling his late master’s wish of opening a school there. However, Chen encounters impossible terms set by the local martial arts committee and the increasing influence of local warlords in the martial arts world, resulting in a prolonged three-year struggle that would cost Chen everything he holds dear. In addition to writing and directing, Xu also choreographed the film’s fight sequences, creating moves that are rooted in each school’s history. This is an authentic and breathtaking wuxia film like no other.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film14.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film14.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-08-18 12:08:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署及華南電影工作者聯合會合辦，銀都機構有限公司、南方影業有限公司及中國電影基金會協辦|Jointly presented by LCSD and South China Film Industry Workers Union; in association with Sil-Metropole Organisation Ltd., Southern Film Co., Ltd. and China Film Foundation|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85262_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85262_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-18 06:52:59.000
86271|《靜靜的決鬥》─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“The Quiet Duel” - Repertory Cinema 2017 "In Memory of Japanese Film Master: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira"|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月28日 (六) 晚上 7:30 及2017年11月11日 (六) 下午 5:00|28 Oct 2017 (Sat) 7:30pm and 11 Nov 2017 (Sat) 5:00pm|95分鐘|95 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|無罪之罰	外科醫生藤崎（三船敏郎）在戰時擔任軍醫，因一時方便脫下手套，被手術刀割傷後繼續做手術，從一位傷兵的血液感染梅毒。戰後藤崎回到父親的診所執業，卻不知如何面對等了他六年的未婚妻，他既不忍心把性病傳給她，也不想她繼續等下去。舞蹈員瑠衣被壞男人始亂終棄，又有了他的孩子，藤崎收留她做護士，她發現藤崎偷用診所的梅毒特效藥，誤會這位正人君子也不過是髒男人一名。黑澤明在1948 年經歷了長達半年的東寶大罷工，轉和大映合作。影片改編自話劇《墮胎醫生》，是黑澤明作品中唯一改編當代戲劇的影片。編寫劇本期間，黑澤明一度將片名改成《無罪之罰》，和自己最愛的杜斯妥也夫斯基相對照，但大映管理層覺得這個片名在鄉下會沒人看，勸黑澤明把片名改回。此外，美軍審查本片大綱時，覺得原著中藤崎最後因梅毒發狂的結局，會令大眾對醫生失去信心，指示要改成樂觀的結局。三船敏郎雖然因此沒有了發狂的戲份，但本片在他的演藝生涯揭開了重要一頁。事緣三船在黑澤明及他師父山本嘉次郎大力推薦而入行後，所演的多是壞人或惡霸的角色，包括和黑澤明首度合作的《酩酊天使》 (1948)，粗豪形象幾已成形。黑澤明頂住了大映的反對，堅持起用三船演這個知識型、理性、謙厚的醫生角色，令人眼前一亮。影片的高潮是藤崎在得悉愛人婚訊後，向瑠衣剖白內心的苦痛，當中有一個三分四十秒的長鏡頭，不單令攝影師熱淚盈眶，就連黑澤明也忘記了叫Cut。|Punishment without Crime	During the war, army surgeon Fujisaki (Mifune Toshiro) cuts his finger during an operation. Without tending to the cut Fujisaki keeps on operating on a soldier and gets infected by syphilis from his blood. After the war Fujisaki goes back to work at his father's clinic, but he keeps his syphilis a secret. He rejects his fiancée who has waited six years for him, simply out of the fear of trasmitting the diseaseto her. The dancer Rui is impregnated then dumped by a playboy. Fujisaki takes her on as a nurse but Rui finds out that he's been taking syphilis medicine in secret.Toho was embroiled in strikes in 1948. Kurosawa turned to Daiei and made The Quiet Duel there. It was based on theplay The Abortionist and it's the only time that Kurosawa adapted a modern play to screen. During rewrites of thescript, Kurosawa changed the title to Punishment without Crime, an obvious nod to his beloved Dostoyevsky. ButDaiei rejected the new title as rural audiences would turn away from it. When the story outline was submittedto the American forces for approval, Kurosawa was requested to change the ending, in which Fujisaki becomesmad because of syphilis, to a positive one, for fear of jeoparding public confidence in doctors.Although Mifune missed the chance of a mad scene, The Quiet Duel was still an important movie for him. Mifune joined Toho on the recommendation of Kurosawa and his mentor Yamamoto Kajiro. Mifune gave a memorable performance in Kurosawa's Drunken Angel (1948) butafter that his roles were either criminals or rednecks. Against Daiei's opposition, Kurosawa cast Mifune as this bookish and courteous doctor and helped Mifune break out of his mold. The climax of this film is Fujisaki's solioquy after knowing that his fiancée has married another man.In a long take lasting 3 minutes and 40 seconds, Mifune gave such an awesome performance that left the camera operator in tears, and Kurosawa, stunned, forgot tosay "cut".|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film03.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film03.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-09-28 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86271_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86271_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 02:40:47.000
86233|《江湖兒女》－ 小城內外的韋偉|“The Show Must Go On” - From Small Town to the Big Screen: A Retrospective on Wei Wei|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月6日 (五) 下午7:00|6 October 2017 (Fri) 7:00PM|91分鐘|91min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$45|$45|一群雜技藝人流浪到了香港，受盡剝削，新中國成立了，他們思念祖國，一起重投祖國的懷抱。不同的時代，不同的曲調。故事主幹來自費穆，但他於1951年心臟病發去世，影片由朱石麟和編劇齊聞韶聯合導演。閒談中，韋偉說要是由費穆執導，一定會苦中有樂；是的，人生本來就是哀樂相生。且看片中的韋偉，表演啞子背瘋時固然活靈活現，得意忘形，單雙杆轉碟、騎獨輪單車等高難度的動作也難不到她，不用靠剪接的掩眼法。看得出，她真的是愛演戲。		是次放映的為孤本影帶，惟聲畫欠佳，敬請見諒。|A band of acrobats are stranded in Hong Kong, enduring hardships of every shade. With the establishment of New China, the men and women of the show, their hearts tied to the motherland, bound for home together. The story came from the great director Fei Wu, who unfortunately passed away in 1951 before he could realise it on film. The project was directed instead by veteran Zhu Shilin and scriptwriter Qi Wenshao. Wei Wei had always felt that had Fei been able to helm the film, it would be at once bitter and sweet, as life often is. But Wei’s performance in the film is exempt entirely from bitterness, as she throws herself into her character, mounting difficult acrobatic acts with aplomb and abandon, all without stunt doubles and special effects.&nbsp;		The Betacam tape used for this screening is a sole copy; the image and sound quality is short of ideal. We appreciate your understanding.|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ww/the-show-must-go-on.html|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ww/the-show-must-go-on.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-06 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86233_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86233_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-08 04:28:52.000
85247|《盛先生的花兒》─ 中國電影展2017|“The Song of Cotton” - Chinese Film Panorama 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月22日 (日) 晚上7:30|22 Oct 2017 (Sun) 7:30pm|91分鐘|91 min|65910018|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|當年港片《女人四十》(1995) 的蕭芳芳為服侍家中認知障礙症老爺，又兼顧老公兒子，而給弄得惶惶不可終日；本片的顏丙燕受僱照料痴呆的盛先生，適逢未婚懷孕，竟被盛的女兒懷疑與老父越軌，以致煩惱纏身。兩片都寫老人問題的嚴峻和給予女性的沉重負擔。但本片寫盛先生（王德順）有更多篇幅，引出複雜微妙的兩代恩怨、和女人在婚戀中的折騰。顏丙燕（2013年「中國電影展」《萬箭穿心》(2012) 女演員）演生命力頑强的基層女子恰到好處，今次和演女兒的艾麗婭同時獲獎。全片情理兼備、枝葉適中，讓我們看到戲劇的花朵由含苞、漸放而盛開。|Sheng Qin (Ai Liya) hires Cotton (Yan Bingyan) to take care of her senile father, Mr. Sheng (Wang Deshun). Overcoming the generation gap and taking care of a senile man who keeps mistaking her as his late wife seem difficult at first, but those challenges are nothing compared to what happens when Cotton is impregnated by out of wedlock. This heartfelt drama tackles difficult topics about family and the stigmatization of single parents in Chinese society with warmth and humour, buoyed by moving performances by its three leads. Yan – excellent in acclaimed and underrated drama Feng Shui (2012) (Chinese Film Panorama 2013) – is captivating as a working-class woman facing the crisis of her life. Yan and Ai are so good together that both won prizes for their respective roles at the 19th Shanghai International Film Festival’s Media Awards.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film05.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film05.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-08-18 12:08:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署及華南電影工作者聯合會合辦，銀都機構有限公司、南方影業有限公司及中國電影基金會協辦|Jointly presented by LCSD and South China Film Industry Workers Union; in association with Sil-Metropole Organisation Ltd., Southern Film Co., Ltd. and China Film Foundation|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85247_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85247_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-18 06:34:49.000
