85256|《八月》─ 中國電影展2017|“The Summer is Gone” - Chinese Film Panorama 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年9月24日 (日) 下午2:00 及2017年10月13日 (五) 晚上7:30|24 Sep 2017 (Sun) 2:00pm and13 Oct 2017 (Fri) 7:30pm|107分鐘|107 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|初看像是很普通的小城一家的故事，細看卻另有端倪。原來寫的是上世紀九十年代中國加速現代化，小城一家在一個夏天起的變化。十二三歲的小孩放暑假閒著，卻感覺到家人的心情和過往不一樣。這一年國有單位在轉制，爸爸的鐵飯碗打破了，要找新工，又為他升中的學費著急。孩子們沒以往的暑假玩得開心，因為大人們各懷心事；爸到外地工作了，媽和兒子更親近了。導演和所有演員都是首次上陣，黑白攝影，情節簡單，語不驚人但生活細節豐富，如實地重造當年的小城之夏。院子的曇花在立秋之夜悄然盛開，彷彿預告另一種生活的到臨。|Young director Zhang Dalei looks back at his childhood with this eloquently crafted directorial debut, the surprise Best Feature Film winner at last year’s Golden Horse Awards. Set in the early 1990s, as the Chinese government began closing down state-owned enterprises in a slow transition to a market economy, the film follows a young boy who is trying to have a summer vacation just like any other. However, unbeknownst to the boy, his parents are using every trick up their sleeves to get him into a respectable secondary school – even after his father loses his job at the local state-owned film studio. Shot entirely in striking black-and-white, Zhang’s quietly stirring coming-of-age drama channels Hou Hsiao-hsien’s The Time to Live and the Time to Die (1985), showing a society undergoing immense changes through the eyes of a child who is too young to understand or care about the troubles of adults.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film10.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film10.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-08-18 12:08:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署及華南電影工作者聯合會合辦，銀都機構有限公司、南方影業有限公司及中國電影基金會協辦|Jointly presented by LCSD and South China Film Industry Workers Union; in association with Sil-Metropole Organisation Ltd., Southern Film Co., Ltd. and China Film Foundation|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85256_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85256_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-18 06:48:48.000
86274|《留芳頌》─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“To Live” - Repertory Cinema 2017 "In Memory of Japanese Film Master: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira"|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年11月12日 (日) 晚上 7:30|12 Nov 2017 (Sun) 7:30pm|143分鐘|143 min|65910018|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|人生在世所為何事	渡邊課長（志村喬）為官三十年，所掌的「市民課」其實沒有為市民做過幾多實事，除了製造堆積如山的文件，就是把事情推卸到其他部門。渡邊早年喪妻，獨力把兒子養大後，仍然過着吝嗇又無趣的生活。渡邊發現自己患上胃癌，時日無多，才驚覺自己沒有真正活過。日文片名的意思為「活着」，活着的意義，到底是酒色財氣、三餐一宿、成家立室，還是造福人群？居民要求填平蚊患嚴重的明渠，改建公園，但每個部門都事不關己。渡邊促成各部門通力合作，成為他餘生的意義。黑澤明在東寶大罷工後離開東寶，經歷過《羅生門》(1950)享譽國際，在松竹拍攝的《白痴》(1951)被剪得體無完膚後，本片既是他回歸老巢的第一部作品，也是東寶二十周年的紀念影片。1952年，美軍結束佔領日本，三餐不繼的匱乏年代亦已成過去，「第一殺手」從戰前的肺癆，變成胃癌，足見物質生活的改善。《留芳頌》是從《酩酊天使》(1948)至《赤鬍子》(1965)十七部片之中，唯一沒有三船敏郎參演的黑澤明作品，志村喬獨挑大樑，本片不單是他的代表作，渡邊課長更成為日本電影史上的經典人物。黑澤明汲取了《白痴》因為過度文藝而失敗的教訓，將「人生有何意義」此哲學問題，融入人人能懂的故事之內。《羅生門》當年在日本上映時，多數是知識份子才看得明，《留芳頌》卻是不折不扣的雅俗共賞，影片一出即叫好叫座，登上該年《電影旬報》十大電影之首。晚年的黑澤明憶起本片：「我常問自己，怎樣才能無憾而死。答案是：時刻全力以赴」。|The Meaning of Life	Watanabe is a bureaucrat in charge of the Citizens' Section. Far from serving the taxpayers Watanabe is adept in creating red tape and leaving matters unsolved. Watanabe, a widower, raises his son without remarrying. His son grown up and married, Watanabe keeps on his penny-pinching and denies himself any pleasure. But when he finds out he has a terminal case of stomach cancer, it dawns on him that he has never really lived. Ikiru means "to live", but what is the meaning of life? Watanabe must find out for himself. Residents have been urging the government to fill up a sewer and build a park on top of it. But other section chiefs, like Watanabe, have been dodging the issue. Watanabe's decision to push the project through is his answer to that one big question.After leaving Toho in 1948, Kurosawa had his ups (international success of Rashomon (1950)), and downs (Shochiku cutting down The Idiot (1951) by half) before returning to Toho. Apart from being Kurosawa's comeback film, To Live was also Toho's 20th anniversary film. 1952 was the year that the occupation by US forces came to an end. The days of hunger were also over, as witnessed by the fact that stomach cancer had replaced tuberculosis as the chief "killer" of Japan.Of Kurosawa's 17 films from Drunken Angel (1948) up to Red Beard (1965), To Live is the only one without Mifune Toshiro. Not only To Live is the signature work of Shimura Takashi's long career, Watanabe also becomes a seminal character in Japanese cinema. Kurosawa took his lessons from the failure of The Idiot and used a simple story to bring out the philosophical question of the meaning of life. To Live was a big hit in Japan and voted best film of the year by Kinejun. In his old age Kurosawa made this comment on To Live, "I often asked myself, how can I die with no regrets? The answer is to constantly give my best."|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film05.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film05.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-09-28 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86274_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86274_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 02:35:12.000
86273|《留芳頌》─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“To Live” - Repertory Cinema 2017: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月29日 (日) 晚上 7:00|29 Oct 2017 (Sun) 7:00pm|143分鐘|143 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|人生在世所為何事	渡邊課長（志村喬）為官三十年，所掌的「市民課」其實沒有為市民做過幾多實事，除了製造堆積如山的文件，就是把事情推卸到其他部門。渡邊早年喪妻，獨力把兒子養大後，仍然過着吝嗇又無趣的生活。渡邊發現自己患上胃癌，時日無多，才驚覺自己沒有真正活過。日文片名的意思為「活着」，活着的意義，到底是酒色財氣、三餐一宿、成家立室，還是造福人群？居民要求填平蚊患嚴重的明渠，改建公園，但每個部門都事不關己。渡邊促成各部門通力合作，成為他餘生的意義。黑澤明在東寶大罷工後離開東寶，經歷過《羅生門》(1950)享譽國際，在松竹拍攝的《白痴》(1951)被剪得體無完膚後，本片既是他回歸老巢的第一部作品，也是東寶二十周年的紀念影片。1952年，美軍結束佔領日本，三餐不繼的匱乏年代亦已成過去，「第一殺手」從戰前的肺癆，變成胃癌，足見物質生活的改善。《留芳頌》是從《酩酊天使》(1948)至《赤鬍子》(1965)十七部片之中，唯一沒有三船敏郎參演的黑澤明作品，志村喬獨挑大樑，本片不單是他的代表作，渡邊課長更成為日本電影史上的經典人物。黑澤明汲取了《白痴》因為過度文藝而失敗的教訓，將「人生有何意義」此哲學問題，融入人人能懂的故事之內。《羅生門》當年在日本上映時，多數是知識份子才看得明，《留芳頌》卻是不折不扣的雅俗共賞，影片一出即叫好叫座，登上該年《電影旬報》十大電影之首。晚年的黑澤明憶起本片：「我常問自己，怎樣才能無憾而死。答案是：時刻全力以赴」。|The Meaning of Life	Watanabe is a bureaucrat in charge of the Citizens' Section. Far from serving the taxpayers Watanabe is adept in creating red tape and leaving matters unsolved. Watanabe, a widower, raises his son without remarrying. His son grown up and married, Watanabe keeps on his penny-pinching and denies himself any pleasure. But when he finds out he has a terminal case of stomach cancer, it dawns on him that he has never really lived. Ikiru means "to live", but what is the meaning of life? Watanabe must find out for himself. Residents have been urging the government to fill up a sewer and build a park on top of it. But other section chiefs, like Watanabe, have been dodging the issue. Watanabe's decision to push the project through is his answer to that one big question.After leaving Toho in 1948, Kurosawa had his ups (international success of Rashomon (1950)), and downs (Shochiku cutting down The Idiot (1951) by half) before returning to Toho. Apart from being Kurosawa's comeback film, To Live was also Toho's 20th anniversary film. 1952 was the year that the occupation by US forces came to an end. The days of hunger were also over, as witnessed by the fact that stomach cancer had replaced tuberculosis as the chief "killer" of Japan.Of Kurosawa's 17 films from Drunken Angel (1948) up to Red Beard (1965), To Live is the only one without Mifune Toshiro. Not only To Live is the signature work of Shimura Takashi's long career, Watanabe also becomes a seminal character in Japanese cinema. Kurosawa took his lessons from the failure of The Idiot and used a simple story to bring out the philosophical question of the meaning of life. To Live was a big hit in Japan and voted best film of the year by Kinejun. In his old age Kurosawa made this comment on To Live, "I often asked myself, how can I die with no regrets? The answer is to constantly give my best."|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film05.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film05.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-09-28 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86273_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86273_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 02:34:19.000
85259|《陸垚知馬俐》─ 中國電影展2017|“When Larry Met Mary” - Chinese Film Panorama 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月14日 (六) 晚上7:30|14 Oct 2017 (Sat) 7:30pm|107分鐘|107 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|陸垚（包貝爾飾）和馬俐（宋佳飾）自幼青梅竹馬。男的內向自卑，女的外向虛榮，兩人互相照顧，時常玩在一起卻無法進展到談情說愛。馬俐愛俏愛玩，追求者無數，陸垚眼巴巴看著她和別人相好又鬧翻只會慰解，心中又愛又妒，卻總是不敢再進一步。劇情就環繞類似的荒唐可笑處境大做「文章」，玩盡中產俊男美女的追逐玩意笑料。導演文章是演員出身，自是使出八寶功夫，務求滿足觀眾對愛情的夢幻想像。尾段陸垚和馬俐陪一對作「婚前旅行」的好友暢游巴塞隆那，風光明媚中兩人怎樣放下身段、同浴愛河？男的又怎樣作出愛的告白？|Popular actor Wen Zhang – who has written and directed several television series – takes his first stab at feature filmmaking with this lighthearted romantic comedy about two lifelong friends who can’t seem to take their relationship to the next step. The hopelessly introverted Larry (Bao Bei’er) has always been around for his best friend Mary (Song Jia), who has a penchant for going out with the wrong guys. He’s clearly in love with her, but he’s always too scared to rise to the occasion in fear of getting in the way of her true Mr. Right. After years of false starts, a wedding trip to Barcelona may finally provide the perfect opportunity for them to fall in love. Wen’s hilarious take on the tried-and-true “odd couple” formula is elevated by a witty script (co-written by Wen and two other writers) and cracking rapport between his two immensely talented leads.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film12.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film12.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-08-18 12:08:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署及華南電影工作者聯合會合辦，銀都機構有限公司、南方影業有限公司及中國電影基金會協辦|Jointly presented by LCSD and South China Film Industry Workers Union; in association with Sil-Metropole Organisation Ltd., Southern Film Co., Ltd. and China Film Foundation|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85259_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85259_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-18 06:47:24.000
86251|《一年之計》－ 小城內外的韋偉|“Year In, Year Out” - From Small Town to the Big Screen: A Retrospective on Wei Wei|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月7日 (六) 下午2:30|7 October 2017 (Sat) 2:30pm|103分鐘|103min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$45|$45|鳳凰開創初期，靈魂人物朱石麟在市場和意識形態之間謹慎游走了兩年，此片可說是他回勇之作。他回歸最熟識的家庭倫理題材，透過通俗劇的形式，以母親和兩對兒媳之間的關係，思考現代生活種種。哥哥受妻子的慫恿，從事投機行業，結果把父親留下來的祖居也輸掉；弟弟和弟婦則實幹善良，一個堅守實業，一個勤儉持家。劇本結構嚴謹，導演處理出色，獲中國文化部頒發 1949-1955年度的優秀影片榮譽獎。韋偉飾演貪慕虛榮的大嫂，舉手投足都散發出一股潑辣勢利的味道，一絕。		鳴謝中國電影資料館|When the studio Feng Huang was first established after the war, founder Zhu Shilin and his filmmaking team were tasked to toe the fine line between commercialism and ideology. Year In, Year Out, made two years into the company’s tenure, finds Zhu back to his former self. A family melodrama, the story of a mother and the families of her two sons offers a poignant contemplation on modern life. The skillfully structured script by Shen Ji is directed with delicate touches by Zhu, earning the film an award from China’s Ministry of Culture. Wei Wei, playing one of the daughters-in-law, turns in a bravura performance, embodying every bit the pungent, rapacious woman that’s her character.&nbsp;		Screening courtesy of China Film Archive|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/zh_TW/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ww/between-fire-and-water.html|https://www.lcsd.gov.hk/CE/CulturalService/HKFA/en_US/web/hkfa/programmesandexhibitions/2017ww/year-in-year-out.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2739 2139|2311 5229|hkfa@lcsd.gov.hk|2017-09-06 12:09:00.000|Y|康樂及文化事務署主辦|Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86251_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86251_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-08 04:29:39.000
86278|《用心棒 》─ 世界電影經典回顧 2017「日本電影巨匠紀念展︰仁與義—黑澤明之道」|“Yojimbo” - Repertory Cinema 2017 "In Memory of Japanese Film Master: Kindness and Selflessness - The Doctrine of Kurosawa Akira"|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年11月10日 (五) 晚上 7:30|10 Nov 2017 (Fri) 7:30pm|110分鐘|110 min|75010017|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|虛無放蕩見正義	浪人桑畑三十郎（三船敏郎）漫無目的步進小鎮，眼見鎮內兩派黑幫爭鬥沒完沒了，小鎮烏煙瘴氣，棺材舖生意滔滔。兩派各自有商人撐腰，三十郎深明這是賺錢機會，既吃兩家茶禮，又挑撥兩幫人把紛爭升級，最好是他們殺光彼此，還小鎮一個清靜。強勁對手卯之助（仲代達矢）出現，識破三十郎的詭計，而且有一支能輕易擊倒劍客的手槍。三十郎武功再高，亦隨時會從鋼線跌下，粉身碎骨。《用心棒》被翻拍成意式西部片《獨行俠連環奪命槍》 (1964) 一事廣為人知，但較少人知道《獨行俠》推出之後，東寶曾向該片的出品公司提出抗議，事件擾攘了一年，驚動多個意大利電影及政府機構，最終《獨行俠》一方承認抄襲，要向黑澤明及編劇菊島隆三賠錢及讓出《獨行俠》部分版權及收益。《用心棒》的故事及「無名浪人」的人物亦非橫空出世，黑澤明既吸收了他看過的眾多西部片，而且從美國偵探小說家哈米特取得靈感，三十郎其實就是黑色電影中常見的那種hard-boiled 幹探，將正義感掩藏在虛無放蕩的面具之下。《惡漢甜夢》 (1960) 的幸一／ 哈姆雷特受制於現代社會的法律及道德規範，但換成武士片的暴力世界，三十郎就能無拘無束。《用心棒》受日本觀眾熱捧，電影同行以為只是武打精彩所然，其實黑澤明讓三十郎屠殺壞人，實在是大快人心，既抒發對日本「官商黑勾結」的不滿，亦暗藏對美蘇對峙、隨時毀滅全世界的不滿。|The Good, the Bad, and the Hard-Boiled	Masterless samurai Sanjuro (Mifune Toshiro) drifts into a town and finds it to be a war zone. Two gangs, eachbacked by a rich merchant, are in a bitter gang war. The only business that prospers is the undertaker. Sanjuro knows there is money to be made and maneuvers the two gangs into paying for his service. What Sanjuro wants the most is to provoke them into an all-out war so that peace can be restored. Sanjuro's plan goes very well until the arrival of his nemesis Unosuke (Nakadai Tatsuya) who seesthrough Sanjuro's intrigue. Unosuke's pistol, the only one in the town, makes him even more deadly.It is very well known that Sergio Leone's A Fistful of Dollars (1964) is a remake of Yojimbo. But that Toho had made a case of plagiarism against the Italians wasn't as well known. After a year's to and fro with many Italian film or government organisations, the producers of A Fistful of Dollars conceded that they had plagiarized Yojimbo. As screenwriters Kurosawa and Kikushima Ryuzo were paid a certain amount of money and received a proportion of A Fistful of Dollars' rights and earnings as compensation.Yet the Sanjuro character wasn't entirely original. Kurosawa was an avid fan of Westerns and took his inspiration from the hard-boiled detective novels of Dashiell Hammett.Sanjuro's nihilistic outlook (with a sense of justice deep down) matches that of hard-boiled detectives in film noirs.Koichi / Hamlet in The Bad Sleep Well (1960) has his hands tied by the legal and moral constraints of our times, butSanjuro is allowed to run free in the violent world of the jidaigeki. On release, Yojimbo was very popular with the audience. Many people in the movie business attributed the success to its brillant swordfights, but Yojimbo wasmore than that. Sanjuro's cutting down of the villains struck a chord with the Japanese who witnessed injusticego unpunished. A more far-fetched interpretation saw the gang war in the perspective of Cold War politics.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film09.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/rc2017/film09.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-09-28 12:09:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署主辦, 日本國際交流基金協辦, 日本國駐香港總領事館及「日本秋祭in香港」支持|Presented by LCSD, In collaboration with Japan Foundation, Supported by Consulate General of Japan in Hong Kong and "Japan Autumn Festival in HK"|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P86278_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P86278_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-09-29 02:41:23.000
85252|《少年巴比倫》─ 中國電影展2017|“Young Love Lost” - Chinese Film Panorama 2017|inc4|inc4sc5|2017年10月21日 (六) 下午3:00|21 Oct 2017 (Sat) 3:00pm|96分鐘|96 min|73810020|只限6歲或以上人士|Only for age 6 or above|$55|$55|路小路（董子健）的爸爸是退休技工，期望兒子也當技工繼承父業。傻小子跟了個「牛魔王」師傅，在糖廠飽受折騰，學懂了打架、偷懶、「埋堆」、追女仔，也從挫敗中學會了維權進取，而美麗能幹的廠醫（李夢）成了他追求和學習的對象。原著小說擁有大量年青讀者，拍成本片更加生動風趣，搗蛋、反叛、勵志、愛情結合得飛動生色。上世紀九十年代工業飛躍發展，無數基層青年為經濟增長付出辛勤勞動，成長路上有笑有淚。本片的「小路」也許特別曲折，諷刺有些誇張，卻刺中了現實，笑出了青年人的心聲。|The paradigm shift of 1990s Chinese economy not only forced a whole generation of a state enterprise workers search for new ways of survival, it also opened up endless possibilities for another generation of young workers. Based on an acclaimed novel, this poignant love story follows the adventure of Xiaolu (Dong Zijian), a technical school graduate who spends his directionless days getting into fights, trying to get out of his menial job at the local factory and chasing after girls. But when he falls for the factory doctor (Li Meng), Xiaolu discovers a reason to grow up and get his act together. Director Xiang Guoqiang approaches his coming-of-age story of young love and youthful restlessness with an absurdist and off-kilter touch. The result is a delightfully eclectic film that is at once beautiful, melancholic and surprisingly funny.|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/zh_TW/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film08.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp/en_US/web/fpo/programmes/2017cfp/film08.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/tc/ticket/index.html|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/en/ticket/index.html|||2734 2900|||2017-08-18 12:08:00.000|N|康樂及文化事務署及華南電影工作者聯合會合辦，銀都機構有限公司、南方影業有限公司及中國電影基金會協辦|Jointly presented by LCSD and South China Film Industry Workers Union; in association with Sil-Metropole Organisation Ltd., Southern Film Co., Ltd. and China Film Foundation|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/thumbnail/P85252_1.jpg|http://www.lcsd.gov.hk/crs/images/detail/P85252_2.jpg|||||||Y|2017-08-18 06:39:05.000

Director Xiang Guoqiang approaches his coming-of-age story of young love and youthful restlessness with an absurdist and off-kilter touch.
